240
241std::string activity_actor::get_progress_message( const player_activity &act ) const
242{
243 if( act.moves_total > 0 ) {
244 const int pct = ( ( act.moves_total - act.moves_left ) * 100 ) / act.moves_total;
245 return string_format( "%d%%", pct );
246 } else {
247 return std::string();
248 }
249}
250
251aim_activity_actor::aim_activity_actor()
252{
253 initial_view_offset = get_avatar().view_offset;
254}
255
256aim_activity_actor aim_activity_actor::use_wielded()
257{
258 return aim_activity_actor();
259}
260
261aim_activity_actor aim_activity_actor::use_bionic( const item &fake_gun )
262{
263 aim_activity_actor act = aim_activity_actor();
264 act.fake_weapon = fake_gun;
265 return act;
266}
267
268aim_activity_actor aim_activity_actor::use_mutation( const item &fake_gun )
269{
270 aim_activity_actor act = aim_activity_actor();
271 act.fake_weapon = fake_gun;
272 return act;
273}
274
275void aim_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &/*who*/ )
276{
277 // Time spent on aiming is determined on the go by the player
278 act.moves_total = 1;
279 act.moves_left = 1;
280}
281
282void aim_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
283{
284 if( !who.is_avatar() ) {
285 debugmsg( "ACT_AIM not implemented for NPCs" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "285", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "ACT_AIM not implemented for NPCs"
);
286 aborted = true;
287 act.moves_left = 0;
288 return;
289 }
290 avatar &you = get_avatar();
291
292 item_location weapon = get_weapon();
293 if( !weapon || !avatar_action::can_fire_weapon( you, get_map(), *weapon ) ) {
294 aborted = true;
295 act.moves_left = 0;
296 return;
297 }
298
299 gun_mode gun = weapon->gun_current_mode();
300 // We need to make sure RAS weapon is loaded/reloaded in case the aim activity was temp. suspended
301 // therefore the order of evaluation matters here
302 if( gun->has_flag( flag_RELOAD_AND_SHOOT ) && !gun->ammo_remaining() && !load_RAS_weapon() &&
303 first_turn ) {
304 aborted = true;
305 act.moves_left = 0;
306 return;
307 }
308
309 if( gun->has_flag( json_flag_ALWAYS_AIMED ) ) {
310 you.recoil = 0;
311 }
312
313 g->temp_exit_fullscreen();
314 target_handler::trajectory trajectory = target_handler::mode_fire( you, *this );
315 g->reenter_fullscreen();
316
317 if( aborted ) {
318 act.moves_left = 0;
319 } else {
320 if( !trajectory.empty() ) {
321 fin_trajectory = trajectory;
322 act.moves_left = 0;
323 }
324 // If aborting on the first turn, keep 'first_turn' as 'true'.
325 // This allows refunding moves spent on unloading RELOAD_AND_SHOOT weapons
326 // to simulate avatar not loading them in the first place
327 first_turn = false;
328
329 // Allow interrupting activity only during 'aim and fire'.
330 // Prevents '.' key for 'aim for 10 turns' from conflicting with '.' key for 'interrupt activity'
331 // in case of high input lag (curses, sdl sometimes...), but allows to interrupt aiming
332 // if a bug happens / stars align to cause an endless aiming loop.
333 act.interruptable_with_kb = action != "AIM";
334 }
335}
336
337void aim_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
338{
339 act.set_to_null();
340 item_location weapon = get_weapon();
341 if( !weapon ) {
342 restore_view();
343 return;
344 }
345 if( aborted ) {
346 unload_RAS_weapon();
347 if( reload_requested ) {
348 // Reload the gun / select different arrows
349 // May assign ACT_RELOAD
350 g->reload_wielded( true );
351 }
352 restore_view();
353 return;
354 }
355
356 gun_mode gun = weapon->gun_current_mode();
357 who.fire_gun( fin_trajectory.back(), gun.qty, *gun );
358
359 if( weapon && weapon->gun_current_mode()->has_flag( flag_RELOAD_AND_SHOOT ) ) {
360 // RAS weapons are currently bugged, this is a workaround so bug impact
361 // isn't amplified, once #54997 and #50571 are fixed this can be removed.
362 restore_view();
363 return;
364 }
365
366 if( !get_option<bool>( "AIM_AFTER_FIRING" ) ) {
367 restore_view();
368 return;
369 }
370
371 // re-enter aiming UI with same parameters
372 aim_activity_actor aim_actor;
373 aim_actor.abort_if_no_targets = true;
374 aim_actor.fake_weapon = this->fake_weapon;
375 aim_actor.initial_view_offset = this->initial_view_offset;
376
377 // if invalid target or it's dead - reset it so a new one is acquired
378 shared_ptr_fast<Creature> last_target = who.last_target.lock();
379 if( !last_target || last_target->is_dead_state() ) {
380 who.last_target.reset();
381 }
382 who.assign_activity( aim_actor );
383}
384
385void aim_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &/*act*/, Character &/*who*/ )
386{
387 restore_view();
388 unload_RAS_weapon();
389}
390
391void aim_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
392{
393 jsout.start_object();
394
395 jsout.member( "fake_weapon", fake_weapon );
396 jsout.member( "fin_trajectory", fin_trajectory );
397 jsout.member( "first_turn", first_turn );
398 jsout.member( "action", action );
399 jsout.member( "aif_duration", aif_duration );
400 jsout.member( "aiming_at_critter", aiming_at_critter );
401 jsout.member( "snap_to_target", snap_to_target );
402 jsout.member( "shifting_view", shifting_view );
403 jsout.member( "initial_view_offset", initial_view_offset );
404 jsout.member( "aborted", aborted );
405 jsout.member( "reload_requested", reload_requested );
406 jsout.member( "abort_if_no_targets", abort_if_no_targets );
407
408 jsout.end_object();
409}
410
411std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> aim_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
412{
413 aim_activity_actor actor = aim_activity_actor();
414
415 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
416
417 data.read( "fake_weapon", actor.fake_weapon );
418 data.read( "fin_trajectory", actor.fin_trajectory );
419 data.read( "first_turn", actor.first_turn );
420 data.read( "action", actor.action );
421 data.read( "aif_duration", actor.aif_duration );
422 data.read( "aiming_at_critter", actor.aiming_at_critter );
423 data.read( "snap_to_target", actor.snap_to_target );
424 data.read( "shifting_view", actor.shifting_view );
425 data.read( "initial_view_offset", actor.initial_view_offset );
426 data.read( "aborted", actor.aborted );
427 data.read( "reload_requested", actor.reload_requested );
428 data.read( "abort_if_no_targets", actor.abort_if_no_targets );
429
430 return actor.clone();
431}
432
433item_location aim_activity_actor::get_weapon()
434{
435 if( fake_weapon.has_value() ) {
436 // TODO: check if the player lost relevant bionic/mutation
437 return item_location( get_player_character(), &fake_weapon.value() );
438 } else {
439 // Check for lost gun (e.g. yanked by zombie technician)
440 // TODO: check that this is the same gun that was used to start aiming
441 return get_player_character().get_wielded_item();
442
443 }
444}
445
446void aim_activity_actor::restore_view() const
447{
448 avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
449 bool changed_z = player_character.view_offset.z != initial_view_offset.z;
450 player_character.view_offset = initial_view_offset;
451 if( changed_z ) {
452 get_map().invalidate_map_cache( player_character.view_offset.z );
453 g->invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
454 }
455}
456
457bool aim_activity_actor::load_RAS_weapon()
458{
459 // TODO: use activity for fetching ammo and loading weapon
460 Character &you = get_avatar();
461 item_location weapon = get_weapon();
462 gun_mode gun = weapon->gun_current_mode();
463 // selected gun_mode might come from a gunmod
464 item_location used_gun = &*gun != &*weapon ? item_location( weapon, &*gun ) : weapon;
465 const auto ammo_location_is_valid = [&]() -> bool {
466 if( !you.ammo_location )
467 {
468 return false;
469 }
470 if( !gun->can_reload_with( *you.ammo_location.get_item(), false ) )
471 {
472 return false;
473 }
474 if( square_dist( you.pos(), you.ammo_location.position() ) > 1 )
475 {
476 return false;
477 }
478 return true;
479 };
480 item::reload_option opt = ammo_location_is_valid() ? item::reload_option( &you, weapon,
481 you.ammo_location ) : you.select_ammo( used_gun );
482 if( !opt ) {
483 // Menu canceled
484 return false;
485 }
486 int reload_time = 0;
487 reload_time += opt.moves();
488 if( !gun->reload( you, std::move( opt.ammo ), 1 ) ) {
489 // Reload not allowed
490 return false;
491 }
492
493 // Burn 0.6% max base stamina without cardio/BMI factored in x the strength required to fire.
494 you.burn_energy_arms( gun->get_min_str() * static_cast<int>( 0.006f *
495 get_option<int>( "PLAYER_MAX_STAMINA_BASE" ) ) );
496 // At low stamina levels, firing starts getting slow.
497 int sta_percent = ( 100 * you.get_stamina() ) / you.get_stamina_max();
498 reload_time += ( sta_percent < 25 ) ? ( ( 25 - sta_percent ) * 2 ) : 0;
499
500 you.moves -= reload_time;
501 return true;
502}
503
504void aim_activity_actor::unload_RAS_weapon()
505{
506 // Unload reload-and-shoot weapons to avoid leaving bows pre-loaded with arrows
507 avatar &you = get_avatar();
508 item_location weapon = get_weapon();
509 if( !weapon ) {
510 return;
511 }
512
513 gun_mode gun = weapon->gun_current_mode();
514 if( gun->has_flag( flag_RELOAD_AND_SHOOT ) ) {
515 int moves_before_unload = you.moves;
516
517 // Note: this code works only for avatar
518 item_location loc = item_location( you, gun.target );
519 you.unload( loc, true );
520
521 // Give back time for unloading as essentially nothing has been done.
522 if( first_turn ) {
523 you.moves = moves_before_unload;
524 }
525 }
526}
527
528void autodrive_activity_actor::update_player_vehicle( Character &who )
529{
530 const bool in_vehicle = who.in_vehicle && who.controlling_vehicle;
531 const optional_vpart_position vp = get_map().veh_at( who.pos() );
532 if( !( vp && in_vehicle ) ) {
533 player_vehicle = nullptr;
534 } else {
535 player_vehicle = &vp->vehicle();
536 }
537}
538
539void autodrive_activity_actor::start( player_activity &, Character &who )
540{
541 update_player_vehicle( who );
542 if( player_vehicle == nullptr ) {
543 who.cancel_activity();
544 } else {
545 player_vehicle->is_autodriving = true;
546 }
547}
548
549void autodrive_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
550{
551 if( who.in_vehicle && who.controlling_vehicle && player_vehicle ) {
552 if( who.moves <= 0 ) {
553 // out of moves? the driver's not doing anything this turn
554 // (but the vehicle will continue moving)
555 return;
556 }
557 switch( player_vehicle->do_autodrive( who ) ) {
558 case autodrive_result::ok:
559 if( who.moves > 0 ) {
560 // if do_autodrive() didn't eat up all our moves, end the turn
561 // equivalent to player pressing the "pause" button
562 who.moves = 0;
563 }
564 sounds::reset_markers();
565 break;
566 case autodrive_result::abort:
567 who.cancel_activity();
568 break;
569 case autodrive_result::finished:
570 act.moves_left = 0;
571 break;
572 }
573 } else {
574 who.cancel_activity();
575 }
576}
577
578void autodrive_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &act, Character &who )
579{
580 // The activity might be canceled because the driver got unboarded, in which case we may not have a valid pointer anymore (e.g. summoned vehicle).
581 update_player_vehicle( who );
582
583 who.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "Auto drive canceled." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Auto drive canceled." ) ) ) );
584 if( player_vehicle ) {
585 player_vehicle->stop_autodriving( false );
586 }
587 act.set_to_null();
588}
589
590void autodrive_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
591{
592 who.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You have reached your destination." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You have reached your destination."
) ) ) );
593 player_vehicle->stop_autodriving( false );
594 act.set_to_null();
595}
596
597void autodrive_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
598{
599 // Activity is not being saved but still provide some valid json if called.
600 jsout.write_null();
601}
602
603std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> autodrive_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue & )
604{
605 return autodrive_activity_actor().clone();
606}
607
608void gunmod_remove_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
609{
610 act.moves_total = moves_total;
611 act.moves_left = moves_total;
612}
613
614void gunmod_remove_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
615{
616 item *it_gun = gun.get_item();
617 if( !it_gun ) {
618 debugmsg( "ACT_GUNMOD_REMOVE lost target gun" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "618", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "ACT_GUNMOD_REMOVE lost target gun"
);
619 act.set_to_null();
620 return;
621 }
622 item *it_mod = nullptr;
623 std::vector<item *> mods = it_gun->gunmods();
624 if( gunmod_idx >= 0 && mods.size() > static_cast<size_t>( gunmod_idx ) ) {
625 it_mod = mods[gunmod_idx];
626 } else {
627 debugmsg( "ACT_GUNMOD_REMOVE lost target gunmod" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "627", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "ACT_GUNMOD_REMOVE lost target gunmod"
);
628 act.set_to_null();
629 return;
630 }
631 act.set_to_null();
632 gunmod_remove( who, *it_gun, *it_mod );
633 it_gun->on_contents_changed();
634}
635
636bool gunmod_remove_activity_actor::gunmod_unload( Character &who, item &gunmod )
637{
638 if( gunmod.has_flag( flag_BRASS_CATCHER ) ) {
639 // Exclude brass catchers so that removing them wouldn't spill the casings
640 return true;
641 }
642 // TODO: unloading gunmods happens instantaneously in some cases, but should take time
643 // Also note, gunmod_unload is called twice, once in
644 // gunmod_remove_activity_actor::gunmod_remove
645 // and once in
646 // Character::gunmod_remove
647 // Remove one of them before making gunmod_unload take time
648 item_location loc = item_location( who, &gunmod );
649 return !( gunmod.ammo_remaining() && !who.unload( loc, true ) );
650}
651
652void gunmod_remove_activity_actor::gunmod_remove( Character &who, item &gun, item &mod )
653{
654 if( !gunmod_unload( who, mod ) ) {
655 return;
656 }
657
658 gun.gun_set_mode( gun_mode_DEFAULT );
659 const itype *modtype = mod.type;
660
661 who.i_add_or_drop( mod );
662 gun.remove_item( mod );
663
664 //~ %1$s - gunmod, %2$s - gun.
665 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You remove your %1$s from your %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You remove your %1$s from your %2$s."
) ) ), modtype->nname( 1 ),
666 gun.tname() );
667}
668
669void gunmod_remove_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
670{
671 jsout.start_object();
672
673 jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
674 jsout.member( "gun", gun );
675 jsout.member( "gunmod", gunmod_idx );
676
677 jsout.end_object();
678}
679
680std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> gunmod_remove_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
681{
682 gunmod_remove_activity_actor actor( 0, item_location(), -1 );
683
684 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
685
686 data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
687 data.read( "gun", actor.gun );
688 data.read( "gunmod", actor.gunmod_idx );
689
690 return actor.clone();
691}
692
693void hacking_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
694{
695 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( 5_minutes );
696 act.moves_left = to_moves<int>( 5_minutes );
697}
698
699enum class hack_result : int {
700 UNABLE,
701 FAIL,
702 NOTHING,
703 SUCCESS
704};
705
706enum class hack_type : int {
707 SAFE,
708 DOOR,
709 GAS,
710 NONE
711};
712
713static int hack_level( const Character &who, item_location &tool )
714{
715 // Quality of 2 is a base electrohack, which results in no modifier
716 int tool_quality_modifier = tool->get_quality( qual_HACK ) - 2;
717 ///\EFFECT_COMPUTER increases success chance of hacking
718 // odds go up with int>8, down with int<8
719 // 4 int stat is worth 1 computer skill here
720 ///\EFFECT_INT increases success chance of hacking
721 // tool_quality_modifier may increase or reduce the success chance of hacking
722 return round( who.get_greater_skill_or_knowledge_level( skill_computer ) + tool_quality_modifier +
723 static_cast<float>
724 ( who.int_cur ) / 2.0f - 8 );
725}
726
727static hack_result hack_attempt( Character &who, item_location &tool )
728{
729 // TODO: Remove this once player -> Character migration is complete
730 {
731 who.practice( skill_computer, 20 );
732 }
733
734 // only skilled supergenius never cause short circuits, but the odds are low for people
735 // with moderate skills
736 const int hack_stddev = 5;
737 int success = std::ceil( normal_roll( hack_level( who, tool ), hack_stddev ) );
738 if( success < 0 ) {
739 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You cause a short circuit!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cause a short circuit!" )
) ) );
740 tool->ammo_consume( tool->ammo_required(), tool.position(), &who );
741
742 if( success <= -5 ) {
743 tool->ammo_consume( ( tool->ammo_required() * 2 ), tool.position(), &who );
744 }
745 return hack_result::FAIL;
746 } else if( success < 6 ) {
747 return hack_result::NOTHING;
748 } else {
749 return hack_result::SUCCESS;
750 }
751}
752
753static hack_type get_hack_type( const tripoint &examp )
754{
755 hack_type type = hack_type::NONE;
756 map &here = get_map();
757 const furn_t &xfurn_t = here.furn( examp ).obj();
758 const ter_t &xter_t = here.ter( examp ).obj();
759 if( xter_t.has_examine( iexamine::pay_gas ) || xfurn_t.has_examine( iexamine::pay_gas ) ) {
760 type = hack_type::GAS;
761 } else if( xter_t.has_examine( "cardreader" ) ||
762 xfurn_t.has_examine( "cardreader" ) ) {
763 type = hack_type::DOOR;
764 } else if( xter_t.has_examine( iexamine::gunsafe_el ) ||
765 xfurn_t.has_examine( iexamine::gunsafe_el ) ) {
766 type = hack_type::SAFE;
767 }
768 return type;
769}
770
771void hacking_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
772{
773 // TODO: fix point types
774 tripoint examp = get_map().getlocal( act.placement );
775 hack_type type = get_hack_type( examp );
776 switch( hack_attempt( who, tool ) ) {
777 case hack_result::UNABLE:
778 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You cannot hack this." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot hack this." ) ) ) );
779 break;
780 case hack_result::FAIL:
781 // currently all things that can be hacked have equivalent alarm failure states.
782 // this may not always be the case with new hackable things.
783 get_event_bus().send<event_type::triggers_alarm>( who.getID() );
784 sounds::sound( who.pos(), 60, sounds::sound_t::music, _( "an alarm sound!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "an alarm sound!" ) ) ), true, "environment",
785 "alarm" );
786 break;
787 case hack_result::NOTHING:
788 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You fail the hack, but no alarms are triggered." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You fail the hack, but no alarms are triggered."
) ) ) );
789 break;
790 case hack_result::SUCCESS:
791 map &here = get_map();
792 if( type == hack_type::GAS ) {
793 int tankUnits;
794 fuel_station_fuel_type fuelType;
795 const std::optional<tripoint> pTank_ = iexamine::getNearFilledGasTank( examp, tankUnits,
796 fuelType );
797 if( !pTank_ ) {
798 break;
799 }
800 const tripoint pTank = *pTank_;
801 const std::optional<tripoint> pGasPump = iexamine::getGasPumpByNumber( examp,
802 uistate.ags_pay_gas_selected_pump );
803 if( pGasPump && iexamine::toPumpFuel( pTank, *pGasPump, tankUnits ) ) {
804 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You hack the terminal and route all available fuel to your pump!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You hack the terminal and route all available fuel to your pump!"
) ) ) );
805 sounds::sound( examp, 6, sounds::sound_t::activity,
806 _( "Glug Glug Glug Glug Glug Glug Glug Glug Glug" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Glug Glug Glug Glug Glug Glug Glug Glug Glug"
) ) ), true, "tool", "gaspump" );
807 } else {
808 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "Nothing happens." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Nothing happens." ) ) ) );
809 }
810 } else if( type == hack_type::SAFE ) {
811 who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The door on the safe swings open." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The door on the safe swings open."
) ) ) );
812 here.furn_set( examp, furn_f_safe_o );
813 } else if( type == hack_type::DOOR ) {
814 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You activate the panel!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You activate the panel!" ) )
) );
815 who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "The nearby doors unlock." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The nearby doors unlock." ) )
) );
816 here.ter_set( examp, t_card_reader_broken );
817 for( const tripoint &tmp : here.points_in_radius( examp, 3 ) ) {
818 if( here.ter( tmp ) == t_door_metal_locked ) {
819 here.ter_set( tmp, t_door_metal_c );
820 }
821 }
822 }
823 break;
824 }
825 act.set_to_null();
826}
827
828void hacking_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
829{
830 jsout.write_null();
831}
832
833std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> hacking_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
834{
835 hacking_activity_actor actor( {} );
836 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
837 data.read( "tool", actor.tool );
838 return actor.clone();
839}
840
841void bookbinder_copy_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
842{
843 pages = bookbinder_copy_activity_actor::pages_for_recipe( *rec_id );
844 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( pages * 10_minutes );
845 act.moves_left = to_moves<int>( pages * 10_minutes );
846}
847
848void bookbinder_copy_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &, Character &p )
849{
850 if( p.fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4.0f ) {
851 p.cancel_activity();
852 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "It's too dark to write!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It's too dark to write!" ) )
) );
853 return;
854 }
855}
856
857void bookbinder_copy_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &p )
858{
859 if( !book_binder->can_contain( item( itype_paper, calendar::turn, pages ) ).success() ) {
860 debugmsg( "Book binder can not contain '%s' recipe when it should.", rec_id.str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "860", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Book binder can not contain '%s' recipe when it should."
, rec_id.str());
861 act.set_to_null();
862 return;
863 }
864
865 std::set<recipe_id> recipes = book_binder->get_saved_recipes();
866
867 if( recipes.emplace( rec_id ).second ) { // if .second is true then recipe was inserted
868 book_binder->set_saved_recipes( recipes );
869 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You copy the recipe for %1$s into your recipe book." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You copy the recipe for %1$s into your recipe book."
) ) ),
870 rec_id->result_name() );
871
872 p.use_charges( itype_paper, pages );
873
874 const std::vector<const item *> writing_tools_filter =
875 p.crafting_inventory().items_with( [&]( const item & it ) {
876 return it.has_flag( flag_WRITE_MESSAGE ) && it.ammo_remaining() >= it.ammo_required() ;
877 } );
878
879 std::vector<tool_comp> writing_tools;
880 writing_tools.reserve( writing_tools_filter.size() );
881 for( const item *tool : writing_tools_filter ) {
882 writing_tools.emplace_back( tool->typeId(), 1 );
883 }
884
885 p.consume_tools( writing_tools, pages );
886 book_binder->put_in( item( itype_paper, calendar::turn, pages ),
887 pocket_type::MAGAZINE );
888 } else {
889 debugmsg( "Recipe book already has '%s' recipe when it should not.", rec_id.str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "889", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Recipe book already has '%s' recipe when it should not."
, rec_id.str());
890 }
891
892 act.set_to_null();
893}
894
895void bookbinder_copy_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
896{
897 jsout.start_object();
898 jsout.member( "book_binder", book_binder );
899 jsout.member( "rec_id", rec_id );
900 jsout.member( "pages", pages );
901 jsout.end_object();
902}
903
904std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> bookbinder_copy_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
905{
906 bookbinder_copy_activity_actor actor;
907
908 JsonObject jsobj = jsin.get_object();
909 jsobj.read( "book_binder", actor.book_binder );
910 jsobj.read( "rec_id", actor.rec_id );
911 jsobj.read( "pages", actor.pages );
912
913 return actor.clone();
914}
915
916data_handling_activity_actor::data_handling_activity_actor(
917 const item_location &recorder, const std::vector<item_location> &targets )
918 : recorder( recorder ), targets( targets ) {}
919
920static int get_quality_from_string( const std::string_view s )
921{
922 const ret_val<int> try_quality = try_parse_integer<int>( s, false );
923 if( try_quality.success() ) {
924 return try_quality.value();
925 } else {
926 debugmsg( "Error parsing photo quality: %s", try_quality.str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "926", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Error parsing photo quality: %s"
, try_quality.str());
927 return 0;
928 }
929}
930
931void data_handling_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
932{
933 act.moves_left = act.moves_total = targets.size() * to_moves<int>( time_per_card );
934}
935
936void data_handling_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &p )
937{
938 if( !recorder || !recorder->ammo_sufficient( &p ) ) {
939 p.cancel_activity();
940 p.add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "%s appears to have no energy." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s appears to have no energy."
) ) ), recorder->display_name() );
941 return;
942 }
943 if( calendar::once_every( 5_minutes ) ) {
944 recorder->ammo_consume( recorder->type->charges_to_use(), p.pos(), &p );
945 }
946 time_until_next_card -= 1_seconds;
947 if( time_until_next_card > 0_seconds ) {
948 return; // not yet
949 }
950 item &eink = *recorder;
951 item &mc = *targets.back();
952 targets.pop_back();
953 if( targets.empty() ) {
954 act.moves_left = 0;
955 }
956 time_until_next_card = time_per_card;
957 handled_cards++;
958
959 if( mc.has_var( "MC_EXTENDED_PHOTOS" ) ) {
960 std::vector<item::extended_photo_def> extended_photos;
961 try {
962 mc.read_extended_photos( extended_photos, "MC_EXTENDED_PHOTOS", false );
963 eink.read_extended_photos( extended_photos, "EIPC_EXTENDED_PHOTOS", true );
964 eink.write_extended_photos( extended_photos, "EIPC_EXTENDED_PHOTOS" );
965 downloaded_extended_photos++;
966 } catch( const JsonError &e ) {
967 debugmsg( "Error card reading photos (loaded photos = %i) : %s", extended_photos.size(),realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "968", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Error card reading photos (loaded photos = %i) : %s"
, extended_photos.size(), e.c_str())
968 e.c_str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "968", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Error card reading photos (loaded photos = %i) : %s"
, extended_photos.size(), e.c_str());
969 }
970 }
971
972 const std::string monster_photos = mc.get_var( "MC_MONSTER_PHOTOS" );
973 if( !monster_photos.empty() ) {
974 downloaded_monster_photos++;
975 std::string photos = eink.get_var( "EINK_MONSTER_PHOTOS" );
976 if( photos.empty() ) {
977 eink.set_var( "EINK_MONSTER_PHOTOS", monster_photos );
978 } else {
979 std::istringstream f( monster_photos );
980 std::string s;
981 while( getline( f, s, ',' ) ) {
982 if( s.empty() ) {
983 continue;
984 }
985 const std::string mtype = s;
986 getline( f, s, ',' );
987 const int quality = get_quality_from_string( s );
988
989 const size_t eink_strpos = photos.find( "," + mtype + "," );
990
991 if( eink_strpos == std::string::npos ) {
992 photos += mtype + "," + string_format( "%d", quality ) + ",";
993 } else {
994 const size_t strqpos = eink_strpos + mtype.size() + 2;
995 const size_t next_comma = photos.find( ',', strqpos );
996 const int old_quality =
997 get_quality_from_string( photos.substr( strqpos, next_comma ) );
998
999 if( quality > old_quality ) {
1000 const std::string quality_s = string_format( "%d", quality );
1001 cata_assert( quality_s.size() == 1 )(static_cast <bool> (quality_s.size() == 1) ? void (0) :
__assert_fail ("quality_s.size() == 1", "/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, 1001, __extension__ __PRETTY_FUNCTION__));
1002 photos[strqpos] = quality_s.front();
1003 }
1004 }
1005
1006 }
1007 eink.set_var( "EINK_MONSTER_PHOTOS", photos );
1008 }
1009 }
1010 const memory_card_info *mmd = mc.type->memory_card_data ? &*mc.type->memory_card_data : nullptr;
1011 const bool failed_encrypted = mmd && mmd->data_chance < rng_float( 0.0, 1.0 );
1012 if( mmd && mmd->on_read_convert_to.is_valid() ) {
1013 mc.clear_vars();
1014 mc.unset_flags();
1015 mc.convert( mmd->on_read_convert_to );
1016 } // mc is invalid past this point
1017 if( !mmd || failed_encrypted ) {
1018 encrypted_cards += failed_encrypted ? 1 : 0;
1019 return;
1020 }
1021 if( mmd->photos_chance >= rng_float( 0.0, 1.0 ) ) {
1022 const int new_photos = rng( 1, mmd->photos_amount );
1023 eink.set_var( "EIPC_PHOTOS", eink.get_var( "EIPC_PHOTOS", 0 ) + new_photos );
1024 downloaded_photos += new_photos;
1025 }
1026 if( mmd->songs_chance >= rng_float( 0.0, 1.0 ) ) {
1027 const int new_songs = rng( 1, mmd->songs_amount );
1028 eink.set_var( "EIPC_MUSIC", eink.get_var( "EIPC_MUSIC", 0 ) + new_songs );
1029 downloaded_songs += new_songs;
1030 }
1031 if( mmd->recipes_chance >= rng_float( 0.0, 1.0 ) ) {
1032 std::set<recipe_id> saved_recipes = eink.get_saved_recipes();
1033 std::set<recipe_id> candidates;
1034 for( const auto& [rid, r] : recipe_dict ) {
1035 if( r.never_learn || r.obsolete || mmd->recipes_categories.count( r.category ) == 0 ||
1036 saved_recipes.count( rid ) ||
1037 r.difficulty > mmd->recipes_level_max || r.difficulty < mmd->recipes_level_min ||
1038 ( r.has_flag( "SECRET" ) && !mmd->secret_recipes ) ) {
1039 continue;
1040 }
1041 candidates.emplace( rid );
1042 }
1043
1044 const int recipe_num = rng( 1, mmd->recipes_amount );
1045 for( int i = 0; i < recipe_num && !candidates.empty(); i++ ) {
1046 const recipe_id rid = random_entry_removed( candidates );
1047 if( saved_recipes.emplace( rid ).second ) {
1048 downloaded_recipes.emplace_back( rid );
1049 } else {
1050 debugmsg( "failed saving '%s' to '%s'", rid.str(), eink.display_name() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "1050", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "failed saving '%s' to '%s'", rid
.str(), eink.display_name());
1051 }
1052 }
1053 eink.set_saved_recipes( saved_recipes );
1054 }
1055}
1056
1057static void print_data_handling_tally( Character &who, int encrypted_cards, int photos, int songs,
1058 const std::vector<recipe_id> &recipes, int extended_photos, int monster_photos )
1059{
1060 if( !recipes.empty() ) {
1061 who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Downloaded %d %s: %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Downloaded %d %s: %s." ) ) ), recipes.size(),
1062 n_gettext( "recipe", "recipes", recipes.size() ),
1063 enumerate_as_string( recipes, []( const recipe_id & rid ) {
1064 return rid->result_name();
1065 } ) );
1066 }
1067 if( monster_photos > 0 ) {
1068 who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You have updated your monster collection." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You have updated your monster collection."
) ) ) );
1069 }
1070 if( extended_photos > 0 ) {
1071 who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You have downloaded your photos." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You have downloaded your photos."
) ) ) );
1072 }
1073 if( encrypted_cards > 0 ) {
1074 who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "%d %s appeared to be encrypted or corrupted." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%d %s appeared to be encrypted or corrupted."
) ) ),
1075 encrypted_cards, n_gettext( "card", "cards", encrypted_cards ) );
1076 }
1077 if( photos > 0 && who.is_avatar() ) {
1078 who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Downloaded %d new %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Downloaded %d new %s." ) ) ),
1079 photos, n_gettext( "photo", "photos", photos ) );
1080 }
1081 if( songs > 0 && who.is_avatar() ) {
1082 who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Downloaded %d new %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Downloaded %d new %s." ) ) ),
1083 songs, n_gettext( "song", "songs", songs ) );
1084 }
1085 if( !( photos || songs || monster_photos || extended_photos || !recipes.empty() ) ) {
1086 who.add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "No new data has been discovered." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "No new data has been discovered."
) ) ) );
1087 }
1088}
1089
1090void data_handling_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &act, Character &p )
1091{
1092 print_data_handling_tally( p, encrypted_cards, downloaded_photos, downloaded_songs,
1093 downloaded_recipes, downloaded_extended_photos, downloaded_monster_photos );
1094 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You stop downloading data after %d %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You stop downloading data after %d %s."
) ) ),
1095 handled_cards, n_gettext( "card", "cards", handled_cards ) );
1096 act.set_to_null();
1097}
1098
1099void data_handling_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &p )
1100{
1101 print_data_handling_tally( p, encrypted_cards, downloaded_photos, downloaded_songs,
1102 downloaded_recipes, downloaded_extended_photos, downloaded_monster_photos );
1103 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You finish downloading data from %d %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You finish downloading data from %d %s."
) ) ),
1104 handled_cards, n_gettext( "card", "cards", handled_cards ) );
1105 act.set_to_null();
1106}
1107
1108void data_handling_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
1109{
1110 jsout.start_object();
1111 jsout.member( "recorder", recorder );
1112 jsout.member( "targets", targets );
1113 jsout.member( "time_until_next_action", time_until_next_card );
1114 jsout.member( "handled_cards", handled_cards );
1115 jsout.member( "encrypted_cards", encrypted_cards );
1116 jsout.member( "downloaded_photos", downloaded_photos );
1117 jsout.member( "downloaded_songs", downloaded_songs );
1118 jsout.member( "downloaded_recipes", downloaded_recipes );
1119 jsout.member( "downloaded_extended_photos", downloaded_extended_photos );
1120 jsout.member( "downloaded_monster_photos", downloaded_monster_photos );
1121 jsout.end_object();
1122}
1123
1124std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> data_handling_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
1125{
1126 data_handling_activity_actor actor;
1127 JsonObject jsobj = jsin.get_object();
1128 jsobj.read( "recorder", actor.recorder );
1129 jsobj.read( "targets", actor.targets );
1130 jsobj.read( "time_until_next_action", actor.time_until_next_card );
1131 jsobj.read( "handled_cards", actor.handled_cards );
1132 jsobj.read( "encrypted_cards", actor.encrypted_cards );
1133 jsobj.read( "downloaded_photos", actor.downloaded_photos );
1134 jsobj.read( "downloaded_songs", actor.downloaded_songs );
1135 jsobj.read( "downloaded_recipes", actor.downloaded_recipes );
1136 jsobj.read( "downloaded_extended_photos", actor.downloaded_extended_photos );
1137 jsobj.read( "downloaded_monster_photos", actor.downloaded_monster_photos );
1138 return actor.clone();
1139}
1140
1141void hotwire_car_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
1142{
1143 act.moves_total = moves_total;
1144 act.moves_left = moves_total;
1145}
1146
1147void hotwire_car_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
1148{
1149 map &here = get_map();
1150 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
1151 bool lost = !here.veh_at( here.getlocal( target ) ).has_value();
1152 if( lost ) {
1153 act.set_to_null();
1154 debugmsg( "Lost ACT_HOTWIRE_CAR target vehicle" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "1154", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Lost ACT_HOTWIRE_CAR target vehicle"
);
1155 }
1156 if( calendar::once_every( 5_minutes ) ) {
1157 who.practice( skill_mechanics, 1, 2, true );
1158 }
1159 }
1160}
1161
1162void hotwire_car_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
1163{
1164 act.set_to_null();
1165
1166 map &here = get_map();
1167 const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( here.getlocal( target ) );
1168 if( !vp ) {
1169 debugmsg( "Lost ACT_HOTWIRE_CAR target vehicle" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "1169", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Lost ACT_HOTWIRE_CAR target vehicle"
);
1170 return;
1171 }
1172 vehicle &veh = vp->vehicle();
1173
1174 int skill = round( who.get_average_skill_level( skill_mechanics ) );
1175 if( skill > rng( 1, 6 ) ) {
1176 // Success
1177 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You found the wire that starts the engine." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You found the wire that starts the engine."
) ) ) );
1178 veh.is_locked = false;
1179 } else if( skill > rng( 0, 4 ) ) {
1180 // Soft fail
1181 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You found a wire that looks like the right one." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You found a wire that looks like the right one."
) ) ) );
1182 veh.is_alarm_on = veh.has_security_working();
1183 veh.is_locked = false;
1184 } else if( !veh.is_alarm_on ) {
1185 // Hard fail
1186 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "The red wire always starts the engine, doesn't it?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The red wire always starts the engine, doesn't it?"
) ) ) );
1187 veh.is_alarm_on = veh.has_security_working();
1188 } else {
1189 // Already failed
1190 who.add_msg_if_player(
1191 _( "By process of elimination, you found the wire that starts the engine." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "By process of elimination, you found the wire that starts the engine."
) ) ) );
1192 veh.is_locked = false;
1193 }
1194}
1195
1196void hotwire_car_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
1197{
1198 jsout.start_object();
1199
1200 jsout.member( "target", target );
1201 jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
1202
1203 jsout.end_object();
1204}
1205
1206std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> hotwire_car_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
1207{
1208 hotwire_car_activity_actor actor( 0, tripoint_zero );
1209
1210 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
1211
1212 data.read( "target", actor.target );
1213 data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
1214
1215 return actor.clone();
1216}
1217
1218void hacksaw_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &/*who*/ )
1219{
1220 const map &here = get_map();
1221 int moves_before_quality;
1222
1223 if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
1224 const furn_id furn_type = here.furn( target );
1225 if( !furn_type->hacksaw->valid() ) {
1226 if( !testing ) {
1227 debugmsg( "%s hacksaw is invalid", furn_type.id().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "1227", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s hacksaw is invalid", furn_type
.id().str());
1228 }
1229 act.set_to_null();
1230 return;
1231 }
1232
1233 moves_before_quality = to_moves<int>( furn_type->hacksaw->duration() );
1234 } else if( !here.ter( target )->is_null() ) {
1235 const ter_id ter_type = here.ter( target );
1236 if( !ter_type->hacksaw->valid() ) {
1237 if( !testing ) {
1238 debugmsg( "%s hacksaw is invalid", ter_type.id().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "1238", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s hacksaw is invalid", ter_type
.id().str());
1239 }
1240 act.set_to_null();
1241 return;
1242 }
1243 moves_before_quality = to_moves<int>( ter_type->hacksaw->duration() );
1244 } else {
1245 if( !testing ) {
1246 debugmsg( "hacksaw activity called on invalid terrain" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "1246", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "hacksaw activity called on invalid terrain"
);
1247 }
1248 act.set_to_null();
1249 return;
1250 }
1251
1252 int qual = 0;
1253 if( type.has_value() ) {
1254 item veh_tool = item( type.value(), calendar::turn );
1255 for( const std::pair<const quality_id, int> &quality : type.value()->qualities ) {
1256 if( quality.first == qual_SAW_M ) {
1257 qual = quality.second;
1258 }
1259 }
1260 for( const std::pair<const quality_id, int> &quality : type.value()->charged_qualities ) {
1261 if( quality.first == qual_SAW_M ) {
1262 qual = std::max( qual, quality.second );
1263 }
1264 }
1265 } else {
1266 qual = tool->get_quality( qual_SAW_M );
1267 }
1268 if( qual < 2 ) {
1269 if( !testing ) {
1270 debugmsg( "Item %s with 'HACKSAW' use action requires SAW_M quality of at least 2.",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "1271", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Item %s with 'HACKSAW' use action requires SAW_M quality of at least 2."
, tool->typeId().c_str())
1271 tool->typeId().c_str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "1271", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Item %s with 'HACKSAW' use action requires SAW_M quality of at least 2."
, tool->typeId().c_str());
1272 }
1273 act.set_to_null();
1274 return;
1275 }
1276
1277 //Speed of hacksaw action is the SAW_M quality over 2, 2 being the hacksaw level.
1278 //3 makes the speed one-and-a-half times, and the total moves 66% of hacksaw. 4 is twice the speed, 50% the moves, etc, 5 is 2.5 times the speed, 40% the original time
1279 //done because it's easy to code, and diminising returns on cutting speed make sense as the limiting factor becomes aligning the tool and controlling it instead of the actual cutting
1280 act.moves_total = moves_before_quality / ( qual / 2 );
1281 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACTIVITY, "%s moves_total: %d", act.id().str(), act.moves_total )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACTIVITY ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "%s moves_total: %d"
, act.id().str(), act.moves_total ) ) ); } } while( false );
1282 act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
1283}
1284
1285void hacksaw_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &/*act*/, Character &who )
1286{
1287 std::string method = "HACKSAW";
1288
1289 if( !veh_pos.has_value() ) {
1290 if( tool->ammo_sufficient( &who, method ) ) {
1291 int ammo_consumed = tool->ammo_required();
1292 std::map<std::string, int>::const_iterator iter = tool->type->ammo_scale.find( method );
1293 if( iter != tool->type->ammo_scale.end() ) {
1294 ammo_consumed *= iter->second;
1295 }
1296
1297 tool->ammo_consume( ammo_consumed, tool.position(), &who );
1298 sfx::play_activity_sound( "tool", "hacksaw", sfx::get_heard_volume( target ) );
1299 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
1300 //~ Sound of a metal sawing tool at work!
1301 sounds::sound( target, 15, sounds::sound_t::destructive_activity, _( "grnd grnd grnd" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "grnd grnd grnd" ) ) ) );
1302 }
1303 } else {
1304 if( who.is_avatar() ) {
1305 who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %1$s ran out of charges." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %1$s ran out of charges."
) ) ), tool->tname() );
1306 } else { // who.is_npc()
1307 add_msg_if_player_sees( who.pos(), _( "%1$s %2$s ran out of charges." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s %2$s ran out of charges."
) ) ), who.disp_name( false,
1308 true ), tool->tname() );
1309 }
1310 who.cancel_activity();
1311 }
1312 } else {
1313 map &here = get_map();
1314 const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( veh_pos.value() );
1315 if( !vp ) {
1316 debugmsg( "Lost ACT_HACKSAW vehicle tool" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "1316", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Lost ACT_HACKSAW vehicle tool"
);
1317 return;
1318 }
1319 vehicle &veh = vp->vehicle();
1320 if( vehicle::use_vehicle_tool( veh, veh_pos.value(), type.value(), true ) ) {
1321 sfx::play_activity_sound( "tool", "hacksaw", sfx::get_heard_volume( target ) );
1322 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
1323 //~ Sound of a metal sawing tool at work!
1324 sounds::sound( target, 15, sounds::sound_t::destructive_activity, _( "grnd grnd grnd" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "grnd grnd grnd" ) ) ) );
1325 }
1326 } else {
1327 if( who.is_avatar() ) {
1328 who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %1$s ran out of charges." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %1$s ran out of charges."
) ) ), type.value()->nname( 1 ) );
1329 } else { // who.is_npc()
1330 add_msg_if_player_sees( who.pos(), _( "%1$s %2$s ran out of charges." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s %2$s ran out of charges."
) ) ), who.disp_name( false,
1331 true ), type.value()->nname( 1 ) );
1332 }
1333 who.cancel_activity();
1334 }
1335 }
1336}
1337
1338void hacksaw_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
1339{
1340 map &here = get_map();
1341 const activity_data_common *data;
1342
1343 if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
1344 const furn_id furn_type = here.furn( target );
1345 if( !furn_type->hacksaw->valid() ) {
1346 if( !testing ) {
1347 debugmsg( "%s hacksaw is invalid", furn_type.id().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "1347", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s hacksaw is invalid", furn_type
.id().str());
1348 }
1349 act.set_to_null();
1350 return;
1351 }
1352
1353 const furn_str_id new_furn = furn_type->hacksaw->result();
1354 if( !new_furn.is_valid() ) {
1355 if( !testing ) {
1356 debugmsg( "hacksaw furniture: %s invalid furniture", new_furn.str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "1356", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "hacksaw furniture: %s invalid furniture"
, new_furn.str());
1357 }
1358 act.set_to_null();
1359 return;
1360 }
1361
1362 data = static_cast<const activity_data_common *>( &*furn_type->hacksaw );
1363 here.furn_set( target, new_furn );
1364 } else if( !here.ter( target )->is_null() ) {
1365 const ter_id ter_type = here.ter( target );
1366 if( !ter_type->hacksaw->valid() ) {
1367 if( !testing ) {
1368 debugmsg( "%s hacksaw is invalid", ter_type.id().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "1368", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s hacksaw is invalid", ter_type
.id().str());
1369 }
1370 act.set_to_null();
1371 return;
1372 }
1373
1374 const ter_str_id new_ter = ter_type->hacksaw->result();
1375 if( !new_ter.is_valid() ) {
1376 if( !testing ) {
1377 debugmsg( "hacksaw terrain: %s invalid terrain", new_ter.str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "1377", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "hacksaw terrain: %s invalid terrain"
, new_ter.str());
1378 }
1379 act.set_to_null();
1380 return;
1381 }
1382
1383 data = static_cast<const activity_data_common *>( &*ter_type->hacksaw );
1384 here.ter_set( target, new_ter );
1385 } else {
1386 if( !testing ) {
1387 debugmsg( "hacksaw activity finished on invalid terrain" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "1387", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "hacksaw activity finished on invalid terrain"
);
1388 }
1389 act.set_to_null();
1390 return;
1391 }
1392
1393 for( const activity_byproduct &byproduct : data->byproducts() ) {
1394 const int amount = byproduct.roll();
1395 if( byproduct.item->count_by_charges() ) {
1396 item byproduct_item( byproduct.item, calendar::turn, amount );
1397 here.add_item_or_charges( target, byproduct_item );
1398 } else {
1399 item byproduct_item( byproduct.item, calendar::turn );
1400 for( int i = 0; i < amount; ++i ) {
1401 here.add_item_or_charges( target, byproduct_item );
1402 }
1403 }
1404 }
1405
1406 if( !data->message().empty() ) {
1407 who.add_msg_if_player( m_info, data->message().translated() );
1408 }
1409
1410 act.set_to_null();
1411}
1412
1413//TODO: Make hacksawing resumable with different tools with the same SAW_M quality.
1414//Potentially make it possible to resume with different SAW_M quality and recalculate time to completion partway through.
1415//This is really not a big deal, and will cost a few minutes of in game time and part of a medium battery charge at worst as someone accidentally cancels the activity_actor and has to start again
1416//If a few minutes are life and death, sawing metal may not be the wise choice in the first place.
1417bool hacksaw_activity_actor::can_resume_with_internal( const activity_actor &other,
1418 const Character &/*who*/ ) const
1419{
1420 const hacksaw_activity_actor &actor = static_cast<const hacksaw_activity_actor &>
1421 ( other );
1422 return actor.target == target && ( ( veh_pos.has_value() &&
1423 veh_pos.value() == actor.veh_pos.value_or( tripoint_max ) ) || actor.tool.operator == ( tool ) );
1424}
1425
1426void hacksaw_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
1427{
1428 jsout.start_object();
1429 jsout.member( "target", target );
1430 jsout.member( "tool", tool );
1431 jsout.member( "type", type );
1432 jsout.member( "veh_pos", veh_pos );
1433 jsout.end_object();
1434}
1435
1436std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> hacksaw_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
1437{
1438 hacksaw_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
1439 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
1440 data.read( "target", actor.target );
1441 data.read( "tool", actor.tool );
1442 data.read( "type", actor.type );
1443 data.read( "veh_pos", actor.veh_pos );
1444 return actor.clone();
1445}
1446
1447static std::string enumerate_ints_to_string( const std::vector<int> &vec )
1448{
1449 return enumerate_as_string( vec, []( const int &it ) {
1450 return std::to_string( it );
1451 } );
1452}
1453
1454bikerack_racking_activity_actor::bikerack_racking_activity_actor( const vehicle &parent_vehicle,
1455 const vehicle &racked_vehicle, const std::vector<int> &racks )
1456 : racks( racks )
1457{
1458 parent_vehicle_pos = parent_vehicle.bub_part_pos( 0 );
1459 racked_vehicle_pos = racked_vehicle.bub_part_pos( 0 );
1460}
1461
1462void bikerack_racking_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
1463{
1464 act.moves_total = moves_total;
1465 act.moves_left = moves_total;
1466}
1467
1468void bikerack_racking_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character & )
1469{
1470 map &here = get_map();
1471
1472 const optional_vpart_position ovp_parent = here.veh_at( parent_vehicle_pos );
1473 if( !ovp_parent ) {
1474 debugmsg( "racking actor lost parent vehicle at %s", parent_vehicle_pos.to_string() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "1474", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "racking actor lost parent vehicle at %s"
, parent_vehicle_pos.to_string());
1475 act.set_to_null();
1476 return;
1477 }
1478
1479 const optional_vpart_position ovp_racked = here.veh_at( racked_vehicle_pos );
1480 if( !ovp_racked ) {
1481 debugmsg( "racking actor lost racked vehicle at %s", racked_vehicle_pos.to_string() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "1481", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "racking actor lost racked vehicle at %s"
, racked_vehicle_pos.to_string());
1482 act.set_to_null();
1483 return;
1484 }
1485
1486 vehicle &parent_veh = ovp_parent->vehicle();
1487 vehicle &racked_veh = ovp_racked->vehicle();
1488
1489 if( !parent_veh.merge_rackable_vehicle( &racked_veh, racks ) ) {
1490 debugmsg( "racking actor failed: failed racking %s on %s, racks: [%s].",realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "1491", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "racking actor failed: failed racking %s on %s, racks: [%s]."
, racked_veh.name, parent_veh.name, enumerate_ints_to_string(
racks ))
1491 racked_veh.name, parent_veh.name, enumerate_ints_to_string( racks ) )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "1491", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "racking actor failed: failed racking %s on %s, racks: [%s]."
, racked_veh.name, parent_veh.name, enumerate_ints_to_string(
racks ));
1492 }
1493 act.set_to_null();
1494}
1495
1496void bikerack_racking_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
1497{
1498 jsout.start_object();
1499 jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
1500 jsout.member( "parent_vehicle_pos", parent_vehicle_pos );
1501 jsout.member( "racked_vehicle_pos", racked_vehicle_pos );
1502 jsout.member( "racks", racks );
1503 jsout.end_object();
1504}
1505
1506std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> bikerack_racking_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
1507{
1508 bikerack_racking_activity_actor actor;
1509 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
1510 data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
1511 data.read( "parent_vehicle_pos", actor.parent_vehicle_pos );
1512 data.read( "racked_vehicle_pos", actor.racked_vehicle_pos );
1513 data.read( "racks", actor.racks );
1514
1515 return actor.clone();
1516}
1517
1518void glide_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &you )
1519{
1520 tripoint heading;
1521 if( jump_direction == 0 ) {
1522 heading = tripoint_south;
1523 }
1524 if( jump_direction == 1 ) {
1525 heading = tripoint_south_west;
1526 }
1527 if( jump_direction == 2 ) {
1528 heading = tripoint_west;
1529 }
1530 if( jump_direction == 3 ) {
1531 heading = tripoint_north_west;
1532 }
1533 if( jump_direction == 4 ) {
1534 heading = tripoint_north;
1535 }
1536 if( jump_direction == 5 ) {
1537 heading = tripoint_north_east;
1538 }
1539 if( jump_direction == 6 ) {
1540 heading = tripoint_east;
1541 }
1542 if( jump_direction == 7 ) {
1543 heading = tripoint_south_east;
1544 }
1545 const tripoint_abs_ms newpos = you.get_location() + heading;
1546 const tripoint_bub_ms checknewpos = you.pos_bub() + heading;
1547 if( get_map().tr_at( you.pos() ) != tr_ledge || heading == tripoint_zero ) {
1548 you.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good,
1549 _( "You come to a gentle landing." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You come to a gentle landing."
) ) ),
1550 _( "<npcname> comes to a gentle landing." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> comes to a gentle landing."
) ) ) );
1551 you.remove_effect( effect_gliding );
1552 you.gravity_check();
1553 act.set_to_null();
1554 return;
1555 } // Have we crashed into a wall?
1556 if( get_map().impassable( checknewpos ) ) {
1557 you.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
1558 _( "You collide with %s, bringing an abrupt halt to your glide." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You collide with %s, bringing an abrupt halt to your glide."
) ) ),
1559 _( "<npcname> collides with %s, bringing an abrupt halt to their glide." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> collides with %s, bringing an abrupt halt to their glide."
) ) ),
1560 get_map().tername( checknewpos.raw() ) );
1561 you.remove_effect( effect_gliding );
1562 you.gravity_check();
1563 act.set_to_null();
1564 return;
1565 }
1566 if( !you.can_fly() ) {
1567 you.remove_effect( effect_gliding );
1568 you.gravity_check();
1569 act.set_to_null();
1570 return;
1571 }
1572 Creature *creature_ahead = get_creature_tracker().creature_at( newpos );
1573 if( creature_ahead && creature_ahead->get_size() >= creature_size::medium &&
1574 you.get_size() >= creature_size::medium ) {
1575 // Zombies are too stupid to avoid midair collision
1576 if( !you.dodge_check( 15, true ) || ( !creature_ahead->in_species( species_ZOMBIE ) &&
1577 !creature_ahead->dodge_check( 15, true ) ) ) {
1578 you.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_bad,
1579 _( "You collide with %s, bringing an abrupt halt to your glide." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You collide with %s, bringing an abrupt halt to your glide."
) ) ),
1580 _( "<npcname> collides with %s, bringing an abrupt halt to their glide." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> collides with %s, bringing an abrupt halt to their glide."
) ) ),
1581 creature_ahead->disp_name() );
1582 if( creature_ahead->get_size() < creature_size::huge ) {
1583 creature_ahead->add_effect( effect_downed, 2_turns, false );
1584 }
1585 you.remove_effect( effect_gliding );
1586 you.gravity_check();
1587 act.set_to_null();
1588 return;
1589 }
1590 you.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good,
1591 _( "You deftly maneuver around %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You deftly maneuver around %s."
) ) ),
1592 _( "<npcname> deftly maneuvers around %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> deftly maneuvers around %s."
) ) ), creature_ahead->disp_name() );
1593 }
1594 you.move_to( newpos );
1595 moved_tiles ++;
1596 if( moved_tiles >= glide_distance ) {
1597 g->vertical_move( -1, false, false );
1598 moved_tiles = 0;
1599 }
1600 you.moves -= 50;
1601 get_map().update_visibility_cache( you.pos().z );
1602 get_map().update_visibility_cache( you.pos().x );
1603 get_map().update_visibility_cache( you.pos().y );
1604 if( you.is_avatar() ) {
1605 g->update_map( you );
1606 }
1607}
1608
1609glide_activity_actor::glide_activity_actor( Character *you, int jump_direction, int glide_distance )
1610 : jump_direction( jump_direction ), glide_distance( glide_distance )
1611{
1612 you->add_effect( effect_gliding, 1_turns, true );
1613 tripoint heading;
1614 if( jump_direction == 0 ) {
1615 heading = tripoint_south;
1616 }
1617 if( jump_direction == 1 ) {
1618 heading = tripoint_south_west;
1619 }
1620 if( jump_direction == 2 ) {
1621 heading = tripoint_west;
1622 }
1623 if( jump_direction == 3 ) {
1624 heading = tripoint_north_west;
1625 }
1626 if( jump_direction == 4 ) {
1627 heading = tripoint_north;
1628 }
1629 if( jump_direction == 5 ) {
1630 heading = tripoint_north_east;
1631 }
1632 if( jump_direction == 6 ) {
1633 heading = tripoint_east;
1634 }
1635 if( jump_direction == 7 ) {
1636 heading = tripoint_south_west;
1637 }
1638}
1639
1640void glide_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
1641{
1642 jsout.start_object();
1643
1644 jsout.member( "moved_tiles", moved_tiles );
1645 jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
1646 jsout.member( "jump_direction", jump_direction );
1647 jsout.member( "glide_distance", glide_distance );
1648
1649 jsout.end_object();
1650}
1651
1652std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> glide_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
1653{
1654 glide_activity_actor actor;
1655 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
1656 data.read( "moved_tiles", actor.moved_tiles );
1657 data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
1658 data.read( "jump_direction", actor.jump_direction );
1659 data.read( "glide_distance", actor.glide_distance );
1660 return actor.clone();
1661}
1662void glide_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
1663{
1664 act.moves_total = moves_total;
1665 act.moves_left = moves_total;
1666}
1667
1668void glide_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &you )
1669{
1670 g->update_map( you );
1671 you.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good,
1672 _( "You come to a gentle landing." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You come to a gentle landing."
) ) ),
1673 _( "<npcname> comes to a gentle landing." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> comes to a gentle landing."
) ) ) );
1674 you.remove_effect( effect_gliding );
1675 you.gravity_check();
1676 act.set_to_null();
1677}
1678
1679bikerack_unracking_activity_actor::bikerack_unracking_activity_actor( const vehicle &parent_vehicle,
1680 const std::vector<int> &parts, const std::vector<int> &racks )
1681 : parts( parts ), racks( racks )
1682{
1683 parent_vehicle_pos = parent_vehicle.bub_part_pos( 0 );
1684}
1685
1686void bikerack_unracking_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
1687{
1688 act.moves_total = moves_total;
1689 act.moves_left = moves_total;
1690}
1691
1692void bikerack_unracking_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character & )
1693{
1694 const optional_vpart_position ovp = get_map().veh_at( parent_vehicle_pos );
1695 if( !ovp ) {
1696 debugmsg( "unracking actor lost vehicle." )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "1696", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "unracking actor lost vehicle."
);
1697 act.set_to_null();
1698 return;
1699 }
1700
1701 vehicle &parent_vehicle = ovp->vehicle();
1702
1703 if( !parent_vehicle.remove_carried_vehicle( parts, racks ) ) {
1704 debugmsg( "unracking actor failed on %s, parts: [%s], racks: [%s]", parent_vehicle.name,realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "1705", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "unracking actor failed on %s, parts: [%s], racks: [%s]"
, parent_vehicle.name, enumerate_ints_to_string( parts ), enumerate_ints_to_string
( racks ))
1705 enumerate_ints_to_string( parts ), enumerate_ints_to_string( racks ) )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "1705", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "unracking actor failed on %s, parts: [%s], racks: [%s]"
, parent_vehicle.name, enumerate_ints_to_string( parts ), enumerate_ints_to_string
( racks ));
1706 }
1707 act.set_to_null();
1708}
1709
1710void bikerack_unracking_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
1711{
1712 jsout.start_object();
1713 jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
1714 jsout.member( "parent_vehicle_pos", parent_vehicle_pos );
1715 jsout.member( "parts", parts );
1716 jsout.member( "racks", racks );
1717 jsout.end_object();
1718}
1719
1720std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> bikerack_unracking_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
1721{
1722 bikerack_unracking_activity_actor actor;
1723 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
1724 data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
1725 data.read( "parent_vehicle_pos", actor.parent_vehicle_pos );
1726 data.read( "parts", actor.parts );
1727 data.read( "racks", actor.racks );
1728
1729 return actor.clone();
1730}
1731
1732static bool is_valid_book( const item_location &book )
1733{
1734 // If book is invalid, perhaps we lost it during the activity
1735 // If book is valid but not a book, it's probably due to a bug where
1736 // `item_location` points to the wrong item after a save/load cycle.
1737 // In both cases cancel activity to avoid segfault.
1738 return book && book->is_book();
1739}
1740
1741static bool cancel_if_book_invalid(
1742 player_activity &act, const item_location &book, const Character &who )
1743{
1744 if( !is_valid_book( book ) ) {
1745 who.add_msg_player_or_npc(
1746 _( "You no longer have the book!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You no longer have the book!"
) ) ),
1747 _( "<npcname> no longer has the book!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> no longer has the book!"
) ) ) );
1748 act.set_to_null();
1749 return true;
1750 }
1751 return false;
1752}
1753
1754void read_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &who )
1755{
1756 if( cancel_if_book_invalid( act, book, who ) ) {
1757 return;
1758 }
1759
1760 // book item_location must be of type character
1761 // or else there will be item_location errors while loading
1762 if( book.where() != item_location::type::character ) {
1763 book = item_location( who, book.get_item() );
1764 }
1765
1766 using_ereader = !!ereader;
1767
1768 bktype = book->type->use_methods.count( "MA_MANUAL" ) ?
1769 book_type::martial_art : book_type::normal;
1770
1771 // push copy of book for focus calculation
1772 // avatar::update_mental_focus and avatar::calc_focus_equilibrium
1773 act.targets.push_back( book );
1774
1775 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_READ, "reading time = %s",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_READ ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "reading time = %s"
, to_string_writable( time_duration::from_moves( moves_total )
) ) ) ); } } while( false )
1776 to_string_writable( time_duration::from_moves( moves_total ) ) )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_READ ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "reading time = %s"
, to_string_writable( time_duration::from_moves( moves_total )
) ) ) ); } } while( false );
1777
1778 // starting the activity should cost a charge to boot up the ebook app
1779 if( using_ereader ) {
1780 ereader->ammo_consume( ereader->ammo_required(), who.pos(), &who );
1781 }
1782
1783 act.moves_total = moves_total;
1784 act.moves_left = moves_total;
1785}
1786
1787void read_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
1788{
1789 if( cancel_if_book_invalid( act, book, who ) ) {
1790 return;
1791 }
1792
1793 if( !bktype.has_value() ) {
1794 bktype = book->type->use_methods.count( "MA_MANUAL" ) ?
1795 book_type::martial_art : book_type::normal;
1796 }
1797
1798 if( who.fine_detail_vision_mod() > 4 ) {
1799 // It got too dark during the process of reading, bail out.
1800 act.set_to_null();
1801 who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "It's too dark to read!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "It's too dark to read!" ) ) ) );
1802 return;
1803 }
1804
1805 if( bktype.value() == book_type::martial_art && one_in( 3 ) ) {
1806 who.burn_energy_all( -1 );
1807 }
1808
1809 // do not spam the message log
1810 if( calendar::once_every( 5_minutes ) ) {
1811 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_READ, "%s reading time = %s",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_READ ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "%s reading time = %s"
, who.name, to_string_writable( time_duration::from_moves( act
.moves_left ) ) ) ) ); } } while( false )
1812 who.name, to_string_writable( time_duration::from_moves( act.moves_left ) ) )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_READ ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "%s reading time = %s"
, who.name, to_string_writable( time_duration::from_moves( act
.moves_left ) ) ) ) ); } } while( false );
1813 }
1814
1815 if( using_ereader && !ereader ) {
1816 who.add_msg_player_or_npc(
1817 _( "You no longer have the e-book!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You no longer have the e-book!"
) ) ),
1818 _( "<npcname> no longer has the e-book!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> no longer has the e-book!"
) ) ) );
1819 who.cancel_activity();
1820 return;
1821 }
1822
1823 if( using_ereader && !ereader->ammo_sufficient( &who ) ) {
1824 add_msg_if_player_sees(
1825 who,
1826 _( "%1$s %2$s ran out of batteries." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s %2$s ran out of batteries."
) ) ),
1827 who.disp_name( true, true ),
1828 item::nname( ereader->typeId() ) );
1829 who.cancel_activity();
1830 return;
1831 }
1832
1833 if( using_ereader && calendar::once_every( 5_minutes ) ) {
1834 /** Expected battery life while reading with common ereaders:
1835 integrated_ar - implant = potentially infinite
1836 ar_glasses_advanced - max 300 charges from disposable light battery = 25 hours of reading
1837 eink_tablet_pc - max 300 charges from disposable light battery = 25 hours of reading
1838 laptop - max 1200 charges from disposable medium battery = 100 hours of reading
1839 smart_phone - 120 UPS charges = 10 hours of reading
1840 */
1841 ereader->ammo_consume( ereader->ammo_required(), who.pos(), &who );
1842 }
1843}
1844
1845void read_activity_actor::read_book( Character &learner,
1846 const cata::value_ptr<islot_book> &islotbook,
1847 SkillLevel &skill_level, double penalty )
1848{
1849 const int originalSkillLevel = skill_level.knowledgeLevel();
1850
1851 // Calculate experience gained
1852 /** @EFFECT_INT increases reading comprehension */
1853 // Enhanced Memory Banks modestly boosts experience
1854 int min_ex = std::max( 1, to_minutes<int>( islotbook->time ) / 10 + learner.get_int() / 4 );
1855 int max_ex = to_minutes<int>( islotbook->time ) / 5 + learner.get_int() / 2 - originalSkillLevel;
1856
1857 min_ex = learner.enchantment_cache->modify_value( enchant_vals::mod::READING_EXP, min_ex );
1858
1859 min_ex = std::lround( learner.adjust_for_focus( min_ex ) );
1860 max_ex = std::lround( learner.adjust_for_focus( max_ex ) );
1861
1862 max_ex = clamp( max_ex, 2, 10 );
1863 max_ex = std::max( min_ex, max_ex );
1864
1865 min_ex *= ( originalSkillLevel + 1 ) * penalty;
1866 min_ex = std::max( min_ex, 1 );
1867
1868 max_ex *= ( originalSkillLevel + 1 ) * penalty;
1869 max_ex = std::max( min_ex, max_ex );
1870
1871 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_READ, "%s read exp: min_ex %d; max_ex %d",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_READ ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "%s read exp: min_ex %d; max_ex %d"
, learner.disp_name(), min_ex, max_ex ) ) ); } } while( false
)
1872 learner.disp_name(), min_ex, max_ex )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_READ ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "%s read exp: min_ex %d; max_ex %d"
, learner.disp_name(), min_ex, max_ex ) ) ); } } while( false
);
1873 skill_level.readBook( min_ex, max_ex, islotbook->level );
1874}
1875
1876bool read_activity_actor::player_read( avatar &you )
1877{
1878 if( !you.has_identified( book->typeId() ) ) {
1879 you.identify( *book );
1880 return true;
1881 }
1882
1883 std::vector<std::string> fail_messages;
1884 const Character *reader = you.get_book_reader( *book, fail_messages );
1885 if( reader == nullptr ) {
1886 // We can't read, and neither can our followers
1887 for( const std::string &reason : fail_messages ) {
1888 add_msg( m_bad, reason );
1889 }
1890 return true;
1891 }
1892
1893 const cata::value_ptr<islot_book> &islotbook = book->type->book;
1894 const skill_id &skill = islotbook->skill;
1895
1896 std::vector<std::string> little_learned;
1897 std::vector<std::string> cant_learn;
1898
1899 std::vector<Character *> learners;
1900 for( Character *learner : you.get_crafting_helpers() ) {
1901 const book_mastery mastery = learner->get_book_mastery( *book );
1902 const bool morale_req = learner->fun_to_read( *book ) || learner->has_morale_to_read();
1903
1904 if( learner->is_deaf() && learner != reader ) {
1905 continue;
1906 }
1907
1908 if( // fun readers
1909 ( mastery == book_mastery::MASTERED && learner->fun_to_read( *book ) )
1910 // reading for experience
1911 || ( mastery == book_mastery::LEARNING && morale_req )
1912 ) {
1913 learners.push_back( learner );
1914 }
1915 }
1916
1917 // caller should check if player
1918 // can understand the book
1919 learners.push_back( you.as_character() );
1920
1921 // Characters can move while learning from a book
1922 // Check ID of all learners to avoid
1923 // getting stuck in an infinite loop
1924 bool learner_left = true;
1925 for( Character *learner : learners ) {
1926
1927 double penalty = 1.0;
1928
1929 const bool reading_for_skill =
1930 learner->get_book_mastery( *book ) == book_mastery::LEARNING;
1931
1932 const int book_fun = learner->book_fun_for( *book, *learner );
1933 if( book_fun != 0 ) {
1934 // Fun bonus is no longer calculated here.
1935 learner->add_morale( MORALE_BOOK,
1936 book_fun * 5, book_fun * 15,
1937 1_hours, 30_minutes, true,
1938 book->type );
1939 }
1940
1941 book->mark_chapter_as_read( *learner );
1942 if( reading_for_skill ) {
1943 if( !learner->is_avatar() ) {
1944 const time_duration read_time = you.time_to_read( *book, *reader, learner );
1945 penalty = static_cast<double>( moves_total ) / to_moves<int>( read_time );
1946 }
1947 } else {
1948 continue; // reading for fun
1949 }
1950
1951 if( skill &&
1952 learner->get_knowledge_level( skill ) < islotbook->level &&
1953 learner->get_skill_level_object( skill ).can_train() ) {
1954
1955 SkillLevel &skill_level = learner->get_skill_level_object( skill );
1956 std::string skill_name = skill.obj().name();
1957 const int originalSkillLevel = skill_level.knowledgeLevel();
1958
1959 read_book( *learner, islotbook, skill_level, penalty );
1960 const int newSkillLevel = skill_level.knowledgeLevel();
1961
1962 // levels up the skill
1963 if( newSkillLevel != originalSkillLevel ) {
1964 get_event_bus().send<event_type::gains_skill_level>(
1965 learner->getID(), skill, skill_level.knowledgeLevel() );
1966
1967 if( learner->is_avatar() ) {
1968 add_msg( m_good, _( "Your theoretical knowledge of %s increases to level %d." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your theoretical knowledge of %s increases to level %d."
) ) ), skill.obj().name(),
1969 originalSkillLevel + 1 );
1970 } else {
1971 add_msg( m_good, _( "%s increases their %s knowledge." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s increases their %s knowledge."
) ) ), learner->disp_name(),
1972 skill.obj().name() );
1973 }
1974
1975 if( learner->getID().get_value() == learner_id ) {
1976 continuous = false;
1977 }
1978
1979 } else {
1980 if( learner->is_avatar() ) {
1981 add_msg( m_info, _( "You learn a little about %s! (%d%%)" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You learn a little about %s! (%d%%)"
) ) ), skill_name,
1982 skill_level.knowledgeExperience() );
1983 } else {
1984 little_learned.push_back( learner->disp_name() );
1985 }
1986 }
1987
1988 if( ( skill_level == islotbook->level || !skill_level.can_train() ) ||
1989 ( learner->has_trait( trait_SCHIZOPHRENIC ) && !learner->has_effect( effect_took_thorazine ) &&
1990 one_in( 25 ) ) ) {
1991 if( learner->is_avatar() ) {
1992 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can no longer learn from %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can no longer learn from %s."
) ) ), book->type_name() );
1993 } else {
1994 cant_learn.push_back( learner->disp_name() );
1995 }
1996 }
1997 }
1998
1999 if( learner_left && learner->getID().get_value() == learner_id ) {
2000 learner_left = false;
2001 }
2002 } // end for all learners
2003
2004 if( little_learned.size() == 1 ) {
2005 add_msg( m_info, _( "%s learns a little about %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s learns a little about %s!"
) ) ), little_learned.begin()->c_str(),
2006 skill.obj().name() );
2007
2008 } else if( !little_learned.empty() ) {
2009 const std::string little_learned_msg = enumerate_as_string( little_learned );
2010 add_msg( m_info, _( "%s learn a little about %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s learn a little about %s!"
