) ) ), little_learned_msg, skill.obj().name() );
2011 }
2012
2013 if( !cant_learn.empty() ) {
2014 const std::string names = enumerate_as_string( cant_learn );
2015 add_msg( m_info, _( "%s can no longer learn from %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s can no longer learn from %s."
) ) ), names, book->type_name() );
2016 }
2017
2018 // read non-skill books only once
2019 if( learner_left || !skill ) {
2020 continuous = false;
2021 }
2022
2023 return false;
2024}
2025
2026bool read_activity_actor::player_readma( avatar &you )
2027{
2028 // NPCs can't learn martial arts from manuals (yet).
2029
2030 if( !you.has_identified( book->typeId() ) ) {
2031 you.identify( *book );
2032 return true;
2033 }
2034
2035 // std::map<std::string, use_function>::const_iterator
2036 auto mart_iter = book->type->use_methods.find( "MA_MANUAL" );
2037 if( mart_iter == book->type->use_methods.end() ) {
2038 debugmsg( "ACT_READ MARTIAL ARTS BOOK HAS NO MARTIAL ART" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "2038", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "ACT_READ MARTIAL ARTS BOOK HAS NO MARTIAL ART"
);
2039 return true;
2040 }
2041
2042 const matype_id style_to_learn = martial_art_learned_from( *book->type );
2043 skill_id skill_used = style_to_learn->primary_skill;
2044
2045 int difficulty = std::max( 1, style_to_learn->learn_difficulty );
2046 difficulty = std::max( 1, 20 + difficulty * 2 - you.get_knowledge_level( skill_used ) * 2 );
2047 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_READ, "Chance to learn one in: %d", difficulty )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_READ ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Chance to learn one in: %d"
, difficulty ) ) ); } } while( false );
2048
2049 if( one_in( difficulty ) ) {
2050 // learn martial art
2051 mart_iter->second.call( &you, *book, you.pos() );
2052 return true;
2053 } else if( continuous ) {
2054 switch( rng( 1, 5 ) ) {
2055 case 1:
2056 add_msg( m_info,
2057 _( "You train the moves according to the book, but can't get a grasp of the style, so you start from the beginning." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You train the moves according to the book, but can't get a grasp of the style, so you start from the beginning."
) ) ) );
2058 break;
2059 case 2:
2060 add_msg( m_info,
2061 _( "This martial art is not easy to grasp. You start training the moves from the beginning." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "This martial art is not easy to grasp. You start training the moves from the beginning."
) ) ) );
2062 break;
2063 case 3:
2064 add_msg( m_info,
2065 _( "You decide to read the manual and train even more. In martial arts, patience leads to mastery." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You decide to read the manual and train even more. In martial arts, patience leads to mastery."
) ) ) );
2066 break;
2067 case 4: // intentionally empty
2068 case 5:
2069 add_msg( m_info, _( "You try again. This training will finally pay off." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You try again. This training will finally pay off."
) ) ) );
2070 break;
2071 }
2072 } else {
2073 add_msg( m_info, _( "You train for a while." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You train for a while." ) ) ) );
2074 }
2075 return false;
2076}
2077
2078bool read_activity_actor::npc_read( npc &learner )
2079{
2080 const cata::value_ptr<islot_book> &islotbook = book->type->book;
2081 const skill_id &skill = islotbook->skill;
2082
2083 // NPCs don't need to identify the book or learn recipes yet.
2084 // NPCs don't read to other NPCs yet.
2085 const bool display_messages = learner.get_fac_id() == faction_your_followers &&
2086 get_player_character().sees( learner );
2087
2088 const int book_fun = learner.book_fun_for( *book, learner );
2089 if( book_fun != 0 ) {
2090 // Fun bonus is no longer calculated here.
2091 learner.add_morale( MORALE_BOOK,
2092 book_fun * 5, book_fun * 15,
2093 1_hours, 30_minutes, true,
2094 book->type );
2095 }
2096
2097 book->mark_chapter_as_read( learner );
2098
2099 if( skill &&
2100 learner.get_knowledge_level( skill ) < islotbook->level &&
2101 learner.get_skill_level_object( skill ).can_train() ) {
2102
2103 SkillLevel &skill_level = learner.get_skill_level_object( skill );
2104 std::string skill_name = skill.obj().name();
2105 const int originalSkillLevel = skill_level.knowledgeLevel();
2106
2107 read_book( learner, islotbook, skill_level, 1.0 );
2108
2109 const int newSkillLevel = skill_level.knowledgeLevel();
2110 if( newSkillLevel != originalSkillLevel ) {
2111 get_event_bus().send<event_type::gains_skill_level>(
2112 learner.getID(), skill, skill_level.knowledgeLevel() );
2113
2114 if( display_messages ) {
2115 add_msg( m_good, _( "%s increases their %s level." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s increases their %s level."
) ) ), learner.disp_name(),
2116 skill_name );
2117 }
2118
2119 continuous = false;
2120
2121 } else if( display_messages ) {
2122 add_msg( m_info, _( "%s learns a little about %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s learns a little about %s!"
) ) ), learner.disp_name(),
2123 skill_name );
2124 }
2125
2126 if( display_messages &&
2127 ( ( skill_level == islotbook->level || !skill_level.can_train() ) ||
2128 ( learner.has_trait( trait_SCHIZOPHRENIC ) && !learner.has_effect( effect_took_thorazine ) &&
2129 one_in( 25 ) ) ) ) {
2130 add_msg( m_info, _( "%s can no longer learn from %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s can no longer learn from %s."
) ) ), learner.disp_name(),
2131 book->type_name() );
2132 }
2133
2134 } else if( display_messages && skill ) {
2135 add_msg( m_info, _( "%s can no longer learn from %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s can no longer learn from %s."
) ) ), learner.disp_name(),
2136 book->type_name() );
2137 continuous = false;
2138 // read non-skill books only once
2139 } else if( !skill ) {
2140 continuous = false;
2141 }
2142
2143 return false;
2144}
2145
2146void read_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
2147{
2148 if( cancel_if_book_invalid( act, book, who ) ) {
2149 return;
2150 }
2151
2152 const bool is_mabook = bktype.value() == book_type::martial_art;
2153 if( who.is_avatar() ) {
2154 get_event_bus().send<event_type::reads_book>( who.getID(), book->typeId() );
2155
2156 const bool should_null = is_mabook ?
2157 player_readma( *who.as_avatar() ) : player_read( *who.as_avatar() );
2158
2159 if( should_null ) {
2160 act.set_to_null();
2161 return;
2162 }
2163 } else { // who.is_npc()
2164
2165 // npcs can't read martial arts books yet
2166 if( is_mabook ) {
2167 act.set_to_null();
2168 return;
2169 }
2170
2171 if( npc_read( static_cast<npc &>( who ) ) ) {
2172 act.set_to_null();
2173 return;
2174 }
2175 }
2176
2177 if( continuous ) {
2178 time_duration time_taken;
2179
2180 // caller should check if npc can read first
2181 if( who.is_npc() ) {
2182 npc &n = static_cast<npc &>( who );
2183 time_taken = n.time_to_read( *book, n );
2184
2185 } else { // who.is_avatar()
2186
2187 // check if there can still be a reader before restarting
2188 // because npcs can move while reading for the player
2189 std::vector<std::string> fail_messages;
2190 const Character *reader = who.as_avatar()->get_book_reader( *book, fail_messages );
2191 if( reader == nullptr ) {
2192 // We can't read, and neither can our followers
2193 for( const std::string &reason : fail_messages ) {
2194 add_msg( m_bad, reason );
2195 }
2196 act.set_to_null();
2197 return;
2198 }
2199
2200 time_taken = who.as_avatar()->time_to_read( *book, *reader );
2201 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_READ, "reading time = %s",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_READ ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "reading time = %s"
, to_string_writable( time_taken ) ) ) ); } } while( false )
2202 to_string_writable( time_taken ) )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_READ ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "reading time = %s"
, to_string_writable( time_taken ) ) ) ); } } while( false );
2203 }
2204
2205 // restart the activity
2206 moves_total = to_moves<int>( time_taken );
2207 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( time_taken );
2208 act.moves_left = to_moves<int>( time_taken );
2209 return;
2210 } else {
2211 who.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You finish reading." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You finish reading." ) ) ) );
2212 }
2213
2214 act.set_to_null();
2215}
2216
2217bool read_activity_actor::can_resume_with_internal( const activity_actor &other,
2218 const Character & ) const
2219{
2220 const read_activity_actor &actor = static_cast<const read_activity_actor &>( other );
2221
2222 // The ereader gets transformed into the _on version
2223 // which means the item_location of the book changes
2224 // this check is to prevent a segmentation fault
2225 if( !is_valid_book( book ) || !is_valid_book( actor.book ) ) {
2226 return false;
2227 }
2228
2229 return continuous == actor.continuous &&
2230 learner_id == actor.learner_id &&
2231 book->typeId() == actor.book->typeId();
2232}
2233
2234std::string read_activity_actor::get_progress_message( const player_activity & ) const
2235{
2236 if( !is_valid_book( book ) ) {
2237 return std::string();
2238 }
2239
2240 Character &you = get_player_character();
2241 const cata::value_ptr<islot_book> &islotbook = book->type->book;
2242 const skill_id &skill = islotbook->skill;
2243
2244 if( skill &&
2245 you.get_knowledge_level( skill ) < islotbook->level &&
2246 you.get_skill_level_object( skill ).can_train() &&
2247 you.has_identified( book->typeId() ) ) {
2248 const SkillLevel &skill_level = you.get_skill_level_object( skill );
2249 //~ skill_name current_skill_level -> next_skill_level (% to next level)
2250 return string_format( pgettext( "reading progress", "%1$s %2$d -> %3$d (%4$d%%)" ),
2251 skill.obj().name(),
2252 skill_level.knowledgeLevel(),
2253 skill_level.knowledgeLevel() + 1,
2254 skill_level.knowledgeExperience() );
2255 }
2256
2257 return std::string();
2258}
2259
2260void read_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
2261{
2262 jsout.start_object();
2263
2264 jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
2265 if( is_valid_book( book ) ) {
2266 jsout.member( "book", book );
2267 }
2268 if( ereader ) {
2269 jsout.member( "ereader", ereader );
2270 }
2271 jsout.member( "using_ereader", using_ereader );
2272 jsout.member( "continuous", continuous );
2273 jsout.member( "learner_id", learner_id );
2274
2275 jsout.end_object();
2276}
2277
2278std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> read_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
2279{
2280 read_activity_actor actor;
2281 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
2282
2283 data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
2284 data.read( "book", actor.book );
2285 data.read( "ereader", actor.ereader );
2286 data.read( "using_ereader", actor.using_ereader );
2287 data.read( "continuous", actor.continuous );
2288 data.read( "learner_id", actor.learner_id );
2289
2290 return actor.clone();
2291}
2292
2293void move_items_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
2294{
2295 const tripoint_bub_ms dest = relative_destination + who.pos_bub();
2296
2297 while( who.moves > 0 && !target_items.empty() ) {
2298 item_location target = std::move( target_items.back() );
2299 const int quantity = quantities.back();
2300 target_items.pop_back();
2301 quantities.pop_back();
2302
2303 if( !target ) {
2304 debugmsg( "Lost target item of ACT_MOVE_ITEMS" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "2304", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Lost target item of ACT_MOVE_ITEMS"
);
2305 continue;
2306 }
2307
2308 // Check that we can pick it up.
2309 if( target->made_of_from_type( phase_id::SOLID ) ) {
2310 // Spill out any invalid contents first
2311 target.overflow();
2312
2313 item &leftovers = *target;
2314 // Make a copy to be put in the destination location
2315 item newit = leftovers;
2316
2317 if( newit.is_owned_by( who, true ) ) {
2318 newit.set_owner( who );
2319 } else {
2320 continue;
2321 }
2322
2323 // Handle charges, quantity == 0 means move all
2324 if( quantity != 0 && newit.count_by_charges() ) {
2325 newit.charges = std::min( newit.charges, quantity );
2326 leftovers.charges -= quantity;
2327 } else {
2328 leftovers.charges = 0;
2329 }
2330
2331 // This is for hauling across zlevels, remove when going up and down stairs
2332 // is no longer teleportation
2333 const tripoint_bub_ms src = target.pos_bub();
2334 const int distance = src.z() == dest.z() ? std::max( rl_dist( src, dest ), 1 ) : 1;
2335 // Yuck, I'm sticking weariness scaling based on activity level here
2336 const float weary_mult = who.exertion_adjusted_move_multiplier( exertion_level() );
2337 who.mod_moves( -Pickup::cost_to_move_item( who, newit ) * distance * weary_mult );
2338 if( to_vehicle ) {
2339 put_into_vehicle_or_drop( who, item_drop_reason::deliberate, { newit }, dest );
2340 } else {
2341 std::vector<item_location> dropped_items = drop_on_map( who, item_drop_reason::deliberate, { newit },
2342 dest );
2343 if( hauling_mode ) {
2344 who.haul_list.insert( who.haul_list.end(), dropped_items.begin(), dropped_items.end() );
2345 }
2346 }
2347 // If we picked up a whole stack, remove the leftover item
2348 if( leftovers.charges <= 0 ) {
2349 target.remove_item();
2350 }
2351 }
2352 }
2353
2354 if( target_items.empty() ) {
2355 // Nuke the current activity, leaving the backlog alone.
2356 act.set_to_null();
2357 if( hauling_mode ) {
2358 std::vector<item_location> haulable_items = get_map().get_haulable_items( who.pos() );
2359 bool overflow = who.trim_haul_list( haulable_items );
2360 if( who.is_hauling() && haulable_items.empty() ) {
2361 who.stop_hauling();
2362 }
2363
2364 if( overflow ) {
2365 add_msg( m_warning,
2366 _( "You lose track of some hauled items as they didn't fit on the current tile." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You lose track of some hauled items as they didn't fit on the current tile."
) ) ) );
2367 }
2368 }
2369 }
2370}
2371
2372void move_items_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
2373{
2374 jsout.start_object();
2375
2376 jsout.member( "target_items", target_items );
2377 jsout.member( "quantities", quantities );
2378 jsout.member( "to_vehicle", to_vehicle );
2379 jsout.member( "relative_destination", relative_destination );
2380 jsout.member( "hauling_mode", hauling_mode );
2381
2382 jsout.end_object();
2383}
2384
2385std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> move_items_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
2386{
2387 move_items_activity_actor actor( {}, {}, false, tripoint_zero );
2388
2389 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
2390
2391 data.read( "target_items", actor.target_items );
2392 data.read( "quantities", actor.quantities );
2393 data.read( "to_vehicle", actor.to_vehicle );
2394 data.read( "relative_destination", actor.relative_destination );
2395 data.read( "hauling_mode", actor.hauling_mode );
2396
2397 return actor.clone();
2398}
2399
2400static void cancel_pickup( Character &who )
2401{
2402 who.cancel_activity();
2403 if( who.is_hauling() && !get_map().has_haulable_items( who.pos() ) ) {
2404 who.stop_hauling();
2405 }
2406 who.drop_invalid_inventory();
2407}
2408
2409void pickup_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &, Character &who )
2410{
2411 // If we don't have target items bail out
2412 if( target_items.empty() ) {
2413 cancel_pickup( who );
2414 return;
2415 }
2416
2417 // If the player moves while picking up (i.e.: in a moving vehicle) cancel
2418 // the activity, only populate starting_pos when grabbing from the ground
2419 if( starting_pos && *starting_pos != who.pos() ) {
2420 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "Moving canceled auto-pickup." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Moving canceled auto-pickup."
) ) ) );
2421 cancel_pickup( who );
2422 return;
2423 }
2424
2425 // False indicates that the player canceled pickup when met with some prompt
2426 const bool keep_going = Pickup::do_pickup( target_items, quantities, autopickup,
2427 stash_successful, info );
2428
2429 // If there are items left we ran out of moves, so continue the activity
2430 // Otherwise, we are done.
2431 if( !keep_going || target_items.empty() ) {
2432 if( !stash_successful && !autopickup ) {
2433 add_msg( m_bad, _( "Some items were not picked up!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Some items were not picked up!"
) ) ) );
2434 }
2435
2436 cancel_pickup( who );
2437
2438 if( who.get_value( "THIEF_MODE_KEEP" ) != "YES" ) {
2439 who.set_value( "THIEF_MODE", "THIEF_ASK" );
2440 }
2441
2442 if( !keep_going ) {
2443 // The user canceled the activity, so we're done
2444 // AIM might have more pickup activities pending, also cancel them.
2445 // TODO: Move this to advanced inventory instead of hacking it in here
2446 cancel_aim_processing();
2447 }
2448 }
2449}
2450
2451void pickup_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
2452{
2453 jsout.start_object();
2454
2455 jsout.member( "target_items", target_items );
2456 jsout.member( "quantities", quantities );
2457 jsout.member( "starting_pos", starting_pos );
2458 jsout.member( "stash_successful", stash_successful );
2459 jsout.member( "autopickup", autopickup );
2460 jsout.member( "info", info );
2461
2462 jsout.end_object();
2463}
2464
2465std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> pickup_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
2466{
2467 pickup_activity_actor actor( {}, {}, std::nullopt, false );
2468
2469 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
2470
2471 data.read( "target_items", actor.target_items );
2472 data.read( "quantities", actor.quantities );
2473 data.read( "starting_pos", actor.starting_pos );
2474 data.read( "stash_successful", actor.stash_successful );
2475 data.read( "autopickup", actor.autopickup );
2476 data.read( "info", actor.info );
2477
2478 return actor.clone();
2479}
2480
2481void boltcutting_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &/*who*/ )
2482{
2483 const map &here = get_map();
2484
2485 if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
2486 const furn_id furn_type = here.furn( target );
2487 if( !furn_type->boltcut->valid() ) {
2488 if( !testing ) {
2489 debugmsg( "%s boltcut is invalid", furn_type.id().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "2489", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s boltcut is invalid", furn_type
.id().str());
2490 }
2491 act.set_to_null();
2492 return;
2493 }
2494
2495 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( furn_type->boltcut->duration() );
2496 } else if( !here.ter( target )->is_null() ) {
2497 const ter_id ter_type = here.ter( target );
2498 if( !ter_type->boltcut->valid() ) {
2499 if( !testing ) {
2500 debugmsg( "%s boltcut is invalid", ter_type.id().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "2500", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s boltcut is invalid", ter_type
.id().str());
2501 }
2502 act.set_to_null();
2503 return;
2504 }
2505 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( ter_type->boltcut->duration() );
2506 } else {
2507 if( !testing ) {
2508 debugmsg( "boltcut activity called on invalid terrain" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "2508", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "boltcut activity called on invalid terrain"
);
2509 }
2510 act.set_to_null();
2511 return;
2512 }
2513
2514 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACTIVITY, "%s moves_total: %d", act.id().str(), act.moves_total )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACTIVITY ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "%s moves_total: %d"
, act.id().str(), act.moves_total ) ) ); } } while( false );
2515 act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
2516}
2517
2518void boltcutting_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &/*act*/, Character &who )
2519{
2520 if( tool->ammo_sufficient( &who ) ) {
2521 tool->ammo_consume( tool->ammo_required(), tool.position(), &who );
2522 } else {
2523 if( who.is_avatar() ) {
2524 who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %1$s ran out of charges." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %1$s ran out of charges."
) ) ), tool->tname() );
2525 } else { // who.is_npc()
2526 add_msg_if_player_sees( who.pos(), _( "%1$s %2$s ran out of charges." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s %2$s ran out of charges."
) ) ), who.disp_name( false,
2527 true ), tool->tname() );
2528 }
2529 who.cancel_activity();
2530 }
2531}
2532
2533void boltcutting_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
2534{
2535 map &here = get_map();
2536 const activity_data_common *data;
2537
2538 if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
2539 const furn_id furn_type = here.furn( target );
2540 if( !furn_type->boltcut->valid() ) {
2541 if( !testing ) {
2542 debugmsg( "%s boltcut is invalid", furn_type.id().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "2542", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s boltcut is invalid", furn_type
.id().str());
2543 }
2544 act.set_to_null();
2545 return;
2546 }
2547
2548 const furn_str_id new_furn = furn_type->boltcut->result();
2549 if( !new_furn.is_valid() ) {
2550 if( !testing ) {
2551 debugmsg( "boltcut furniture: %s invalid furniture", new_furn.str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "2551", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "boltcut furniture: %s invalid furniture"
, new_furn.str());
2552 }
2553 act.set_to_null();
2554 return;
2555 }
2556
2557 data = static_cast<const activity_data_common *>( &*furn_type->boltcut );
2558 here.furn_set( target, new_furn );
2559 } else if( !here.ter( target )->is_null() ) {
2560 const ter_id ter_type = here.ter( target );
2561 if( !ter_type->boltcut->valid() ) {
2562 if( !testing ) {
2563 debugmsg( "%s boltcut is invalid", ter_type.id().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "2563", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s boltcut is invalid", ter_type
.id().str());
2564 }
2565 act.set_to_null();
2566 return;
2567 }
2568
2569 const ter_str_id new_ter = ter_type->boltcut->result();
2570 if( !new_ter.is_valid() ) {
2571 if( !testing ) {
2572 debugmsg( "boltcut terrain: %s invalid terrain", new_ter.str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "2572", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "boltcut terrain: %s invalid terrain"
, new_ter.str());
2573 }
2574 act.set_to_null();
2575 return;
2576 }
2577
2578 data = static_cast<const activity_data_common *>( &*ter_type->boltcut );
2579 here.ter_set( target, new_ter );
2580 } else {
2581 if( !testing ) {
2582 debugmsg( "boltcut activity finished on invalid terrain" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "2582", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "boltcut activity finished on invalid terrain"
);
2583 }
2584 act.set_to_null();
2585 return;
2586 }
2587
2588 if( data->sound().empty() ) {
2589 sounds::sound( target, 5, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "Snick, snick, gachunk!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Snick, snick, gachunk!" ) ) ),
2590 true, "tool", "boltcutters" );
2591 } else {
2592 sounds::sound( target, 5, sounds::sound_t::combat, data->sound().translated(),
2593 true, "tool", "boltcutters" );
2594 }
2595
2596 for( const activity_byproduct &byproduct : data->byproducts() ) {
2597 const int amount = byproduct.roll();
2598 if( byproduct.item->count_by_charges() ) {
2599 item byproduct_item( byproduct.item, calendar::turn, amount );
2600 here.add_item_or_charges( target, byproduct_item );
2601 } else {
2602 item byproduct_item( byproduct.item, calendar::turn );
2603 for( int i = 0; i < amount; ++i ) {
2604 here.add_item_or_charges( target, byproduct_item );
2605 }
2606 }
2607 }
2608
2609 if( !data->message().empty() ) {
2610 who.add_msg_if_player( m_info, data->message().translated() );
2611 }
2612
2613 act.set_to_null();
2614}
2615
2616void boltcutting_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
2617{
2618 jsout.start_object();
2619 jsout.member( "target", target );
2620 jsout.member( "tool", tool );
2621 jsout.end_object();
2622}
2623
2624std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> boltcutting_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
2625{
2626 boltcutting_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
2627 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
2628 data.read( "target", actor.target );
2629 data.read( "tool", actor.tool );
2630 return actor.clone();
2631}
2632
2633lockpick_activity_actor lockpick_activity_actor::use_item(
2634 int moves_total,
2635 const item_location &lockpick,
2636 const tripoint &target
2637)
2638{
2639 return lockpick_activity_actor {
2640 moves_total,
2641 lockpick,
2642 std::nullopt,
2643 target
2644 };
2645}
2646
2647lockpick_activity_actor lockpick_activity_actor::use_bionic(
2648 const tripoint &target
2649)
2650{
2651 return lockpick_activity_actor {
2652 to_moves<int>( 4_seconds ),
2653 std::nullopt,
2654 item( itype_pseudo_bio_picklock ),
2655 target
2656 };
2657}
2658
2659void lockpick_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
2660{
2661 act.moves_left = moves_total;
2662 act.moves_total = moves_total;
2663
2664 const time_duration lockpicking_time = time_duration::from_moves( moves_total );
2665 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_LOCKPICK, "lockpicking time = %s",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_LOCKPICK ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg
( m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "lockpicking time = %s"
, to_string_writable( lockpicking_time ) ) ) ); } } while( false
)
2666 to_string_writable( lockpicking_time ) )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_LOCKPICK ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg
( m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "lockpicking time = %s"
, to_string_writable( lockpicking_time ) ) ) ); } } while( false
);
2667}
2668
2669void lockpick_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
2670{
2671 act.set_to_null();
2672
2673 item *it;
2674 if( lockpick.has_value() ) {
2675 it = ( *lockpick ).get_item();
2676 } else {
2677 it = &*fake_lockpick;
2678 }
2679
2680 if( !it ) {
2681 debugmsg( "Lost ACT_LOCKPICK item" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "2681", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Lost ACT_LOCKPICK item");
2682 return;
2683 }
2684
2685 map &here = get_map();
2686 const tripoint target = here.getlocal( this->target );
2687 const ter_id ter_type = here.ter( target );
2688 const furn_id furn_type = here.furn( target );
2689 optional_vpart_position const veh = here.veh_at( target );
2690 int locked_part = -1;
2691 ter_id new_ter_type;
2692 furn_id new_furn_type;
2693 std::string open_message = _( "The lock opensâ¦" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The lock opensâ¦" ) ) );
2694
2695 if( veh ) {
2696 std::vector<vehicle_part *> parts_at_target = veh->vehicle().get_parts_at(
2697 target, "LOCKABLE_DOOR", part_status_flag::available );
2698 if( !parts_at_target.empty() ) {
2699 locked_part = veh->vehicle().next_part_to_unlock(
2700 veh->vehicle().index_of_part( parts_at_target.front() ) );
2701 }
2702 }
2703
2704 if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
2705 if( furn_type->lockpick_result.is_null() ) {
2706 who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You can't open this lock." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't open this lock." )
) ) );
2707 return;
2708 }
2709
2710 new_furn_type = furn_type->lockpick_result;
2711 if( !furn_type->lockpick_message.empty() ) {
2712 open_message = furn_type->lockpick_message.translated();
2713 }
2714 } else if( locked_part >= 0 ) {
2715 // no-op.
2716 } else {
2717 if( ter_type->lockpick_result.is_null() ) {
2718 who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You can't open this lock." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't open this lock." )
) ) );
2719 return;
2720 }
2721
2722 new_ter_type = ter_type->lockpick_result;
2723 if( !ter_type->lockpick_message.empty() ) {
2724 open_message = ter_type->lockpick_message.translated();
2725 }
2726 }
2727
2728 bool perfect = it->has_flag( flag_PERFECT_LOCKPICK );
2729 bool destroy = false;
2730
2731 // Your devices skill is the primary skill that applies to your roll. Your mechanics skill has a little input.
2732 const float weighted_skill_average = ( 3.0f * who.get_skill_level(
2733 skill_traps ) + who.get_skill_level( skill_mechanics ) ) / 4.0f;
2734
2735 // Your dexterity determines most of your stat contribution, but your intelligence and perception combined are about half as much.
2736 const float weighted_stat_average = ( 6.0f * who.dex_cur + 2.0f * who.per_cur +
2737 who.int_cur ) / 9.0f;
2738
2739 // Get a bonus from your lockpick quality if the quality is higher than 3, or a penalty if it is lower. For a bobby pin this puts you at -2, for a locksmith kit, +2.
2740 const float tool_effect = ( it->get_quality( qual_LOCKPICK ) - 3 ) - ( it->damage() / 2000.0 );
2741
2742 // Without at least a basic lockpick proficiency, your skill level is effectively 6 levels lower.
2743 int proficiency_effect = -3;
2744 int duration_proficiency_factor = 10;
2745 if( who.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_lockpicking ) ) {
2746 // If you have the basic lockpick prof, negate the above penalty
2747 proficiency_effect = 0;
2748 duration_proficiency_factor = 5;
2749 }
2750 if( who.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_lockpicking_expert ) ) {
2751 // If you have the locksmith proficiency, your skill level is effectively 4 levels higher.
2752 proficiency_effect = 3;
2753 duration_proficiency_factor = 1;
2754 }
2755
2756 // We get our average roll by adding the above factors together. For a person with no skill, average stats, no proficiencies, and an improvised lockpick, mean_roll will be 2.
2757 const float mean_roll = weighted_skill_average + ( weighted_stat_average / 4 ) + proficiency_effect
2758 + tool_effect;
2759
2760 // A standard deviation of 2 means that about 2/3 of rolls will come within 2 points of your mean_roll. Lockpicking
2761 int pick_roll = std::round( normal_roll( mean_roll, 2 ) );
2762
2763 // Lock_roll should be replaced with a flat value defined by the door, soon.
2764 // In the meantime, let's roll 3d5-3, giving us a range of 0-12.
2765 int lock_roll = rng( 0, 4 ) + rng( 0, 4 ) + rng( 0, 4 );
2766
2767 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_LOCKPICK, "Rolled %i. Mean_roll %g. Difficulty %i.",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_LOCKPICK ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg
( m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Rolled %i. Mean_roll %g. Difficulty %i."
, pick_roll, mean_roll, lock_roll ) ) ); } } while( false )
2768 pick_roll, mean_roll, lock_roll )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_LOCKPICK ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg
( m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Rolled %i. Mean_roll %g. Difficulty %i."
, pick_roll, mean_roll, lock_roll ) ) ); } } while( false );
2769
2770 // Your base skill XP gain is derived from the lock difficulty (which is currently random but shouldn't be).
2771 int xp_gain = 3 * lock_roll;
2772 if( perfect || ( pick_roll >= lock_roll ) ) {
2773 if( !perfect ) {
2774 // Increase your XP if you successfully pick the lock, unless you were using a Perfect Lockpick.
2775 xp_gain = xp_gain * 2;
2776 }
2777 if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
2778 here.furn_set( target, new_furn_type );
2779 } else if( locked_part >= 0 ) {
2780 veh->vehicle().unlock( locked_part );
2781 } else {
2782 here.ter_set( target, new_ter_type );
2783 }
2784 who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, open_message );
2785 } else if( furn_type == f_gunsafe_ml && lock_roll > ( 3 * pick_roll ) ) {
2786 who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your clumsy attempt jams the lock!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your clumsy attempt jams the lock!"
) ) ) );
2787 here.furn_set( target, furn_f_gunsafe_mj );
2788 } else if( lock_roll > ( 1.5 * pick_roll ) ) {
2789 if( it->inc_damage() ) {
2790 who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
2791 _( "The lock stumps your efforts to pick it, and you destroy your tool." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The lock stumps your efforts to pick it, and you destroy your tool."
) ) ) );
2792 destroy = true;
2793 } else {
2794 who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
2795 _( "The lock stumps your efforts to pick it, and you damage your tool." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The lock stumps your efforts to pick it, and you damage your tool."
) ) ) );
2796 }
2797 } else {
2798 who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "The lock stumps your efforts to pick it." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The lock stumps your efforts to pick it."
) ) ) );
2799 }
2800
2801 if( avatar *you = dynamic_cast<avatar *>( &who ) ) {
2802 // Gives another boost to XP, reduced by your skill level.
2803 // Higher skill levels require more difficult locks to gain a meaningful amount of xp.
2804 // Again, we're using randomized lock_roll until a defined lock difficulty is implemented.
2805 if( lock_roll > round( you->get_skill_level( skill_traps ) ) ) {
2806 xp_gain += lock_roll + ( xp_gain / ( you->get_skill_level( skill_traps ) + 1 ) );
2807 } else {
2808 xp_gain += xp_gain / ( you->get_skill_level( skill_traps ) + 1 );
2809 }
2810 you->practice( skill_traps, xp_gain );
2811 }
2812
2813 if( !perfect && ter_type == t_door_locked_alarm && ( lock_roll + dice( 1, 30 ) ) > pick_roll ) {
2814 sounds::sound( who.pos(), 40, sounds::sound_t::alarm, _( "an alarm sound!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "an alarm sound!" ) ) ), true, "environment",
2815 "alarm" );
2816 }
2817
2818 if( destroy && lockpick.has_value() ) {
2819 ( *lockpick ).remove_item();
2820 }
2821
2822 who.practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_lockpicking,
2823 time_duration::from_moves( act.moves_total ) / duration_proficiency_factor );
2824 who.practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_lockpicking_expert,
2825 time_duration::from_moves( act.moves_total ) / duration_proficiency_factor );
2826}
2827
2828std::optional<tripoint> lockpick_activity_actor::select_location( avatar &you )
2829{
2830 if( you.cant_do_mounted() ) {
2831 return std::nullopt;
2832 }
2833
2834 const std::function<bool( const tripoint & )> is_pickable = [&you]( const tripoint & p ) {
2835 const map &here = get_map();
2836 const optional_vpart_position vpart = here.veh_at( p );
2837 if( p == you.pos() ) {
2838 return false;
2839 }
2840 return here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_PICKABLE, p ) ||
2841 ( vpart && vpart->vehicle().next_part_to_unlock( vpart->part_index() ) >= 0 );
2842 };
2843
2844 std::optional<tripoint> target = choose_adjacent_highlight(
2845 _( "Use your lockpick where?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Use your lockpick where?" ) )
), _( "There is nothing to lockpick nearby." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There is nothing to lockpick nearby."
) ) ), is_pickable, false );
2846 if( !target ) {
2847 return std::nullopt;
2848 }
2849
2850 if( is_pickable( *target ) ) {
2851 return target;
2852 }
2853
2854 const ter_id terr_type = get_map().ter( *target );
2855 if( *target == you.pos() ) {
2856 you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You pick your nose and your sinuses swing open." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You pick your nose and your sinuses swing open."
) ) ) );
2857 } else if( get_creature_tracker().creature_at<npc>( *target ) ) {
2858 you.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
2859 _( "You can pick your friends, and you can\npick your nose, but you can't pick\nyour friend's nose." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can pick your friends, and you can\npick your nose, but you can't pick\nyour friend's nose."
) ) ) );
2860 } else if( terr_type == t_door_c ) {
2861 you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "That door isn't locked." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "That door isn't locked." ) )
) );
2862 } else {
2863 you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "That cannot be picked." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "That cannot be picked." ) ) ) );
2864 }
2865 return std::nullopt;
2866}
2867
2868void lockpick_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
2869{
2870 jsout.start_object();
2871
2872 jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
2873 jsout.member( "lockpick", lockpick );
2874 jsout.member( "fake_lockpick", fake_lockpick );
2875 jsout.member( "target", target );
2876
2877 jsout.end_object();
2878}
2879
2880std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> lockpick_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
2881{
2882 lockpick_activity_actor actor( 0, std::nullopt, std::nullopt, tripoint_zero );
2883
2884 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
2885
2886 data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
2887 data.read( "lockpick", actor.lockpick );
2888 data.read( "fake_lockpick", actor.fake_lockpick );
2889 data.read( "target", actor.target );
2890
2891 return actor.clone();
2892}
2893
2894int ebooksave_activity_actor::total_pages(
2895 const std::vector<item_location> &books )
2896{
2897 int pages = 0;
2898 for( const item_location &book : books ) {
17
←
Iterator incremented behind the past-the-end iterator
2899 pages += pages_in_book( book->typeId() );
2900 }
2901 return pages;
2902}
2903
2904time_duration ebooksave_activity_actor::required_time(
2905 const std::vector<item_location> &books )
2906{
2907 return total_pages( books ) * time_per_page;
16
←
Calling 'ebooksave_activity_actor::total_pages'
→
2908}
2909
2910int ebooksave_activity_actor::required_charges(
2911 const std::vector<item_location> &books,
2912 const item_location &ereader )
2913{
2914 const int charges = total_pages( books ) / pages_per_charge;
2915 return charges * ereader->ammo_required();
2916}
2917
2918void ebooksave_activity_actor::start_scanning_next_book( player_activity &act )
2919{
2920 while( !books.empty() && !books.back() ) {
12

Assuming the condition is false
→

::DF_ACT_EBOOK ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Skipping unavailable book at %s"
, books.back().describe() ) ) ); } } while( false )
2922 books.back().describe() )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_EBOOK ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Skipping unavailable book at %s"
, books.back().describe() ) ) ); } } while( false );
2923 books.pop_back();
2924 }

2934
2935void ebooksave_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &/*who*/ )
2936{
2937 const time_duration scanning_time = required_time( books );
2938 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_EBOOK, "scanning_time time = %s",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_EBOOK ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "scanning_time time = %s"
, to_string_writable( scanning_time ) ) ) ); } } while( false
)

::DF_ACT_EBOOK ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "scanning_time time = %s"
, to_string_writable( scanning_time ) ) ) ); } } while( false
);
2940 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( scanning_time );
2941 start_scanning_next_book( act );
2942}
2943
2944void ebooksave_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
2945{
2946 // only consume charges every 25 pages
2947 if( calendar::once_every( pages_per_charge * time_per_page ) ) {
2948 if( !ereader->ammo_sufficient( &who ) ) {
2949 add_msg_if_player_sees(
2950 who,
2951 _( "%1$s %2$s ran out of batteries." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s %2$s ran out of batteries."
) ) ),
2952 who.disp_name( true, true ),
2953 item::nname( ereader->typeId() ) );
2954 who.cancel_activity();
2955 return;
2956 }
2957
2958 ereader->ammo_consume( ereader->ammo_required(), who.pos(), &who );
2959 }
2960
2961 turns_left_on_current_book--;
2962 if( turns_left_on_current_book > 0 ) {
2963 return; // not fully scanned yet
2964 }
2965
2966 // We have now spent enough time to fully scan current book
2967 completed_scanning_current_book( act, who );
2968}
2969
2970void ebooksave_activity_actor::completed_scanning_current_book( player_activity &act,
2971 Character &who )
2972{
2973 item_location scanned_book = books.back();
2974 books.pop_back();
6
←
Container 'books' shrank from the back by 1 position
→
2975 if( scanned_book ) {
7
←
Assuming the condition is false
→
2976 ereader->put_in( *scanned_book, pocket_type::EBOOK );
2977 if( who.is_avatar() ) {
2978 if( !who.has_identified( scanned_book->typeId() ) ) {
2979 who.identify( *scanned_book );
2980 }
2981 }
2982 handled_books++;
2983 } else {
2984 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_EBOOK,do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_EBOOK ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Spent time to scan book at %s, but it is no longer available?"
, scanned_book.describe() ) ) ); } } while( false )
8
←
Taking false branch
→
9
←
Assuming 'debug_mode' is false
→
10
←
Loop condition is false. Exiting loop
→
2985 "Spent time to scan book at %s, but it is no longer available?",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_EBOOK ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Spent time to scan book at %s, but it is no longer available?"
, scanned_book.describe() ) ) ); } } while( false )
2986 scanned_book.describe() )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_EBOOK ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "Spent time to scan book at %s, but it is no longer available?"
, scanned_book.describe() ) ) ); } } while( false );
2987 }
2988 start_scanning_next_book( act );
11
←
Calling 'ebooksave_activity_actor::start_scanning_next_book'

2989}
2990
2991void ebooksave_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
2992{
2993 while( !books.empty() ) {
1
Assuming the condition is true
→
2
←
Loop condition is true. Entering loop body
→
3
←
Assuming the condition is true
→
4
←
Loop condition is true. Entering loop body
→
2994 // We can end up here with books left if the player has speed>100
2995 completed_scanning_current_book( act, who );
5
←

→
2996 }

get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You scan %d %s into your device."
) ) ), handled_books,
2999 n_gettext( "book", "books", handled_books ) );
3000 } else { // who.is_npc()
3001 add_msg_if_player_sees( who, _( "%s scans %d %s into their device." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s scans %d %s into their device."
) ) ),
3002 who.disp_name( false, true ), handled_books, n_gettext( "book", "books", handled_books ) );
3003 }
3004 act.set_to_null();
3005}
3006
3007void ebooksave_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3008{
3009 if( who.is_avatar() ) {
3010 add_msg( m_info, _( "You stop scanning the remaining books." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You stop scanning the remaining books."
) ) ) );
3011 } else { // who.is_npc()
3012 add_msg_if_player_sees( who, _( "%s stops scanning books." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s stops scanning books." ) )
),
3013 who.disp_name( false, true ) );
3014 }
3015 act.set_to_null();
3016}
3017
3018void ebooksave_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3019{
3020 jsout.start_object();
3021 jsout.member( "books", books );
3022 jsout.member( "ereader", ereader );
3023 jsout.member( "handled_books", handled_books );
3024 jsout.member( "turns_left_on_current_book", turns_left_on_current_book );
3025 jsout.end_object();
3026}
3027
3028std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> ebooksave_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
3029{
3030 ebooksave_activity_actor actor = ebooksave_activity_actor( {}, {} );
3031
3032 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
3033 data.read( "books", actor.books );
3034 if( data.has_member( "book" ) ) {
3035 // legacy compatibility: in 0.G, this activity only handled one book each
3036 item_location book;
3037 data.read( "book", book );
3038 actor.books.push_back( book );
3039 }
3040 data.read( "ereader", actor.ereader );
3041 data.read( "handled_books", actor.handled_books );
3042 data.read( "turns_left_on_current_book", actor.turns_left_on_current_book );
3043 return actor.clone();
3044}
3045
3046void migration_cancel_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3047{
3048 // Stop the activity
3049 act.set_to_null();
3050
3051 // Ensure that neither avatars nor npcs end up in an invalid state
3052 if( who.is_npc() ) {
3053 npc &npc_who = dynamic_cast<npc &>( who );
3054 npc_who.revert_after_activity();
3055 } else {
3056 avatar &avatar_who = dynamic_cast<avatar &>( who );
3057 avatar_who.clear_destination();
3058 avatar_who.backlog.clear();
3059 }
3060}
3061
3062void migration_cancel_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3063{
3064 // This will probably never be called, but write null to avoid invalid json in
3065 // the case that it is
3066 jsout.write_null();
3067}
3068
3069std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> migration_cancel_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue & )
3070{
3071 return migration_cancel_activity_actor().clone();
3072}

3074void open_gate_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
3075{
3076 act.moves_total = moves_total;
3077 act.moves_left = moves_total;
3078}
3079
3080void open_gate_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character & )
3081{
3082 gates::open_gate( placement );
3083 act.set_to_null();
3084}
3085
3086void open_gate_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3087{
3088 jsout.start_object();
3089
3090 jsout.member( "moves", moves_total );
3091 jsout.member( "placement", placement );
3092
3093 jsout.end_object();
3094}

3099
3100 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
3101
3102 data.read( "moves", actor.moves_total );
3103 data.read( "placement", actor.placement );
3104
3105 return actor.clone();
3106}
3107
3108void consume_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &guy )
3109{
3110 int moves = 0;
3111 Character &player_character = get_player_character();
3112 if( consume_location ) {
3113 ret_val<edible_rating> ret = player_character.will_eat( *consume_location, true );
3114 if( !ret.success() ) {
3115 canceled = true;
3116 consume_menu_selections = std::vector<int>();
3117 consume_menu_selected_items.clear();
3118 consume_menu_filter.clear();
3119 } else {
3120 moves = to_moves<int>( guy.get_consume_time( *consume_location ) );
3121 }
3122 } else if( !consume_item.is_null() ) {
3123 ret_val<edible_rating> ret = player_character.will_eat( consume_item, true );
3124 if( !ret.success() ) {
3125 canceled = true;
3126 consume_menu_selections = std::vector<int>();
3127 consume_menu_selected_items.clear();
3128 consume_menu_filter.clear();
3129 } else {
3130 moves = to_moves<int>( guy.get_consume_time( consume_item ) );
3131 }
3132 } else {
3133 debugmsg( "Item/location to be consumed should not be null." )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "3133", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Item/location to be consumed should not be null."
);
3134 canceled = true;
3135 }
3136
3137 act.moves_total = moves;
3138 act.moves_left = moves;
3139}
3140
3141void consume_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character & )
3142{
3143 // Prevent interruptions from this point onwards, so that e.g. pain from
3144 // injecting serum doesn't pop up messages about cancelling consuming (it's
3145 // too late; we've already consumed).
3146 act.interruptable = false;
3147
3148 // Consuming an item may cause various effects, including cancelling our activity.
3149 // Back up these values since this activity actor might be destroyed.
3150 std::vector<int> temp_selections = consume_menu_selections;
3151 const std::vector<item_location> temp_selected_items = consume_menu_selected_items;
3152 const std::string temp_filter = consume_menu_filter;
3153 item_location consume_loc = consume_location;
3154 activity_id new_act = type;
3155
3156 avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
3157 if( !canceled ) {
3158 if( consume_loc ) {
3159 player_character.consume( consume_loc, /*force=*/true );
3160 } else if( !consume_item.is_null() ) {
3161 player_character.consume( consume_item, /*force=*/true );
3162 } else {
3163 debugmsg( "Item location/name to be consumed should not be null." )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "3163", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Item location/name to be consumed should not be null."
);
3164 }
3165 if( player_character.get_value( "THIEF_MODE_KEEP" ) != "YES" ) {
3166 player_character.set_value( "THIEF_MODE", "THIEF_ASK" );
3167 }
3168 }
3169
3170 if( act.id() == ACT_CONSUME ) {
3171 act.set_to_null();
3172 }
3173
3174 if( act.id() == ACT_FIRSTAID && consume_loc ) {
3175 act.targets.clear();
3176 act.targets.push_back( consume_loc );
3177 }
3178
3179 if( !temp_selections.empty() || !temp_selected_items.empty() || !temp_filter.empty() ) {
3180 if( act.is_null() ) {
3181 player_character.assign_activity( new_act );
3182 player_character.activity.values = temp_selections;
3183 player_character.activity.targets = temp_selected_items;
3184 player_character.activity.str_values = { temp_filter, "true" };
3185 } else {
3186 // Warning: this can add a redundant menu activity to the backlog.
3187 // It will prevent deleting the smart pointer of the selected item_location
3188 // if the backlog is not sanitized.
3189 player_activity eat_menu( new_act );
3190 eat_menu.values = temp_selections;
3191 eat_menu.targets = temp_selected_items;
3192 eat_menu.str_values = { temp_filter, "true" };
3193 player_character.backlog.push_back( eat_menu );
3194 }
3195 }
3196}
3197
3198void consume_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3199{
3200 jsout.start_object();
3201
3202 jsout.member( "consume_location", consume_location );
3203 jsout.member( "consume_item", consume_item );
3204 jsout.member( "consume_menu_selections", consume_menu_selections );
3205 jsout.member( "consume_menu_selected_items", consume_menu_selected_items );
3206 jsout.member( "consume_menu_filter", consume_menu_filter );
3207 jsout.member( "canceled", canceled );
3208 jsout.member( "type", type );
3209
3210 jsout.end_object();
3211}
3212
3213std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> consume_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
3214{
3215 item_location null;
3216 consume_activity_actor actor( null );
3217
3218 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
3219
3220 data.read( "consume_location", actor.consume_location );
3221 data.read( "consume_item", actor.consume_item );
3222 data.read( "consume_menu_selections", actor.consume_menu_selections );
3223 data.read( "consume_menu_selected_items", actor.consume_menu_selected_items );
3224 data.read( "consume_menu_filter", actor.consume_menu_filter );
3225 data.read( "canceled", actor.canceled );
3226 data.read( "type", actor.type );
3227
3228 return actor.clone();
3229}
3230
3231void try_sleep_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3232{
3233 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( duration );
3234 act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
3235 get_event_bus().send<event_type::character_attempt_to_fall_asleep>( who.getID() );
3236 who.set_movement_mode( move_mode_prone );
3237 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You lie down preparing to fall asleep." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You lie down preparing to fall asleep."
) ) ) );
3238}
3239
3240void try_sleep_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3241{
3242 if( who.has_effect( effect_sleep ) ) {
3243 return;
3244 }
3245 if( who.can_sleep() ) {
3246 who.fall_asleep(); // calls act.set_to_null()
3247 if( !who.has_effect( effect_sleep ) ) {
3248 // Character can potentially have immunity for 'effect_sleep'
3249 who.add_msg_if_player(
3250 _( "You feel you should've fallen asleep by now, but somehow you're still awake." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You feel you should've fallen asleep by now, but somehow you're still awake."
) ) ) );
3251 }
3252 return;
3253 }
3254 if( one_in( 1000 ) ) {
3255 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You toss and turnâ¦" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You toss and turnâ¦" ) ) ) );
3256 }
3257 if( calendar::once_every( 30_minutes ) ) {
3258 query_keep_trying( act, who );
3259 }
3260}
3261
3262void try_sleep_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3263{
3264 act.set_to_null();
3265 if( !who.has_effect( effect_sleep ) ) {
3266 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You try to sleep, but can't." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You try to sleep, but can't."
) ) ) );
3267 }
3268 who.set_movement_mode( move_mode_walk );
3269}
3270
3271void try_sleep_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &, Character &who )
3272{
3273 if( who.movement_mode_is( move_mode_prone ) ) {
3274 who.set_movement_mode( move_mode_walk );
3275 }
3276}
3277
3278void try_sleep_activity_actor::query_keep_trying( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3279{
3280 if( disable_query || !who.is_avatar() ) {
3281 return;
3282 }
3283
3284 uilist sleep_query;
3285 sleep_query.text = _( "You have trouble sleeping, keep trying?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You have trouble sleeping, keep trying?"
) ) );
3286 sleep_query.addentry( 1, true, 'S', _( "Stop trying to fall asleep and get up." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stop trying to fall asleep and get up."
) ) ) );
3287 sleep_query.addentry( 2, true, 'c', _( "Continue trying to fall asleep." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Continue trying to fall asleep."
) ) ) );
3288 sleep_query.addentry( 3, true, 'C',
3289 _( "Continue trying to fall asleep and don't ask again." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Continue trying to fall asleep and don't ask again."
) ) ) );
3290 sleep_query.query();
3291 switch( sleep_query.ret ) {
3292 case UILIST_CANCEL:
3293 case 1:
3294 act.set_to_null();
3295 who.set_movement_mode( move_mode_walk );
3296 break;
3297 case 3:
3298 disable_query = true;
3299 break;
3300 case 2:
3301 default:
3302 break;
3303 }
3304}
3305
3306void try_sleep_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3307{
3308 jsout.start_object();
3309
3310 jsout.member( "disable_query", disable_query );
3311 jsout.member( "duration", duration );
3312
3313 jsout.end_object();
3314}
3315
3316std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> try_sleep_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
3317{
3318 try_sleep_activity_actor actor = try_sleep_activity_actor( 0_seconds );
3319
3320 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
3321
3322 data.read( "disable_query", actor.disable_query );
3323 data.read( "duration", actor.duration );
3324
3325 return actor.clone();
3326}
3327
3328time_duration safecracking_activity_actor::safecracking_time( const Character &who )
3329{
3330 time_duration cracking_time = 150_minutes;
3331 /** @EFFECT_DEVICES decreases time needed for safe cracking */
3332 cracking_time -= 20_minutes * ( who.get_skill_level( skill_traps ) - 3 ) ;
3333 /** @EFFECT_PER decreases time needed for safe cracking */
3334 cracking_time -= 10_minutes * ( who.get_per() - 8 );
3335 cracking_time = std::max( 30_minutes, cracking_time );
3336
3337 if( !who.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_safecracking ) ) {
3338 cracking_time *= 3;
3339 }
3340
3341 return cracking_time;
3342}
3343
3344void safecracking_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3345{
3346 time_duration cracking_time = safecracking_time( who );
3347
3348 if( who.is_avatar() ) {
3349 add_msg( m_info, _( "You start cracking the safe." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You start cracking the safe."
) ) ) );
3350 } else { // who.is_npc
3351 // npcs can't crack safes yet, this is for when they are able to
3352 add_msg_if_player_sees( who, _( "%1$s starts cracking the safe." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s starts cracking the safe."
) ) ), who.disp_name() );
3353 }
3354
3355 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_SAFECRACKING, "safecracking time = %s",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_SAFECRACKING ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg
( m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "safecracking time = %s"
, to_string_writable( cracking_time ) ) ) ); } } while( false
)
3356 to_string_writable( cracking_time ) )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_SAFECRACKING ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg
( m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "safecracking time = %s"
, to_string_writable( cracking_time ) ) ) ); } } while( false
);
3357
3358 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( cracking_time );
3359 act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
3360}
3361
3362void safecracking_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3363{
3364 bool can_crack = who.has_flag( json_flag_SAFECRACK_NO_TOOL );
3365 // short-circuit to avoid the more expensive iteration over items
3366 can_crack = can_crack || who.cache_has_item_with( flag_SAFECRACK );
3367
3368 if( !can_crack ) {
3369 // We lost our cracking tool somehow, bail out.
3370 act.set_to_null();
3371 return;
3372 }
3373
3374 if( calendar::once_every( 5_minutes ) ) {
3375 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_SAFECRACKING, "safecracking time left = %s",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_SAFECRACKING ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg
( m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "safecracking time left = %s"
, to_string_writable( time_duration::from_moves( act.moves_left
) ) ) ) ); } } while( false )
3376 to_string_writable( time_duration::from_moves( act.moves_left ) ) )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_SAFECRACKING ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg
( m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "safecracking time left = %s"
, to_string_writable( time_duration::from_moves( act.moves_left
) ) ) ) ); } } while( false );
3377 }
3378
3379 /* Split experience gain in 20 parts, each giving 5% of the total*/
3380 const int current_step =
3381 ( 100 * ( act.moves_total - act.moves_left ) / act.moves_total ) / 5;
3382 const int difference = current_step - exp_step ;
3383 if( difference > 0 ) {
3384 exp_step += difference;
3385 if( !who.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_safecracking ) ) {
3386 who.practice_proficiency( proficiency_prof_safecracking, 3_minutes * difference );
3387 // player gained the proficiency mid-way through cracking
3388 if( who.has_proficiency( proficiency_prof_safecracking ) ) {
3389 int new_time = to_moves<int>( safecracking_time( who ) );
3390 act.moves_total = act.moves_total > new_time ? new_time : act.moves_total;
3391 act.moves_left = act.moves_left > new_time ? new_time : act.moves_left;
3392 }
3393 }
3394
3395 const float skill_level = who.get_skill_level( skill_traps );
3396 who.practice( skill_traps, std::max( 1.0f, skill_level / 2 ) );
3397 if( who.get_skill_level( skill_traps ) > skill_level ) {
3398 int new_time = to_moves<int>( safecracking_time( who ) );
3399 act.moves_total = act.moves_total > new_time ? new_time : act.moves_total;
3400 act.moves_left = act.moves_left > new_time ? new_time : act.moves_left;
3401 }
3402 }
3403}
3404
3405void safecracking_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3406{
3407 who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "With a satisfying click, the lock on the safe opens!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "With a satisfying click, the lock on the safe opens!"
) ) ) );
3408 get_map().furn_set( safe, f_safe_c );
3409 act.set_to_null();
3410}
3411
3412void safecracking_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3413{
3414 jsout.start_object();
3415 jsout.member( "safe", safe );
3416 jsout.member( "exp_step", exp_step );
3417 jsout.end_object();
3418}
3419
3420std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> safecracking_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
3421{
3422 safecracking_activity_actor actor = safecracking_activity_actor( {} );
3423
3424 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
3425 data.read( "safe", actor.safe );
3426 data.read( "exp_step", actor.exp_step );
3427 return actor.clone();
3428}
3429
3430void unload_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
3431{
3432 act.moves_left = moves_total;
3433 act.moves_total = moves_total;
3434}
3435
3436void unload_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3437{
3438 // Need to copy `target` here because `::unload` is static and `this` might be invalidated
3439 // after `act.set_to_null()` has been called (so `this.target` might also be invalidated)
3440 item_location target_copy = target;
3441 act.set_to_null();
3442 unload( who, target_copy );
3443}
3444
3445void unload_activity_actor::unload( Character &who, item_location &target )
3446{
3447 int qty = 0;
3448 item &it = *target.get_item();
3449 bool actually_unloaded = false;
3450
3451 if( it.is_container() ) {
3452 contents_change_handler handler;
3453 bool changed = false;
3454
3455 for( pocket_type ptype : {
3456 pocket_type::CONTAINER,
3457 pocket_type::MAGAZINE_WELL,
3458 pocket_type::MAGAZINE
3459 } ) {
3460
3461 for( item *contained : it.all_items_top( ptype, true ) ) {
3462 int old_charges = contained->charges;
3463 const bool consumed = who.add_or_drop_with_msg( *contained, true, &it, contained );
3464 if( consumed || contained->charges != old_charges ) {
3465 changed = true;
3466 handler.unseal_pocket_containing( item_location( target, contained ) );
3467 }
3468 if( consumed ) {
3469 it.remove_item( *contained );
3470 }
3471 }
3472
3473 if( changed ) {
3474 it.on_contents_changed();
3475 who.invalidate_weight_carried_cache();
3476 handler.handle_by( who );
3477 }
3478 }
3479
3480 return;
3481 }
3482
3483 std::vector<item *> remove_contained;
3484 for( item *contained : it.all_items_top() ) {
3485 if( contained->ammo_type() == ammo_plutonium ) {
3486 contained->charges /= PLUTONIUM_CHARGES;
3487 }
3488 if( who.add_or_drop_with_msg( *contained, true, &it, contained ) ) {
3489 qty += contained->charges;
3490 remove_contained.push_back( contained );
3491 actually_unloaded = true;
3492 }
3493 }
3494 // remove the ammo leads in the belt
3495 for( item *remove : remove_contained ) {
3496 it.remove_item( *remove );
3497 actually_unloaded = true;
3498 }
3499
3500 // remove the belt linkage
3501 if( it.is_ammo_belt() ) {
3502 if( it.type->magazine->linkage ) {
3503 item link( *it.type->magazine->linkage, calendar::turn, qty );
3504 if( who.add_or_drop_with_msg( link, true ) ) {
3505 actually_unloaded = true;
3506 }
3507 }
3508 if( actually_unloaded ) {
3509 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You disassemble your %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You disassemble your %s." ) )
), it.tname() );
3510 }
3511 } else if( actually_unloaded ) {
3512 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You unload your %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You unload your %s." ) ) ), it.tname() );
3513 }
3514
3515 if( it.has_flag( flag_MAG_DESTROY ) && it.ammo_remaining() == 0 ) {
3516 target.remove_item();
3517 }
3518
3519 who.recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
3520}
3521
3522void unload_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3523{
3524 jsout.start_object();
3525
3526 jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
3527 jsout.member( "target", target );
3528
3529 jsout.end_object();
3530}
3531
3532std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> unload_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
3533{
3534 unload_activity_actor actor = unload_activity_actor( 0, item_location::nowhere );
3535
3536 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
3537
3538 data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
3539 data.read( "target", actor.target );
3540
3541 return actor.clone();
3542}
3543
3544craft_activity_actor::craft_activity_actor( item_location &it, const bool is_long ) :
3545 craft_item( it ), is_long( is_long )
3546{
3547 cached_crafting_speed = 0;
3548 cached_assistants = 0;
3549 cached_base_total_moves = 1;
3550 cached_cur_total_moves = 1;
3551 cached_workbench_multiplier = 0;
3552 use_cached_workbench_multiplier = false;
3553}
3554
3555bool craft_activity_actor::check_if_craft_okay( item_location &craft_item, Character &crafter )
3556{
3557 item *craft = craft_item.get_item();
3558
3559 // item_location::get_item() will return nullptr if the item is lost
3560 if( !craft || square_dist( craft_item.pos_bub(), crafter.pos_bub() ) > 1 ) {
3561 crafter.add_msg_player_or_npc(
3562 _( "You no longer have the in progress craft in your possession. "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You no longer have the in progress craft in your possession. "
"You stop crafting. " "Reactivate the in progress craft to continue crafting."
) ) )
3563 "You stop crafting. "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You no longer have the in progress craft in your possession. "
"You stop crafting. " "Reactivate the in progress craft to continue crafting."
) ) )
3564 "Reactivate the in progress craft to continue crafting." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You no longer have the in progress craft in your possession. "
"You stop crafting. " "Reactivate the in progress craft to continue crafting."
) ) ),
3565 _( "<npcname> no longer has the in progress craft in their possession. "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> no longer has the in progress craft in their possession. "
"<npcname> stops crafting." ) ) )
3566 "<npcname> stops crafting." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> no longer has the in progress craft in their possession. "
"<npcname> stops crafting." ) ) ) );
3567 return false;
3568 }
3569
3570 if( !craft->is_craft() ) {
3571 debugmsg( "ACT_CRAFT target '%s' is not a craft. Aborting ACT_CRAFT.", craft->tname() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "3571", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "ACT_CRAFT target '%s' is not a craft. Aborting ACT_CRAFT."
, craft->tname());
3572 return false;
3573 }
3574
3575 if( !cached_continuation_requirements ) {
3576 cached_continuation_requirements = craft->get_continue_reqs();
3577 }
3578 return crafter.can_continue_craft( *craft, *cached_continuation_requirements );
3579}
3580
3581void craft_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &crafter )
3582{
3583 if( !check_if_craft_okay( craft_item, crafter ) ) {
3584 act.set_to_null();
3585 }
3586 activity_override = craft_item.get_item()->get_making().exertion_level();
3587 cached_crafting_speed = 0;
3588 cached_workbench_multiplier = 0;
3589 use_cached_workbench_multiplier = false;
3590 act.targets.clear();
3591 act.targets.push_back( craft_item );
3592}
3593
3594void craft_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &crafter )
3595{
3596 if( !check_if_craft_okay( craft_item, crafter ) ) {
3597 act.set_to_null();
3598 return;
3599 }
3600
3601 // We already checked if this is nullptr above
3602 item &craft = *craft_item.get_item();
3603
3604 const std::optional<tripoint> location = craft_item.where() == item_location::type::character
3605 ? std::optional<tripoint>() : std::optional<tripoint>( craft_item.position() );
3606 const recipe &rec = craft.get_making();
3607 if( !use_cached_workbench_multiplier ) {
3608 cached_workbench_multiplier = crafter.workbench_crafting_speed_multiplier( craft, location );
3609 use_cached_workbench_multiplier = true;
3610 }
3611 const float crafting_speed = crafter.crafting_speed_multiplier( craft, location,
3612 use_cached_workbench_multiplier,
3613 cached_workbench_multiplier );
3614 const int assistants = crafter.available_assistant_count( craft.get_making() );
3615
3616 if( crafting_speed <= 0.0f ) {
3617 crafter.cancel_activity();
3618 return;
3619 }
3620
3621 if( cached_crafting_speed != crafting_speed || cached_assistants != assistants ) {
3622 cached_crafting_speed = crafting_speed;
3623 cached_assistants = assistants;
3624
3625 // Base moves for batch size with no speed modifier or assistants
3626 // Must ensure >= 1 so we don't divide by 0;
3627 cached_base_total_moves = std::max( static_cast<int64_t>( 1 ),
3628 rec.batch_time( crafter, craft.get_making_batch_size(), 1.0f, 0 ) );
3629 // Current expected total moves, includes crafting speed modifiers and assistants
3630 cached_cur_total_moves = std::max( static_cast<int64_t>( 1 ),
3631 rec.batch_time( crafter, craft.get_making_batch_size(), crafting_speed,
3632 assistants ) );
3633 }
3634 const double base_total_moves = cached_base_total_moves;
3635 const double cur_total_moves = cached_cur_total_moves;
3636
3637 // item_counter represents the percent progress relative to the base batch time
3638 // stored precise to 5 decimal places ( e.g. 67.32 percent would be stored as 6'732'000 )
3639 const int old_counter = craft.item_counter;
3640
3641 // Delta progress in moves adjusted for current crafting speed /
3642 //crafter.exertion_adjusted_move_multiplier( exertion_level() )
3643 int spent_moves = crafter.get_moves() * crafter.exertion_adjusted_move_multiplier(
3644 exertion_level() );
3645 const double delta_progress = spent_moves * base_total_moves / cur_total_moves;
3646 // Current progress in moves
3647 const double current_progress = craft.item_counter * base_total_moves / 10'000'000.0 +
3648 delta_progress;
3649 // Current progress as a percent of base_total_moves to 2 decimal places
3650 craft.item_counter = std::round( current_progress / base_total_moves * 10'000'000.0 );
3651 crafter.set_moves( 0 );
3652
3653 // This is to ensure we don't over count skill steps
3654 craft.item_counter = std::min( craft.item_counter, 10'000'000 );
3655
3656 // This nominal craft time is also how many practice ticks to perform
3657 // spread out evenly across the actual duration.
3658 const double total_practice_ticks = rec.time_to_craft_moves( crafter,
3659 recipe_time_flag::ignore_proficiencies ) / 100.0;
3660
3661 const int ticks_per_practice = 10'000'000.0 / total_practice_ticks;
3662 int num_practice_ticks = craft.item_counter / ticks_per_practice -
3663 old_counter / ticks_per_practice;
3664 bool level_up = false;
3665 if( num_practice_ticks > 0 ) {
3666 level_up |= crafter.craft_skill_gain( craft, num_practice_ticks );
3667 }
3668 // Proficiencies and tools are gained/consumed after every 5% progress
3669 int five_percent_steps = craft.item_counter / 500'000 - old_counter / 500'000;
3670 if( five_percent_steps > 0 ) {
3671 // Divide by 100 for seconds, 20 for 5%
3672 const time_duration pct_time = time_duration::from_seconds( base_total_moves / 2000 );
3673 level_up |= crafter.craft_proficiency_gain( craft, pct_time * five_percent_steps );
3674 // Invalidate the crafting time cache because proficiencies may have changed
3675 cached_crafting_speed = 0;
3676 // Also reset the multiplier
3677 use_cached_workbench_multiplier = false;
3678 }
3679
3680 // Unlike skill, tools are consumed once at the start and should not be consumed at the end
3681 if( craft.item_counter >= 10'000'000 ) {
3682 --five_percent_steps;
3683 }
3684
3685 if( five_percent_steps > 0 ) {
3686 if( !crafter.craft_consume_tools( craft, five_percent_steps, false ) ) {
3687 // So we don't skip over any tool comsuption
3688 craft.item_counter -= craft.item_counter % 500'000 + 1;
3689 crafter.cancel_activity();
3690 return;
3691 }
3692 }
3693
3694 // if item_counter has reached 100% or more
3695 if( craft.item_counter >= 10'000'000 ) {
3696 if( rec.is_practice() && !is_long && craft.get_making_batch_size() == 1 ) {
3697 if( query_yn( _( "Keep practicing until proficiency increases?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Keep practicing until proficiency increases?"
) ) ) ) ) {
3698 is_long = true;
3699 *( crafter.last_craft ) = craft_command( &craft.get_making(), 1, is_long, &crafter, location );
3700 }
3701 }
3702 item craft_copy = craft;
3703 craft_item.remove_item();
3704 // We need to cache this before we cancel the activity else we risk Use After Free
3705 const bool will_continue = is_long;
3706 crafter.cancel_activity();
3707 crafter.complete_craft( craft_copy, location );
3708 if( will_continue ) {
3709 if( crafter.making_would_work( crafter.lastrecipe, craft_copy.get_making_batch_size() ) ) {
3710 crafter.last_craft->execute( location );
3711 }
3712 }
3713 } else {
3714 if( level_up && craft.get_making().is_practice() &&
3715 query_yn( _( "Your proficiency has increased. Stop practicing?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your proficiency has increased. Stop practicing?"
) ) ) ) ) {
3716 crafter.cancel_activity();
3717 } else if( craft.item_counter >= craft.get_next_failure_point() ) {
3718 bool destroy = craft.handle_craft_failure( crafter );
3719 // If the craft needs to be destroyed, do it and stop crafting.
3720 if( destroy ) {
3721 crafter.add_msg_player_or_npc( _( "There is nothing left of the %s to craft from." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There is nothing left of the %s to craft from."
) ) ),
3722 _( "There is nothing left of the %s <npcname> was crafting." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There is nothing left of the %s <npcname> was crafting."
) ) ), craft.tname() );
3723 craft_item.remove_item();
3724 crafter.cancel_activity();
3725 }
3726 }
3727 }
3728}
3729
3730void craft_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character & )
3731{
3732 act.set_to_null();
3733}
3734
3735void craft_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &/*act*/, Character &/*who*/ )
3736{
3737 item *craft = craft_item.get_item();
3738 // item_location::get_item() will return nullptr if the item is lost
3739 if( !craft ) {
3740 return;
3741 }
3742 const recipe item_recipe = craft->get_making();
3743 // practice recipe items with no components can be safely removed
3744 if( item_recipe.category == "CC_PRACTICE" && craft->components.empty() ) {
3745 craft_item.remove_item();
3746 }
3747}
3748
