3749std::string craft_activity_actor::get_progress_message( const player_activity & ) const
3750{
3751 if( !craft_item ) {
3752 //We have somehow lost the craft item. This will be handled in do_turn in the check_if_craft_is_ok call.
3753 return "";
3754 }
3755 return craft_item.get_item()->tname();
3756}
3757
3758float craft_activity_actor::exertion_level() const
3759{
3760 return activity_override;
3761}
3762
3763void craft_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3764{
3765 jsout.start_object();
3766
3767 jsout.member( "craft_loc", craft_item );
3768 jsout.member( "long", is_long );
3769 jsout.member( "activity_override", activity_override );
3770
3771 jsout.end_object();
3772}
3773
3774std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> craft_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
3775{
3776 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
3777
3778 craft_activity_actor actor = craft_activity_actor();
3779
3780 data.read( "craft_loc", actor.craft_item );
3781 data.read( "long", actor.is_long );
3782 data.read( "activity_override", actor.activity_override );
3783
3784 return actor.clone();
3785}
3786
3787void workout_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3788{
3789 if( who.get_fatigue() > fatigue_levels::DEAD_TIRED ) {
3790 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You are too tired to exercise." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are too tired to exercise."
) ) ) );
3791 act_id = activity_id::NULL_ID();
3792 act.set_to_null();
3793 return;
3794 }
3795 if( who.get_thirst() > 240 ) {
3796 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You are too dehydrated to exercise." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are too dehydrated to exercise."
) ) ) );
3797 act_id = activity_id::NULL_ID();
3798 act.set_to_null();
3799 return;
3800 }
3801 if( who.is_armed() ) {
3802 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "Empty your hands first." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Empty your hands first." ) )
) );
3803 act_id = activity_id::NULL_ID();
3804 act.set_to_null();
3805 return;
3806 }
3807 map &here = get_map();
3808 // free training requires all limbs intact, but specialized workout machines
3809 // train upper or lower parts of body only and may permit workout with
3810 // broken limbs as long as they are not involved by the machine
3811 bool hand_equipment = here.has_flag_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_WORKOUT_ARMS, location );
3812 bool leg_equipment = here.has_flag_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_WORKOUT_LEGS, location );
3813
3814 if( hand_equipment && ( who.is_limb_broken( body_part_arm_l ) ||
3815 who.is_limb_broken( body_part_arm_r ) ) ) {
3816 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You cannot train here with a broken arm." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot train here with a broken arm."
) ) ) );
3817 act_id = activity_id::NULL_ID();
3818 act.set_to_null();
3819 return;
3820 }
3821 if( leg_equipment && ( who.is_limb_broken( body_part_leg_l ) ||
3822 who.is_limb_broken( body_part_leg_r ) ) ) {
3823 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You cannot train here with a broken leg." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot train here with a broken leg."
) ) ) );
3824 act_id = activity_id::NULL_ID();
3825 act.set_to_null();
3826 return;
3827 }
3828 if( !hand_equipment && !leg_equipment &&
3829 ( who.is_limb_broken( body_part_arm_l ) ||
3830 who.is_limb_broken( body_part_arm_r ) ||
3831 who.is_limb_broken( body_part_leg_l ) ||
3832 who.is_limb_broken( body_part_leg_r ) ) ) {
3833 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You cannot train freely with a broken limb." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You cannot train freely with a broken limb."
) ) ) );
3834 act_id = activity_id::NULL_ID();
3835 act.set_to_null();
3836 return;
3837 }
3838 uilist workout_query;
3839 workout_query.desc_enabled = true;
3840 workout_query.text =
3841 _( "Physical effort determines workout efficiency, but also rate of exhaustion." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Physical effort determines workout efficiency, but also rate of exhaustion."
) ) );
3842 workout_query.title = _( "Choose training intensity:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Choose training intensity:" )
) );
3843 workout_query.addentry_desc( 1, true, 'l', pgettext( "training intensity", "Light" ),
3844 _( "Light exercise comparable in intensity to walking, but more focused and methodical." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Light exercise comparable in intensity to walking, but more focused and methodical."
) ) ) );
3845 workout_query.addentry_desc( 2, true, 'm', pgettext( "training intensity", "Moderate" ),
3846 _( "Moderate exercise without excessive exertion, but with enough effort to break a sweat." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Moderate exercise without excessive exertion, but with enough effort to break a sweat."
) ) ) );
3847 workout_query.addentry_desc( 3, true, 'a', pgettext( "training intensity", "Active" ),
3848 _( "Active exercise with full involvement. Strenuous, but in a controlled manner." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Active exercise with full involvement. Strenuous, but in a controlled manner."
) ) ) );
3849 workout_query.addentry_desc( 4, true, 'h', pgettext( "training intensity", "High" ),
3850 _( "High intensity exercise with maximum effort and full power. Exhausting in the long run." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "High intensity exercise with maximum effort and full power. Exhausting in the long run."
) ) ) );
3851 workout_query.query();
3852 switch( workout_query.ret ) {
3853 case UILIST_CANCEL:
3854 act.set_to_null();
3855 act_id = activity_id::NULL_ID();
3856 return;
3857 case 4:
3858 act_id = ACT_WORKOUT_HARD;
3859 intensity_modifier = 4;
3860 break;
3861 case 3:
3862 act_id = ACT_WORKOUT_ACTIVE;
3863 intensity_modifier = 3;
3864 break;
3865 case 2:
3866 act_id = ACT_WORKOUT_MODERATE;
3867 intensity_modifier = 2;
3868 break;
3869 case 1:
3870 default:
3871 act_id = ACT_WORKOUT_LIGHT;
3872 intensity_modifier = 1;
3873 break;
3874 }
3875 int length;
3876 query_int( length, _( "Train for how long (minutes): " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Train for how long (minutes): "
) ) ) );
3877 if( length > 0 ) {
3878 duration = length * 1_minutes;
3879 } else {
3880 act_id = activity_id::NULL_ID();
3881 act.set_to_null();
3882 return;
3883 }
3884 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( duration );
3885 act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
3886 if( who.male ) {
3887 sfx::play_activity_sound( "plmove", "fatigue_m_med", sfx::get_heard_volume( location ) );
3888 } else {
3889 sfx::play_activity_sound( "plmove", "fatigue_f_med", sfx::get_heard_volume( location ) );
3890 }
3891 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You start your workout session." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You start your workout session."
) ) ) );
3892}
3893
3894void workout_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3895{
3896 if( who.get_fatigue() > fatigue_levels::DEAD_TIRED ) {
3897 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You are exhausted so you finish your workout early." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are exhausted so you finish your workout early."
) ) ) );
3898 act.set_to_null();
3899 return;
3900 }
3901 if( who.get_thirst() > 240 ) {
3902 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You are dehydrated so you finish your workout early." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You are dehydrated so you finish your workout early."
) ) ) );
3903 act.set_to_null();
3904 return;
3905 }
3906 if( !rest_mode && who.get_stamina() > who.get_stamina_max() / 3 ) {
3907 who.mod_stamina( -25 - intensity_modifier );
3908 if( one_in( 180 / intensity_modifier ) ) {
3909 who.mod_fatigue( 1 );
3910 who.mod_thirst( 1 );
3911 }
3912 if( calendar::once_every( 16_minutes / intensity_modifier ) ) {
3913 //~ heavy breathing when exercising
3914 std::string huff = _( "yourself huffing and puffing!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "yourself huffing and puffing!"
) ) );
3915 sounds::sound( location + tripoint_east, 2 * intensity_modifier, sounds::sound_t::speech, huff,
3916 true );
3917 }
3918 // morale bonus kicks in gradually after 5 minutes of exercise
3919 if( calendar::once_every( 2_minutes ) &&
3920 ( ( elapsed + act.moves_total - act.moves_left ) / 100 * 1_turns ) > 5_minutes ) {
3921 who.add_morale( MORALE_FEELING_GOOD, intensity_modifier, 20, 6_hours, 30_minutes );
3922 }
3923 if( calendar::once_every( 2_minutes ) ) {
3924 add_msg_debug_if( who.is_avatar(), debugmode::DF_ACT_WORKOUT, who.activity_level_str() )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_WORKOUT ) && ( who.is_avatar() ) ) { Messages
::add_msg( m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format
( who.activity_level_str() ) ) ); } } while( false );
3925 add_msg_debug_if( who.is_avatar(), debugmode::DF_ACT_WORKOUT, act.id().c_str() )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_WORKOUT ) && ( who.is_avatar() ) ) { Messages
::add_msg( m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format
( act.id().c_str() ) ) ); } } while( false );
3926 }
3927 } else if( !rest_mode ) {
3928 rest_mode = true;
3929 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You catch your breath for few moments." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You catch your breath for few moments."
) ) ) );
3930 } else if( who.get_stamina() >= who.get_stamina_max() ) {
3931 rest_mode = false;
3932 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You get back to your training." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You get back to your training."
) ) ) );
3933 }
3934}
3935
3936void workout_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3937{
3938 if( !query_keep_training( act, who ) ) {
3939 act.set_to_null();
3940 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You finish your workout session." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You finish your workout session."
) ) ) );
3941 }
3942}
3943
3944void workout_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &/*act*/, Character &/*who*/ )
3945{
3946 stop_time = calendar::turn;
3947}
3948
3949bool workout_activity_actor::query_keep_training( player_activity &act, Character &who )
3950{
3951 if( disable_query || !who.is_avatar() ) {
3952 elapsed += act.moves_total - act.moves_left;
3953 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( 60_minutes );
3954 act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
3955 return true;
3956 }
3957 int length;
3958 uilist workout_query;
3959 workout_query.text = _( "You have finished your training cycle, keep training?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You have finished your training cycle, keep training?"
) ) );
3960 workout_query.addentry( 1, true, 'S', _( "Stop training." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Stop training." ) ) ) );
3961 workout_query.addentry( 2, true, 'c', _( "Continue training." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Continue training." ) ) ) );
3962 workout_query.addentry( 3, true, 'C', _( "Continue training and don't ask again." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Continue training and don't ask again."
) ) ) );
3963 workout_query.query();
3964 switch( workout_query.ret ) {
3965 case UILIST_CANCEL:
3966 case 1:
3967 act_id = activity_id::NULL_ID();
3968 act.set_to_null();
3969 return false;
3970 case 3:
3971 disable_query = true;
3972 elapsed += act.moves_total - act.moves_left;
3973 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( 60_minutes );
3974 act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
3975 return true;
3976 case 2:
3977 default:
3978 query_int( length, _( "Train for how long (minutes): " )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Train for how long (minutes): "
) ) ) );
3979 elapsed += act.moves_total - act.moves_left;
3980 duration = 0_minutes;
3981 if( length > 0 ) {
3982 duration = length * 1_minutes;
3983 }
3984 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( duration );
3985 act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
3986 return true;
3987 }
3988}
3989
3990void workout_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
3991{
3992 jsout.start_object();
3993
3994 jsout.member( "disable_query", disable_query );
3995 jsout.member( "act_id", act_id );
3996 jsout.member( "duration", duration );
3997 jsout.member( "location", location );
3998 jsout.member( "stop_time", stop_time );
3999 jsout.member( "elapsed", elapsed );
4000 jsout.member( "intensity_modifier", intensity_modifier );
4001 jsout.member( "rest_mode", rest_mode );
4002
4003 jsout.end_object();
4004}
4005
4006std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> workout_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
4007{
4008 workout_activity_actor actor = workout_activity_actor( tripoint_zero );
4009
4010 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
4011
4012 data.read( "disable_query", actor.disable_query );
4013 data.read( "act_id", actor.act_id );
4014 data.read( "duration", actor.duration );
4015 data.read( "location", actor.location );
4016 data.read( "stop_time", actor.stop_time );
4017 data.read( "elapsed", actor.elapsed );
4018 data.read( "intensity_modifier", actor.intensity_modifier );
4019 data.read( "rest_mode", actor.rest_mode );
4020
4021 return actor.clone();
4022}
4023
4024// TODO: Display costs in the multidrop menu
4025static void debug_drop_list( const std::vector<drop_or_stash_item_info> &items )
4026{
4027 if( !debug_mode ) {
4028 return;
4029 }
4030
4031 std::string res( "Items ordered to drop:\n" );
4032 for( const drop_or_stash_item_info &it : items ) {
4033 item_location loc = it.loc();
4034 if( !loc ) {
4035 // some items could have been destroyed by e.g. monster attack
4036 continue;
4037 }
4038 res += string_format( "Drop %d %s\n", it.count(), loc->display_name( it.count() ) );
4039 }
4040 popup( res, PF_GET_KEY );
4041}
4042
4043static bool is_bulk_unload( const item_location &lhs, const item_location &rhs )
4044{
4045 if( lhs.where() == item_location::type::container &&
4046 rhs.where() == item_location::type::container && lhs.parent_item() == rhs.parent_item() ) {
4047 return true;
4048 }
4049 return false;
4050}
4051
4052// Return a list of items to be dropped by the given item-dropping activity in the current turn.
4053static std::list<item> obtain_activity_items( std::vector<drop_or_stash_item_info> &items,
4054 contents_change_handler &handler, Character &who, bool &bulk_unload )
4055{
4056 std::list<item> res;
4057
4058 debug_drop_list( items );
4059
4060 auto it = items.begin();
4061 for( ; it != items.end(); ++it ) {
4062 item_location loc = it->loc();
4063 if( !loc ) {
4064 // some items could have been destroyed by e.g. monster attack
4065 continue;
4066 }
4067
4068 int consumed_moves;
4069 if( !bulk_unload ) {
4070 // Cost to take an item from a container or map
4071 consumed_moves = loc.obtain_cost( who, it->count() );
4072 } else {
4073 // Pure cost to handling item excluding overhead.
4074 consumed_moves = std::max( who.item_handling_cost( *loc, true, 0, it->count(), true ), 1 );
4075 }
4076 if( !who.is_npc() && who.moves <= 0 && consumed_moves > 0 ) {
4077 break;
4078 }
4079
4080 // Check if next is bulk unload before moving item.
4081 auto it_next = std::next( it );
4082 if( it_next != items.end() && it_next->loc() ) {
4083 bulk_unload = is_bulk_unload( loc, it_next->loc() );
4084 }
4085
4086 who.mod_moves( -consumed_moves );
4087
4088 // If item is inside another (container/pocket), unseal it, and update encumbrance
4089 if( loc.has_parent() ) {
4090 // Save parent items to be handled when finishing or canceling activity,
4091 // in case there are still other items to drop from the same container.
4092 // This assumes that an item and any of its parents/ancestors are not
4093 // dropped at the same time.
4094 handler.unseal_pocket_containing( loc );
4095 } else {
4096 // when parent's encumbrance cannot be marked as dirty,
4097 // mark character's encumbrance as dirty instead (correctness over performance)
4098 who.set_check_encumbrance( true );
4099 }
4100
4101 // Take off the item or remove it from where it's been
4102 if( loc.where_recursive() == item_location::type::map ||
4103 loc.where_recursive() == item_location::type::vehicle ) {
4104 item copy( *loc );
4105 if( loc->count_by_charges() && loc->count() > it->count() ) {
4106 copy.charges -= it->count();
4107 }
4108 loc.remove_item();
4109 res.push_back( copy );
4110 } else if( who.is_worn( *loc ) ) {
4111 who.takeoff( loc, &res );
4112 } else if( loc->count_by_charges() ) {
4113 res.push_back( who.reduce_charges( &*loc, it->count() ) );
4114 } else {
4115 res.push_back( who.i_rem( &*loc ) );
4116 }
4117 }
4118
4119 // Remove handled items from activity
4120 items.erase( items.begin(), it );
4121 return res;
4122}
4123
4124void drop_or_stash_item_info::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
4125{
4126 jsout.start_object();
4127 jsout.member( "loc", _loc );
4128 jsout.member( "count", _count );
4129 jsout.end_object();
4130}
4131
4132void drop_or_stash_item_info::deserialize( const JsonObject &jsobj )
4133{
4134 jsobj.read( "loc", _loc );
4135 jsobj.read( "count", _count );
4136}
4137
4138void drop_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &, Character &who )
4139{
4140 const tripoint_bub_ms pos = placement + who.pos_bub();
4141 put_into_vehicle_or_drop( who, item_drop_reason::deliberate,
4142 obtain_activity_items( items, handler, who, current_bulk_unload ),
4143 pos, force_ground );
4144 // Cancel activity if items is empty. Otherwise, we modified in place and we will continue
4145 // to resolve the drop next turn. This is different from the pickup logic which creates
4146 // a brand new activity every turn and cancels the old activity
4147 if( items.empty() ) {
4148 who.cancel_activity();
4149 }
4150}
4151
4152void drop_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &, Character &who )
4153{
4154 handler.handle_by( who );
4155}
4156
4157void drop_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
4158{
4159 jsout.start_object();
4160 jsout.member( "items", items );
4161 jsout.member( "unhandled_containers", handler );
4162 jsout.member( "placement", placement );
4163 jsout.member( "force_ground", force_ground );
4164 jsout.member( "current_bulk_unload", current_bulk_unload );
4165 jsout.end_object();
4166}
4167
4168std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> drop_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
4169{
4170 drop_activity_actor actor;
4171
4172 JsonObject jsobj = jsin.get_object();
4173 jsobj.read( "items", actor.items );
4174 jsobj.read( "unhandled_containers", actor.handler );
4175 jsobj.read( "placement", actor.placement );
4176 jsobj.read( "force_ground", actor.force_ground );
4177 jsobj.read( "current_bulk_unload", actor.current_bulk_unload );
4178
4179 return actor.clone();
4180}
4181
4182void harvest_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &who )
4183{
4184 map &here = get_map();
4185
4186 if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
4187 const furn_id furn = here.furn( target );
4188
4189 if( furn->has_examine( iexamine::harvest_furn ) ) {
4190 exam_furn = true;
4191 } else if( furn->has_examine( iexamine::harvest_furn_nectar ) ) {
4192 exam_furn = true;
4193 nectar = true;
4194 }
4195 }
4196
4197 const harvest_id harvest = here.get_harvest( target );
4198 if( harvest.is_null() || harvest->empty() ) {
4199 if( !auto_forage ) {
4200 who.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
4201 _( "Nothing can be harvested from this plant in the current season." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Nothing can be harvested from this plant in the current season."
) ) ) );
4202 }
4203
4204 if( who.manual_examine ) {
4205 iexamine::none( who, target );
4206 }
4207
4208 act.set_to_null();
4209 return;
4210 }
4211
4212 const time_duration forage_time = rng( 5_seconds, 15_seconds );
4213 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_HARVEST, "harvest time: %s", to_string_writable( forage_time ) )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_HARVEST ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg(
m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "harvest time: %s"
, to_string_writable( forage_time ) ) ) ); } } while( false );
4214 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( forage_time );
4215 act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
4216}
4217
4218void harvest_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
4219{
4220 act.set_to_null();
4221
4222 map &here = get_map();
4223
4224 // If nothing can be harvested, neither can nectar
4225 // Incredibly low priority TODO: Allow separating nectar seasons
4226 if( nectar && iexamine_helper::drink_nectar( who ) ) {
4227 return;
4228 }
4229
4230 const float survival_skill = who.get_skill_level( skill_survival );
4231 bool got_anything = false;
4232 for( const harvest_entry &entry : here.get_harvest( target ).obj() ) {
4233 const float min_num = entry.scale_num.first * survival_skill + entry.base_num.first;
4234 const float max_num = entry.scale_num.second * survival_skill + entry.base_num.second;
4235 const int roll = std::min<int>( entry.max, std::round( rng_float( min_num, max_num ) ) );
4236 got_anything = roll > 0;
4237 for( int i = 0; i < roll; i++ ) {
4238 iexamine_helper::handle_harvest( who, entry.drop, false );
4239 }
4240 }
4241
4242 if( !got_anything ) {
4243 who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You couldn't harvest anything." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You couldn't harvest anything."
) ) ) );
4244 }
4245
4246 if( exam_furn ) {
4247 here.furn_set( target, f_null );
4248 } else {
4249 here.ter_set( target, here.get_ter_transforms_into( target ) );
4250 }
4251
4252 iexamine::practice_survival_while_foraging( who );
4253}
4254
4255void harvest_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
4256{
4257 jsout.start_object();
4258 jsout.member( "target", target );
4259 jsout.member( "exam_furn", exam_furn );
4260 jsout.member( "nectar", nectar );
4261 jsout.member( "auto_forage", auto_forage );
4262 jsout.end_object();
4263}
4264
4265std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> harvest_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
4266{
4267 harvest_activity_actor actor( tripoint_zero );
4268
4269 JsonObject jsobj = jsin.get_object();
4270 jsobj.read( "target", actor.target );
4271 jsobj.read( "exam_furn", actor.exam_furn );
4272 jsobj.read( "nectar", actor.nectar );
4273 jsobj.read( "auto_forage", actor.auto_forage );
4274 return actor.clone();
4275}
4276
4277static void stash_on_pet( const std::list<item> &items, monster &pet, Character &who )
4278{
4279 units::volume remaining_volume = pet.storage_item->get_total_capacity() - pet.get_carried_volume();
4280 units::mass remaining_weight = pet.weight_capacity() - pet.get_carried_weight();
4281 map &here = get_map();
4282
4283 for( const item &it : items ) {
4284 if( it.volume() > remaining_volume ) {
4285 add_msg( m_bad, _( "%1$s did not fit and fell to the %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s did not fit and fell to the %2$s."
) ) ), it.display_name(),
4286 here.name( pet.pos() ) );
4287 here.add_item_or_charges( pet.pos(), it );
4288 } else if( it.weight() > remaining_weight ) {
4289 add_msg( m_bad, _( "%1$s is too heavy and fell to the %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s is too heavy and fell to the %2$s."
) ) ), it.display_name(),
4290 here.name( pet.pos() ) );
4291 here.add_item_or_charges( pet.pos(), it );
4292 } else {
4293 pet.add_item( it );
4294 remaining_volume -= it.volume();
4295 remaining_weight -= it.weight();
4296 }
4297 // TODO: if NPCs can have pets or move items onto pets
4298 item( it ).handle_pickup_ownership( who );
4299 }
4300}
4301
4302void stash_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &, Character &who )
4303{
4304 const tripoint pos = placement + who.pos();
4305
4306 monster *pet = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( pos );
4307 if( pet != nullptr && pet->has_effect( effect_pet ) ) {
4308 stash_on_pet( obtain_activity_items( items, handler, who, current_bulk_unload ),
4309 *pet, who );
4310 if( items.empty() ) {
4311 who.cancel_activity();
4312 }
4313 } else {
4314 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "The pet has moved somewhere else." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The pet has moved somewhere else."
) ) ) );
4315 who.cancel_activity();
4316 }
4317}
4318
4319void stash_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &, Character &who )
4320{
4321 handler.handle_by( who );
4322}
4323
4324void stash_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
4325{
4326 jsout.start_object();
4327 jsout.member( "items", items );
4328 jsout.member( "unhandled_containers", handler );
4329 jsout.member( "placement", placement );
4330 jsout.member( "current_bulk_unload", current_bulk_unload );
4331 jsout.end_object();
4332}
4333
4334std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> stash_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
4335{
4336 stash_activity_actor actor;
4337
4338 JsonObject jsobj = jsin.get_object();
4339 jsobj.read( "items", actor.items );
4340 jsobj.read( "unhandled_containers", actor.handler );
4341 jsobj.read( "placement", actor.placement );
4342 jsobj.read( "current_bulk_unload", actor.current_bulk_unload );
4343
4344 return actor.clone();
4345}
4346
4347void disable_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &/*who*/ )
4348{
4349 act.moves_total = moves_total;
4350 act.moves_left = moves_total;
4351 monster &critter = *get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( target );
4352 critter.add_effect( effect_worked_on, 1_turns );
4353}
4354
4355void disable_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &, Character &who )
4356{
4357 monster *const mon_ptr = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( target );
4358 if( !mon_ptr ) {
4359 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "The robot has moved somewhere else." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The robot has moved somewhere else."
) ) ) );
4360 who.cancel_activity();
4361 return;
4362 }
4363
4364 monster &critter = *mon_ptr;
4365 if( !can_disable_or_reprogram( critter ) ) {
4366 // I think recovery from stunned is the only reason this could happen
4367 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "The %s recovers before you can finish." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s recovers before you can finish."
) ) ), critter.name() );
4368 who.cancel_activity();
4369 return;
4370 }
4371
4372 critter.add_effect( effect_worked_on, 1_turns );
4373}
4374
4375void disable_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &/*who*/ )
4376{
4377 // Should never be null as we just checked in do_turn
4378 monster &critter = *get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( target );
4379
4380 if( reprogram ) {
4381 if( critter.has_effect( effect_docile ) ) {
4382 critter.remove_effect( effect_docile );
4383 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
4384 add_msg( _( "The %s hovers momentarily as it surveys the area." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s hovers momentarily as it surveys the area."
) ) ),
4385 critter.name() );
4386 }
4387 } else {
4388 critter.add_effect( effect_docile, 1_turns, true );
4389 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
4390 add_msg( _( "The %s lets out a whirring noise and starts to follow you." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s lets out a whirring noise and starts to follow you."
) ) ),
4391 critter.name() );
4392 }
4393 }
4394 } else {
4395 get_map().add_item_or_charges( target, critter.to_item() );
4396 if( !critter.has_flag( mon_flag_INTERIOR_AMMO ) ) {
4397 for( std::pair<const itype_id, int> &ammodef : critter.ammo ) {
4398 if( ammodef.second > 0 ) {
4399 get_map().spawn_item( target.xy(), ammodef.first, 1, ammodef.second, calendar::turn );
4400 }
4401 }
4402 }
4403 g->remove_zombie( critter );
4404 }
4405
4406 act.set_to_null();
4407}
4408
4409bool disable_activity_actor::can_disable_or_reprogram( const monster &monster )
4410{
4411 if( get_avatar().get_knowledge_level( skill_electronics ) + get_avatar().get_knowledge_level(
4412 skill_mechanics ) <= 0 ) {
4413 return false;
4414 }
4415
4416 return ( ( monster.friendly != 0 || monster.has_effect( effect_sensor_stun ) ) &&
4417 !monster.has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) &&
4418 !( monster.has_flag( mon_flag_PAY_BOT ) && monster.has_effect( effect_paid ) ) ) &&
4419 ( !monster.type->revert_to_itype.is_empty() || monster.type->id == mon_manhack );
4420}
4421
4422int disable_activity_actor::get_disable_turns()
4423{
4424 const float elec_skill = get_avatar().get_skill_level( skill_electronics );
4425 const float mech_skill = get_avatar().get_skill_level( skill_mechanics );
4426 const float time_scale = std::max( elec_skill + mech_skill, 1.0f );
4427 return 2000 / time_scale;
4428}
4429
4430void disable_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
4431{
4432 jsout.start_object();
4433 jsout.member( "target", target );
4434 jsout.member( "reprogram", reprogram );
4435 jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
4436 jsout.end_object();
4437}
4438
4439std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> disable_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
4440{
4441 disable_activity_actor actor = disable_activity_actor();
4442
4443 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
4444
4445 data.read( "target", actor.target );
4446 data.read( "reprogram", actor.reprogram );
4447 data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
4448
4449 return actor.clone();
4450}
4451
4452void move_furniture_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
4453{
4454 int moves = g->grabbed_furn_move_time( dp );
4455 act.moves_left = moves;
4456 act.moves_total = moves;
4457}
4458
4459void move_furniture_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
4460{
4461 if( !g->grabbed_furn_move( dp ) ) {
4462 g->walk_move( who.pos() + dp, via_ramp, true );
4463 }
4464 act.set_to_null();
4465}
4466
4467void move_furniture_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &, Character & )
4468{
4469 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You let go of the grabbed object." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You let go of the grabbed object."
) ) ) );
4470 get_avatar().grab( object_type::NONE );
4471}
4472
4473void move_furniture_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
4474{
4475 jsout.start_object();
4476 jsout.member( "dp", dp );
4477 jsout.member( "via_ramp", via_ramp );
4478 jsout.end_object();
4479}
4480
4481std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> move_furniture_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
4482{
4483 move_furniture_activity_actor actor = move_furniture_activity_actor( tripoint_zero, false );
4484
4485 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
4486
4487 data.read( "dp", actor.dp );
4488 data.read( "via_ramp", actor.via_ramp );
4489
4490 return actor.clone();
4491}
4492
4493static int item_move_cost( Character &who, item_location &item, bool bulk_cost )
4494{
4495 if( !bulk_cost ) {
4496 // Cost to take an item from a container or map
4497 const int obtain_cost = item.obtain_cost( who );
4498 // Cost to move an item to a container, vehicle or the ground
4499 const int move_cost = Pickup::cost_to_move_item( who, *item );
4500 return obtain_cost + move_cost;
4501 } else {
4502 // Pure cost to handling item excluding overhead.
4503 return std::max( who.item_handling_cost( *item, true, 0, -1, true ), 1 );
4504 }
4505}
4506
4507static bool is_bulk_load( const item_location &lhs, const item_location &rhs )
4508{
4509 if( lhs.where() == rhs.where() && lhs->stacks_with( *rhs ) ) {
4510 switch( lhs.where() ) {
4511 case item_location::type::container:
4512 return lhs.parent_item() == rhs.parent_item();
4513 break;
4514 case item_location::type::map:
4515 case item_location::type::vehicle:
4516 return lhs.position() == rhs.position();
4517 break;
4518 default:
4519 break;
4520 }
4521 }
4522 return false;
4523}
4524
4525void insert_item_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &who )
4526{
4527 if( items.empty() ) {
4528 debugmsg( "ACT_INSERT_ITEM was passed an empty list" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "4528", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "ACT_INSERT_ITEM was passed an empty list"
);
4529 act.set_to_null();
4530 }
4531
4532 all_pockets_rigid = holster->all_pockets_rigid();
4533
4534 const int total_moves = item_move_cost( who, items.front().first, false );
4535 act.moves_left = total_moves;
4536 act.moves_total = total_moves;
4537}
4538
4539static ret_val<void> try_insert( item_location &holster, drop_location &holstered_item,
4540 int *charges_added, Character *carrier )
4541{
4542 item &it = *holstered_item.first;
4543 ret_val<void> ret = ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "item can't be stored there" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "item can't be stored there" )
) ) );
4544
4545 if( charges_added == nullptr ) {
4546 if( it.is_bucket_nonempty() ) {
4547 debugmsg( "ACT_INSERT_ITEM tried to stash a spillable container without spilling its contents first" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "4547", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "ACT_INSERT_ITEM tried to stash a spillable container without spilling its contents first"
);
4548 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "item would spill" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "item would spill" ) ) ) );
4549 }
4550 ret = holster->can_contain_directly( it );
4551 if( !ret.success() ) {
4552 return ret;
4553 }
4554 ret = holster.parents_can_contain_recursive( &it );
4555 if( !ret.success() ) {
4556 return ret;
4557 }
4558
4559 return holster->put_in( it, pocket_type::CONTAINER, /*unseal_pockets=*/true, carrier );
4560 }
4561
4562 ret = holster->can_contain_partial_directly( it );
4563 if( !ret.success() ) {
4564 return ret;
4565 }
4566 ret_val<int> max_parent_charges = holster.max_charges_by_parent_recursive( it );
4567 if( !max_parent_charges.success() ) {
4568 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( max_parent_charges.str() );
4569 }
4570 int charges_to_insert = std::min( holstered_item.second, max_parent_charges.value() );
4571 *charges_added = holster->fill_with( it, charges_to_insert, /*unseal_pockets=*/true,
4572 /*allow_sealed=*/true, /*ignore_settings*/true, /*into_bottom*/true, carrier );
4573 if( *charges_added <= 0 ) {
4574 return ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "item can't be stored there" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "item can't be stored there" )
) ) );
4575 }
4576
4577 return ret;
4578}
4579
4580void insert_item_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
4581{
4582 bool success = false;
4583 bool bulk_load = false;
4584 Character *carrier = holster.carrier();
4585 drop_location &holstered_item = items.front();
4586 if( holstered_item.first ) {
4587 success = true;
4588 item &it = *holstered_item.first;
4589 // Check if next is bulk load before moving item.
4590 auto itr = std::next( items.begin() );
4591 if( itr != items.end() && itr->first ) {
4592 bulk_load = is_bulk_load( holstered_item.first, itr->first );
4593 }
4594 ret_val<void> ret = ret_val<void>::make_failure( _( "item can't be stored there" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "item can't be stored there" )
) ) );
4595
4596 if( !it.count_by_charges() ) {
4597 ret = try_insert( holster, holstered_item, nullptr, carrier );
4598
4599 if( ret.success() ) {
4600 //~ %1$s: item to put in the container, %2$s: container to put item in
4601 who.add_msg_if_player( string_format( _( "You put your %1$s into the %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You put your %1$s into the %2$s."
) ) ),
4602 holstered_item.first->display_name(), holster->type->nname( 1 ) ) );
4603 handler.add_unsealed( holster );
4604 handler.unseal_pocket_containing( holstered_item.first );
4605 holstered_item.first.remove_item();
4606 }
4607 } else {
4608 int charges_added = 0;
4609 ret = try_insert( holster, holstered_item, &charges_added, carrier );
4610
4611 if( ret.success() ) {
4612 item copy( it );
4613 copy.charges = charges_added;
4614 //~ %1$s: item to put in the container, %2$s: container to put item in
4615 who.add_msg_if_player( string_format( _( "You put your %1$s into the %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You put your %1$s into the %2$s."
) ) ),
4616 copy.display_name(), holster->type->nname( 1 ) ) );
4617 handler.add_unsealed( holster );
4618 handler.unseal_pocket_containing( holstered_item.first );
4619 it.charges -= charges_added;
4620 if( it.charges == 0 ) {
4621 holstered_item.first.remove_item();
4622 }
4623 }
4624 }
4625
4626 if( !ret.success() ) {
4627 success = false;
4628 std::string error = ret.str().empty() ?
4629 //~ %1$s: item we failed to put in the container, %2$s: container to put item in
4630 string_format( _( "Could not put %1$s into %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Could not put %1$s into %2$s."
) ) ),
4631 it.tname(), holster->tname() ) :
4632 //~ %1$s: item we failed to put in the container, %2$s: container to put item in, %3$s: reason it failed
4633 string_format( _( "Could not put %1$s into %2$s, %3$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Could not put %1$s into %2$s, %3$s."
) ) ),
4634 it.tname(), holster->tname(), ret.str() );
4635 who.add_msg_if_player( error );
4636 }
4637 } else {
4638 // item was lost, so just go to next item
4639 success = true;
4640 }
4641
4642 drop_locations items_remain;
4643 if( who.is_avatar() && reopen_menu && !success ) {
4644 items_remain.insert( items_remain.end(), items.begin(), items.end() );
4645 }
4646
4647 items.pop_front();
4648 if( items.empty() || !success || items.front().first == item_location::nowhere ) {
4649 holster.make_active();
4650 handler.handle_by( who );
4651 act.set_to_null();
4652 if( !items_remain.empty() ) {
4653 g->insert_item( items_remain );
4654 }
4655 return;
4656 }
4657
4658 // Restart the activity
4659 const int total_moves = item_move_cost( who, items.front().first, bulk_load );
4660 act.moves_left = total_moves;
4661 act.moves_total = total_moves;
4662}
4663
4664void insert_item_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &/*act*/, Character &who )
4665{
4666 handler.handle_by( who );
4667}
4668
4669void insert_item_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
4670{
4671 jsout.start_object();
4672
4673 jsout.member( "holster", holster );
4674 jsout.member( "items", items );
4675 jsout.member( "handler", handler );
4676 jsout.member( "all_pockets_rigid", all_pockets_rigid );
4677 jsout.member( "reopen_menu", reopen_menu );
4678
4679 jsout.end_object();
4680}
4681
4682std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> insert_item_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
4683{
4684 insert_item_activity_actor actor;
4685
4686 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
4687
4688 data.read( "holster", actor.holster );
4689 data.read( "items", actor.items );
4690 data.read( "handler", actor.handler );
4691 data.read( "all_pockets_rigid", actor.all_pockets_rigid );
4692 data.read( "reopen_menu", actor.reopen_menu );
4693
4694 return actor.clone();
4695}
4696
4697reload_activity_actor::reload_activity_actor( item::reload_option &&opt, int extra_moves )
4698{
4699 moves_total = opt.moves() + extra_moves;
4700 quantity = opt.qty();
4701 target_loc = std::move( opt.target );
4702 ammo_loc = std::move( opt.ammo );
4703}
4704
4705bool reload_activity_actor::can_reload() const
4706{
4707 if( quantity <= 0 ) {
4708 debugmsg( "invalid arguments to ACT_RELOAD" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "4708", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "invalid arguments to ACT_RELOAD"
);
4709 return false;
4710 }
4711
4712 if( !target_loc ) {
4713 debugmsg( "reload target is null, failed to reload" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "4713", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "reload target is null, failed to reload"
);
4714 return false;
4715 }
4716
4717 if( !ammo_loc ) {
4718 debugmsg( "ammo target is null, failed to reload" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "4718", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "ammo target is null, failed to reload"
);
4719 return false;
4720 }
4721
4722 return true;
4723}
4724
4725void reload_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &/*who*/ )
4726{
4727 act.moves_total = moves_total;
4728 act.moves_left = moves_total;
4729}
4730
4731void reload_activity_actor::make_reload_sound( Character &who, item &reloadable )
4732{
4733 if( reloadable.type->gun->reload_noise_volume > 0 ) {
4734 sfx::play_variant_sound( "reload", reloadable.typeId().str(),
4735 sfx::get_heard_volume( who.pos() ) );
4736 sounds::ambient_sound( who.pos(), reloadable.type->gun->reload_noise_volume,
4737 sounds::sound_t::activity, reloadable.type->gun->reload_noise.translated() );
4738 }
4739}
4740
4741void reload_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
4742{
4743 act.set_to_null();
4744 if( !can_reload() ) {
4745 return;
4746 }
4747
4748 item &reloadable = *target_loc;
4749 item &ammo = *ammo_loc;
4750 const std::string reloadable_name = reloadable.tname();
4751 // cache check results because reloading deletes the ammo item
4752 const std::string ammo_name = ammo.tname();
4753 const bool ammo_is_filthy = ammo.is_filthy();
4754 const bool ammo_uses_speedloader = ammo.has_flag( flag_SPEEDLOADER );
4755
4756 if( !reloadable.reload( who, std::move( ammo_loc ), quantity ) ) {
4757 add_msg( m_info, _( "Can't reload the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Can't reload the %s." ) ) ), reloadable_name );
4758 return;
4759 }
4760
4761 if( ammo_is_filthy ) {
4762 reloadable.set_flag( flag_FILTHY );
4763 }
4764
4765 if( reloadable.get_var( "dirt", 0 ) > 7800 ) {
4766 add_msg( m_neutral, _( "You manage to loosen some debris and make your %s somewhat operational." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You manage to loosen some debris and make your %s somewhat operational."
) ) ),
4767 reloadable_name );
4768 reloadable.set_var( "dirt", ( reloadable.get_var( "dirt", 0 ) - rng( 790, 2750 ) ) );
4769 }
4770
4771 if( reloadable.is_gun() ) {
4772 if( reloadable.has_flag( flag_RELOAD_ONE ) && !ammo_uses_speedloader ) {
4773 add_msg( m_neutral, _( "You insert %dx %s into the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You insert %dx %s into the %s."
) ) ), quantity, ammo_name, reloadable_name );
4774 }
4775 make_reload_sound( who, reloadable );
4776 } else if( reloadable.is_watertight_container() ) {
4777 add_msg( m_neutral, _( "You refill the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You refill the %s." ) ) ), reloadable_name );
4778 } else {
4779 add_msg( m_neutral, _( "You reload the %1$s with %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You reload the %1$s with %2$s."
) ) ), reloadable_name, ammo_name );
4780 }
4781
4782 who.recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
4783
4784 item_location loc = target_loc;
4785 // Reload may have caused the item to increase in size more than the pocket/location can contain.
4786 // We want to avoid this because items will be deleted on a save/load.
4787 if( loc.check_parent_capacity_recursive() ) {
4788 return;
4789 }
4790
4791 // Attempt to put item in another pocket before prompting
4792 if( who.try_add( reloadable, nullptr, nullptr, false ) != item_location::nowhere ) {
4793 // try_add copied the old item, so remove it now.
4794 loc.remove_item();
4795 return;
4796 }
4797
4798 // Build prompt
4799 uilist reload_query;
4800 const bool wield_check = who.can_wield( reloadable ).success();
4801 reload_query.text = string_format( _( "The %s no longer fits in your inventory" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s no longer fits in your inventory"
) ) ),
4802 reloadable_name );
4803 if( who.has_wield_conflicts( reloadable ) ) {
4804 reload_query.addentry( 1, wield_check, 'w',
4805 _( "Dispose of %s and wield %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Dispose of %s and wield %s" )
) ), who.get_wielded_item()->display_name(),
4806 reloadable_name );
4807 } else {
4808 reload_query.addentry( 1, wield_check, 'w', _( "Wield %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Wield %s" ) ) ), reloadable_name );
4809 }
4810 reload_query.addentry( 2, true, 'd', _( "Drop %s" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Drop %s" ) ) ), reloadable_name );
4811 reload_query.query();
4812
4813 switch( reload_query.ret ) {
4814 case 1:
4815 // This case is only reachable if wield_check is true
4816 who.wield( reloadable );
4817 add_msg( m_neutral, _( "The %s no longer fits in your inventory so you wield it instead." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s no longer fits in your inventory so you wield it instead."
) ) ),
4818 reloadable_name );
4819 break;
4820 case 2:
4821 default:
4822 // In player inventory and player is wielding something.
4823 loc.carrier()->add_msg_if_player( m_neutral,
4824 _( "The %s no longer fits in your inventory so you drop it instead." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s no longer fits in your inventory so you drop it instead."
) ) ),
4825 reloadable_name );
4826 get_map().add_item_or_charges( loc.position(), reloadable );
4827 loc.remove_item();
4828 break;
4829 }
4830}
4831
4832void reload_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &act, Character &/*who*/ )
4833{
4834 act.moves_total = 0;
4835 act.moves_left = 0;
4836}
4837
4838void reload_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
4839{
4840 jsout.start_object();
4841
4842 jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
4843 jsout.member( "qty", quantity );
4844 jsout.member( "target_loc", target_loc );
4845 jsout.member( "ammo_loc", ammo_loc );
4846
4847 jsout.end_object();
4848}
4849
4850std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> reload_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
4851{
4852 reload_activity_actor actor;
4853
4854 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
4855
4856 data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
4857 data.read( "qty", actor.quantity );
4858 data.read( "target_loc", actor.target_loc );
4859 data.read( "ammo_loc", actor.ammo_loc );
4860 return actor.clone();
4861}
4862
4863void milk_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &/*who*/ )
4864{
4865 act.moves_total = total_moves;
4866 act.moves_left = total_moves;
4867}
4868
4869void milk_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
4870{
4871 if( monster_coords.empty() ) {
4872 debugmsg( "milking activity with no position of monster stored" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "4872", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "milking activity with no position of monster stored"
);
4873 act.set_to_null();
4874 return;
4875 }
4876 map &here = get_map();
4877 const tripoint source_pos = here.getlocal( monster_coords.at( 0 ) );
4878 monster *source_mon = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( source_pos );
4879 if( source_mon == nullptr ) {
4880 // We might end up here if the creature dies while being milked
4881 who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "The udders slip out of your hands." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The udders slip out of your hands."
) ) ) );
4882 act.set_to_null();
4883 }
4884}
4885
4886void milk_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
4887{
4888 act.set_to_null();
4889 if( monster_coords.empty() ) {
4890 debugmsg( "milking activity with no position of monster stored" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "4890", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "milking activity with no position of monster stored"
);
4891 return;
4892 }
4893 map &here = get_map();
4894 const tripoint source_pos = here.getlocal( monster_coords.at( 0 ) );
4895 monster *source_mon = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( source_pos );
4896 if( source_mon == nullptr ) {
4897 debugmsg( "could not find source creature for liquid transfer" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "4897", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "could not find source creature for liquid transfer"
);
4898 return;
4899 }
4900 auto milked_item = source_mon->ammo.find( source_mon->type->starting_ammo.begin()->first );
4901 if( milked_item == source_mon->ammo.end() ) {
4902 debugmsg( "animal has no milkable ammo type" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "4902", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "animal has no milkable ammo type"
);
4903 return;
4904 }
4905 if( milked_item->second <= 0 ) {
4906 debugmsg( "started milking but udders are now empty before milking finishes" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "4906", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "started milking but udders are now empty before milking finishes"
);
4907 return;
4908 }
4909 item milk( milked_item->first, calendar::turn, milked_item->second );
4910 milk.set_item_temperature( units::from_celsius( 38.6 ) );
4911 if( liquid_handler::handle_liquid( milk, nullptr, 1, nullptr, nullptr, -1, source_mon ) ) {
4912 milked_item->second = 0;
4913 if( milk.charges > 0 ) {
4914 milked_item->second = milk.charges;
4915 } else {
4916 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "The %s's udders run dry." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "The %s's udders run dry." ) )
), source_mon->get_name() );
4917 }
4918 }
4919 // if the monster was not manually tied up, but needed to be fixed in place temporarily then
4920 // remove that now.
4921 if( !string_values.empty() && string_values[0] == "temp_tie" ) {
4922 source_mon->remove_effect( effect_tied );
4923 }
4924}
4925
4926void milk_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
4927{
4928 jsout.start_object();
4929
4930 jsout.member( "total_moves", total_moves );
4931 jsout.member( "monster_coords", monster_coords );
4932 jsout.member( "string_values", string_values );
4933
4934 jsout.end_object();
4935}
4936
4937std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> milk_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
4938{
4939 milk_activity_actor actor;
4940 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
4941
4942 data.read( "moves_total", actor.total_moves );
4943 data.read( "monster_coords", actor.monster_coords );
4944 data.read( "string_values", actor.string_values );
4945
4946 return actor.clone();
4947}
4948
4949void shearing_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &who )
4950{
4951 monster *mon = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( mon_coords );
4952 if( !mon ) {
4953 debugmsg( "shearing lost monster when starting" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "4953", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "shearing lost monster when starting"
);
4954 act.set_to_null();
4955 return;
4956 }
4957
4958 std::string pet_name_capitalized = mon->unique_name.empty() ? mon->disp_name( false,
4959 true ) : mon->unique_name;
4960
4961 if( !mon->shearable() ) {
4962 add_msg( _( "%1$s has nothing %2$s could shear." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s has nothing %2$s could shear."
) ) ), pet_name_capitalized, who.disp_name() );
4963 if( shearing_tie ) {
4964 mon->remove_effect( effect_tied );
4965 }
4966 act.set_to_null();
4967 return;
4968 }
4969
4970 const int shearing_quality = who.max_quality( qual_SHEAR );
4971 if( !( shearing_quality > 0 ) ) {
4972 if( who.is_avatar() ) {
4973 add_msg( m_info, _( "%1$s don't have a shearing tool." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s don't have a shearing tool."
) ) ), who.disp_name( false, true ) );
4974 } else { // who.is_npc
4975 // npcs can't shear monsters yet, this is for when they are able to
4976 add_msg_if_player_sees( who, _( "%1$s doesn't have a shearing tool." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s doesn't have a shearing tool."
) ) ), who.disp_name(),
4977 mon->disp_name() );
4978 }
4979 if( shearing_tie ) {
4980 mon->remove_effect( effect_tied );
4981 }
4982 act.set_to_null();
4983 return;
4984 }
4985
4986 const time_duration shearing_time = 30_minutes / shearing_quality;
4987 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACT_SHEARING, "shearing_time time = %s",do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_SHEARING ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg
( m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "shearing_time time = %s"
, to_string_writable( shearing_time ) ) ) ); } } while( false
)
4988 to_string_writable( shearing_time ) )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACT_SHEARING ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg
( m_debug, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "shearing_time time = %s"
, to_string_writable( shearing_time ) ) ) ); } } while( false
);
4989
4990 if( who.is_avatar() ) {
4991 add_msg( m_info,
4992 _( "%1$s start shearing %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s start shearing %2$s." )
) ), who.disp_name( false, true ), mon->disp_name() );
4993 } else { // who.is_npc
4994 // npcs can't shear monsters yet, this is for when they are able to
4995 add_msg_if_player_sees( who, _( "%1$s starts shearing %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s starts shearing %2$s." )
) ), who.disp_name(),
4996 mon->disp_name() );
4997 }
4998
4999 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( shearing_time );
5000 act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
5001}
5002
5003void shearing_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &, Character &who )
5004{
5005 if( !who.has_quality( qual_SHEAR ) ) {
5006 if( who.is_avatar() ) {
5007 add_msg(
5008 m_bad,
5009 _( "%1$s don't have a shearing tool anymore." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s don't have a shearing tool anymore."
) ) ),
5010 who.disp_name( false, true ) );
5011 } else {
5012 add_msg_if_player_sees(
5013 who,
5014 _( "%1$s doesn't have a shearing tool anymore." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s doesn't have a shearing tool anymore."
) ) ),
5015 who.disp_name() );
5016 }
5017 who.cancel_activity();
5018 }
5019}
5020
5021void shearing_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
5022{
5023 monster *mon = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( mon_coords );
5024 if( !mon ) {
5025 debugmsg( "shearing monster at position disappeared" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5025", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "shearing monster at position disappeared"
);
5026 act.set_to_null();
5027 return;
5028 }
5029
5030 const shearing_data &shear_data = mon->type->shearing;
5031 if( !shear_data.valid() ) {
5032 debugmsg( "shearing monster does not have shearing_data" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5032", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "shearing monster does not have shearing_data"
);
5033 if( shearing_tie ) {
5034 mon->remove_effect( effect_tied );
5035 }
5036 act.set_to_null();
5037 return;
5038 }
5039
5040 map &mp = get_map();
5041
5042 add_msg_if_player_sees( who,
5043 string_format(
5044 _( "%1$s finished shearing %2$s and got:" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s finished shearing %2$s and got:"
) ) ),
5045 who.disp_name( false, true ),
5046 mon->unique_name.empty() ? mon->disp_name() : mon->unique_name ) );
5047
5048 const std::vector<shearing_roll> shear_roll = shear_data.roll_all( *mon );
5049 for( const shearing_roll &roll : shear_roll ) {
5050 if( roll.result->count_by_charges() ) {
5051 item shear_item( roll.result, calendar::turn, roll.amount );
5052 mp.add_item_or_charges( who.pos(), shear_item );
5053 add_msg_if_player_sees( who, shear_item.display_name() );
5054 } else {
5055 item shear_item( roll.result, calendar::turn );
5056 for( int i = 0; i < roll.amount; ++i ) {
5057 mp.add_item_or_charges( who.pos(), shear_item );
5058 }
5059 add_msg_if_player_sees( who,
5060 //~ %1$s - item, %2$d - amount
5061 string_format( _( "%1$s x%2$d" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s x%2$d" ) ) ),
5062 shear_item.display_name(), roll.amount ) );
5063 }
5064 }
5065
5066 mon->add_effect( effect_sheared, calendar::season_length() );
5067 if( shearing_tie ) {
5068 mon->remove_effect( effect_tied );
5069 }
5070
5071 act.set_to_null();
5072}
5073
5074void shearing_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &, Character & )
5075{
5076 monster *mon = get_creature_tracker().creature_at<monster>( mon_coords );
5077 if( !mon ) {
5078 return;
5079 }
5080
5081 if( shearing_tie ) {
5082 // free the poor critter
5083 mon->remove_effect( effect_tied );
5084 }
5085}
5086
5087void shearing_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
5088{
5089 jsout.start_object();
5090 jsout.member( "mon_coords", mon_coords );
5091 jsout.member( "shearing_tie", shearing_tie );
5092 jsout.end_object();
5093}
5094
5095std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> shearing_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
5096{
5097 shearing_activity_actor actor = shearing_activity_actor( {} );
5098
5099 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
5100 data.read( "mon_coords", actor.mon_coords );
5101 data.read( "shearing_tie", actor.shearing_tie );
5102 return actor.clone();
5103}
5104
5105static bool check_if_disassemble_okay( item_location target, Character &who )
5106{
5107 item *disassembly = target.get_item();
5108
5109 // item_location::get_item() will return nullptr if the item is lost
5110 if( !disassembly ) {
5111 who.add_msg_player_or_npc(
5112 _( "You no longer have the in progress disassembly in your possession. "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You no longer have the in progress disassembly in your possession. "
"You stop disassembling. " "Reactivate the in progress disassembly to continue disassembling."
) ) )
5113 "You stop disassembling. "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You no longer have the in progress disassembly in your possession. "
"You stop disassembling. " "Reactivate the in progress disassembly to continue disassembling."
) ) )
5114 "Reactivate the in progress disassembly to continue disassembling." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You no longer have the in progress disassembly in your possession. "
"You stop disassembling. " "Reactivate the in progress disassembly to continue disassembling."
) ) ),
5115 _( "<npcname> no longer has the in progress disassembly in their possession. "( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> no longer has the in progress disassembly in their possession. "
"<npcname> stops disassembling." ) ) )
5116 "<npcname> stops disassembling." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "<npcname> no longer has the in progress disassembly in their possession. "
"<npcname> stops disassembling." ) ) ) );
5117 return false;
5118 }
5119 return true;
5120}
5121
5122void disassemble_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &who )
5123{
5124 if( act.targets.empty() ) {
5125 act.set_to_null();
5126 return;
5127 }
5128 if( act.targets.back()->typeId() == itype_disassembly ) {
5129 act.position = act.targets.back()->get_making_batch_size();
5130 }
5131 target = who.create_in_progress_disassembly( act.targets.back() );
5132 act.targets.pop_back();
5133
5134 if( !check_if_disassemble_okay( target, who ) ) {
5135 act.set_to_null();
5136 return;
5137 }
5138
5139 // Mark the item, not available for other characters
5140 target->set_var( "activity_var", who.name );
5141
5142 activity_override = target->get_making().exertion_level();
5143
5144 cached_workbench_multiplier = 0;
5145 use_cached_workbench_multiplier = false;
5146}
5147
5148void disassemble_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &who )
5149{
5150 if( !check_if_disassemble_okay( target, who ) ) {
5151 act.set_to_null();
5152 return;
5153 }
5154
5155 // We already checked if this is nullptr above
5156 item &craft = *target;
5157
5158 const std::optional<tripoint> location = target.where() == item_location::type::character
5159 ? std::optional<tripoint>() : std::optional<tripoint>( target.position() );
5160 if( !use_cached_workbench_multiplier ) {
5161 cached_workbench_multiplier = who.workbench_crafting_speed_multiplier( craft, location );
5162 use_cached_workbench_multiplier = true;
5163 }
5164 const float crafting_speed = who.crafting_speed_multiplier( craft, location,
5165 use_cached_workbench_multiplier, cached_workbench_multiplier );
5166
5167 if( crafting_speed <= 0.0f ) {
5168 who.cancel_activity();
5169 return;
5170 }
5171
5172 if( moves_total == 0 ) {
5173 craft.item_counter = 10'000'000;
5174 } else {
5175 const int spent_moves = who.get_moves() * who.exertion_adjusted_move_multiplier( exertion_level() );
5176 craft.item_counter += std::round( spent_moves * crafting_speed * 10'000'000.0 / moves_total );
5177 craft.item_counter = std::min( craft.item_counter, 10'000'000 );
5178 who.set_moves( 0 );
5179 }
5180
5181 if( craft.item_counter >= 10'000'000 ) {
5182 who.complete_disassemble( target );
5183 }
5184}
5185
5186void disassemble_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character & )
5187{
5188 act.set_to_null();
5189}
5190
5191void disassemble_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &, Character & )
5192{
5193 if( target.get_item() ) {
5194 target->erase_var( "activity_var" );
5195 }
5196}
5197
5198float disassemble_activity_actor::exertion_level() const
5199{
5200 return activity_override;
5201}
5202
5203std::string disassemble_activity_actor::get_progress_message( const player_activity & ) const
5204{
5205 if( !target ) {
5206 // We have somehow lost the disassembly item. This will be handled in do_turn in the check_if_disassemble_okay call.
5207 return "";
5208 }
5209 return target->tname();
5210}
5211
5212void disassemble_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
5213{
5214 jsout.start_object();
5215
5216 jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
5217 jsout.member( "target", target );
5218 jsout.member( "activity_override", activity_override );
5219
5220 jsout.end_object();
5221}
5222
5223std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> disassemble_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
5224{
5225 disassemble_activity_actor actor = disassemble_activity_actor( 0 );
5226
5227 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
5228
5229 data.read( "target", actor.target );
5230 data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
5231 data.read( "activity_override", actor.activity_override );
5232
5233 return actor.clone();
5234}
5235
5236void oxytorch_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &/*who*/ )
5237{
5238 const map &here = get_map();
5239
5240 if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
5241 const furn_id furn_type = here.furn( target );
5242 if( !furn_type->oxytorch->valid() ) {
5243 if( !testing ) {
5244 debugmsg( "%s oxytorch is invalid", furn_type.id().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5244", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s oxytorch is invalid", furn_type
.id().str());
5245 }
5246 act.set_to_null();
5247 return;
5248 }
5249
5250 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( furn_type->oxytorch->duration() );
5251 } else if( !here.ter( target )->is_null() ) {
5252 const ter_id ter_type = here.ter( target );
5253 if( !ter_type->oxytorch->valid() ) {
5254 if( !testing ) {
5255 debugmsg( "%s oxytorch is invalid", ter_type.id().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5255", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s oxytorch is invalid", ter_type
.id().str());
5256 }
5257 act.set_to_null();
5258 return;
5259 }
5260 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( ter_type->oxytorch->duration() );
5261 } else {
5262 if( !testing ) {
5263 debugmsg( "oxytorch activity called on invalid terrain" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5263", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "oxytorch activity called on invalid terrain"
);
5264 }
5265 act.set_to_null();
5266 return;
5267 }
5268
5269 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACTIVITY, "%s moves_total: %d", act.id().str(), act.moves_total )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACTIVITY ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "%s moves_total: %d"
, act.id().str(), act.moves_total ) ) ); } } while( false );
5270 act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
5271}
5272
5273void oxytorch_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &/*act*/, Character &who )
5274{
5275 if( tool->ammo_sufficient( &who ) ) {
5276 tool->ammo_consume( tool->ammo_required(), tool.position(), &who );
5277 sfx::play_activity_sound( "tool", "oxytorch", sfx::get_heard_volume( target ) );
5278 if( calendar::once_every( 2_turns ) ) {
5279 sounds::sound( target, 10, sounds::sound_t::destructive_activity, _( "hissssssssss!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "hissssssssss!" ) ) ) );
5280 }
5281 } else {
5282 if( who.is_avatar() ) {
5283 who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %1$s ran out of charges." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %1$s ran out of charges."
) ) ), tool->tname() );
5284 } else { // who.is_npc()
5285 add_msg_if_player_sees( who.pos(), _( "%1$s %2$s ran out of charges." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s %2$s ran out of charges."
) ) ), who.disp_name( false,
5286 true ), tool->tname() );
5287 }
5288 who.cancel_activity();
5289 }
5290}
5291
5292void oxytorch_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
5293{
5294 map &here = get_map();
5295 const activity_data_common *data;
5296
5297 if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
5298 const furn_id furn_type = here.furn( target );
5299 if( !furn_type->oxytorch->valid() ) {
5300 if( !testing ) {
5301 debugmsg( "%s oxytorch is invalid", furn_type.id().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5301", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s oxytorch is invalid", furn_type
.id().str());
5302 }
5303 act.set_to_null();
5304 return;
5305 }
5306
5307 const furn_str_id new_furn = furn_type->oxytorch->result();
5308 if( !new_furn.is_valid() ) {
5309 if( !testing ) {
5310 debugmsg( "oxytorch furniture: %s invalid furniture", new_furn.str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5310", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "oxytorch furniture: %s invalid furniture"
, new_furn.str());
5311 }
5312 act.set_to_null();
5313 return;
5314 }
5315
5316 data = static_cast<const activity_data_common *>( &*furn_type->oxytorch );
5317 here.furn_set( target, new_furn );
5318 } else if( !here.ter( target )->is_null() ) {
5319 const ter_id ter_type = here.ter( target );
5320 if( !ter_type->oxytorch->valid() ) {
5321 if( !testing ) {
5322 debugmsg( "%s oxytorch is invalid", ter_type.id().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5322", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s oxytorch is invalid", ter_type
.id().str());
5323 }
5324 act.set_to_null();
5325 return;
5326 }
5327
5328 const ter_str_id new_ter = ter_type->oxytorch->result();
5329 if( !new_ter.is_valid() ) {
5330 if( !testing ) {
5331 debugmsg( "oxytorch terrain: %s invalid terrain", new_ter.str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5331", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "oxytorch terrain: %s invalid terrain"
, new_ter.str());
5332 }
5333 act.set_to_null();
5334 return;
5335 }
5336
5337 data = static_cast<const activity_data_common *>( &*ter_type->oxytorch );
5338 here.ter_set( target, new_ter );
5339 } else {
5340 if( !testing ) {
5341 debugmsg( "oxytorch activity finished on invalid terrain" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5341", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "oxytorch activity finished on invalid terrain"
);
5342 }
5343 act.set_to_null();
5344 return;
5345 }
5346
5347 for( const activity_byproduct &byproduct : data->byproducts() ) {
5348 const int amount = byproduct.roll();
5349 if( byproduct.item->count_by_charges() ) {
5350 item byproduct_item( byproduct.item, calendar::turn, amount );
5351 here.add_item_or_charges( target, byproduct_item );
5352 } else {
5353 item byproduct_item( byproduct.item, calendar::turn );
5354 for( int i = 0; i < amount; ++i ) {
5355 here.add_item_or_charges( target, byproduct_item );
5356 }
5357 }
5358 }
5359
5360 // 50% chance of starting a fire.
5361 if( one_in( 2 ) && here.flammable_items_at( target ) ) {
5362 here.add_field( target, fd_fire, 1, 10_minutes );
5363 }
5364
5365 if( !data->message().empty() ) {
5366 who.add_msg_if_player( m_info, data->message().translated() );
5367 }
5368
5369 act.set_to_null();
5370}
5371
5372void oxytorch_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
5373{
5374 jsout.start_object();
5375 jsout.member( "target", target );
5376 jsout.member( "tool", tool );
5377 jsout.end_object();
5378}
5379
5380std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> oxytorch_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
5381{
5382 oxytorch_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
5383 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
5384 data.read( "target", actor.target );
5385 data.read( "tool", actor.tool );
5386 return actor.clone();
5387}
5388
5389void tent_placement_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
5390{
5391 act.moves_total = moves_total;
5392 act.moves_left = moves_total;
5393}
5394
5395void tent_placement_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &p )
5396{
5397 map &here = get_map();
5398 const tripoint center = p.pos() + tripoint( ( radius + 1 ) * target.x, ( radius + 1 ) * target.y,
5399 0 );
5400
5401 // Make a square of floor surrounded by wall.
5402 for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( center, radius ) ) {
5403 here.furn_set( dest, wall );
5404 }
5405 for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( center, radius - 1 ) ) {
5406 here.furn_set( dest, floor );
5407 }
5408 // Place the center floor and the door.
5409 if( floor_center ) {
5410 here.furn_set( center, *floor_center );
5411 }
5412 here.furn_set( p.pos() + target, door_closed );
5413
5414 add_msg( m_info, _( "You set up the %s on the ground." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You set up the %s on the ground."
) ) ), it.tname() );
5415 add_msg( m_info, _( "Examine the center square to pack it up again." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Examine the center square to pack it up again."
) ) ) );
5416 act.set_to_null();
5417}
5418
5419void tent_placement_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &, Character &p )
5420{
5421 map &here = get_map();
5422 here.add_item_or_charges( p.pos() + target, it, true );
5423}
5424
5425void tent_placement_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
5426{
5427 jsout.start_object();
5428 jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
5429 jsout.member( "wall", wall );
5430 jsout.member( "floor", floor );
5431 jsout.member( "floor_center", floor_center );
5432 jsout.member( "door_closed", door_closed );
5433 jsout.member( "radius", radius );
5434 jsout.member( "it", it );
5435 jsout.member( "target", target );
5436 jsout.end_object();
5437}
5438
5439std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> tent_placement_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
5440{
5441 item it;
5442 tent_placement_activity_actor actor( 0, {}, 0, it, {}, {}, {}, {} );
5443 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
5444 data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
5445 data.read( "wall", actor.wall );
5446 data.read( "floor", actor.floor );
5447 data.read( "floor_center", actor.floor_center );
5448 data.read( "door_closed", actor.door_closed );
5449 data.read( "radius", actor.radius );
5450 data.read( "it", actor.it );
5451 data.read( "target", actor.target );
5452 return actor.clone();
5453}
5454
5455void tent_deconstruct_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
5456{
5457 act.moves_total = moves_total;
5458 act.moves_left = moves_total;
5459}
5460
5461void tent_deconstruct_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character & )
5462{
5463 map &here = get_map();
5464 for( const tripoint &pt : here.points_in_radius( target, radius ) ) {
5465 here.furn_set( pt, f_null );
5466 }
5467 here.add_item_or_charges( target, item( tent, calendar::turn ) );
5468 act.set_to_null();
5469}
5470
5471void tent_deconstruct_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
5472{
5473 jsout.start_object();
5474 jsout.member( "moves_total", moves_total );
5475 jsout.member( "radius", radius );
5476 jsout.member( "target", target );
5477 jsout.member( "tent", tent );
5478 jsout.end_object();
5479}
5480
5481std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> tent_deconstruct_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
5482{
5483 tent_deconstruct_activity_actor actor( 0, 0, {}, {} );
5484 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
5485 data.read( "moves_total", actor.moves_total );
5486 data.read( "radius", actor.radius );
5487 data.read( "target", actor.target );
5488 data.read( "tent", actor.tent );
5489
5490 return actor.clone();
5491}
5492
5493void reel_cable_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
5494{
5495 act.moves_total = moves_total;
