5496 act.moves_left = moves_total;
5497}
5498
5499void reel_cable_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
5500{
5501 cable->reset_link( false, &who, -2 );
5502 who.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You reel in the %s and wind it up." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You reel in the %s and wind it up."
) ) ), cable->link_name() );
5503 if( cable->has_flag( flag_NO_DROP ) ) {
5504 cable.remove_item();
5505 }
5506 act.set_to_null();
5507}

5510{

5514 jsout.end_object();
5515}

5528{
5529 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( 20_minutes );
5530 act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
5531}
5532
5533void meditate_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
5534{
5535 who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You pause to engage in spiritual contemplation." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You pause to engage in spiritual contemplation."
) ) ) );
5536 who.add_morale( MORALE_FEELING_GOOD, 5, 10 );
5537 act.set_to_null();
5538}

5541{
5542 jsout.write_null();
5543}

5547 return meditate_activity_actor().clone();

5549
5550void play_with_pet_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
5551{
5552 act.moves_total = rng( 50, 125 ) * 100;
5553 act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
5554}
5555
5556void play_with_pet_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
5557{
5558 who.add_morale( MORALE_PLAY_WITH_PET, rng( 3, 10 ), 10, 5_hours, 25_minutes );
5559
5560 if( !playstr.empty() ) {
5561 who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, playstr, pet_name );
5562 }
5563
5564 who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "Playing with your %s has lifted your spirits a bit." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Playing with your %s has lifted your spirits a bit."
) ) ),
5565 pet_name );
5566 act.set_to_null();
5567}
5568
5569void play_with_pet_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
5570{
5571 jsout.start_object();
5572 jsout.member( "pet_name", pet_name );
5573 jsout.member( "playstr", playstr );
5574 jsout.end_object();
5575}
5576

5578{

5580 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
5581 data.read( "pet_name", actor.pet_name );
5582 data.read( "playstr", actor.playstr );
5583 return actor.clone();
5584}
5585
5586time_duration prying_activity_actor::prying_time( const activity_data_common &data,
5587 const item_location &tool, const Character &who )
5588{
5589 const pry_data &pdata = data.prying_data();
5590 if( pdata.prying_nails ) {
5591 return data.duration();
5592 }
5593
5594 int difficulty = pdata.difficulty;
5595 difficulty -= tool->get_quality( qual_PRY ) - pdata.prying_level;
5596 return time_duration::from_seconds(
5597 /** @ARM_STR speeds up crowbar prying attempts */
5598 std::max( 5, 2 * ( 4 * difficulty - who.get_arm_str() ) ) );
5599}
5600
5601void prying_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &who )
5602{
5603 const map &here = get_map();
5604
5605 if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
5606 const furn_id furn_type = here.furn( target );
5607 if( !furn_type->prying->valid() ) {
5608 if( !testing ) {
5609 debugmsg( "%s prying is invalid", furn_type.id().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5609", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s prying is invalid", furn_type
.id().str());
5610 }
5611 act.set_to_null();
5612 return;
5613 }
5614
5615 prying_nails = furn_type->prying->prying_data().prying_nails;
5616 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>(
5617 prying_time( *furn_type->prying, tool, who ) );
5618 } else if( !here.ter( target )->is_null() ) {
5619 const ter_id ter_type = here.ter( target );
5620 if( !ter_type->prying->valid() ) {
5621 if( !testing ) {
5622 debugmsg( "%s prying is invalid", ter_type.id().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5622", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s prying is invalid", ter_type
.id().str());
5623 }
5624 act.set_to_null();
5625 return;
5626 }
5627
5628 prying_nails = ter_type->prying->prying_data().prying_nails;
5629 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>(
5630 prying_time( *ter_type->prying, tool, who ) );
5631 } else {
5632 if( !testing ) {
5633 debugmsg( "prying activity called on invalid terrain" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5633", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "prying activity called on invalid terrain"
);
5634 }
5635 act.set_to_null();
5636 return;
5637 }
5638
5639 if( prying_nails && !tool->has_quality( qual_PRYING_NAIL ) ) {
5640 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You can't use your %1$s to pry up the nails." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't use your %1$s to pry up the nails."
) ) ), tool->tname() );
5641 act.set_to_null();
5642 return;
5643 }
5644
5645 add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_ACTIVITY, "%s moves_total: %d", act.id().str(), act.moves_total )do { if( debug_mode && Messages::has_debug_filter( debugmode
::DF_ACTIVITY ) && ( true ) ) { Messages::add_msg( m_debug
, clang_tidy_no_translations( string_format( "%s moves_total: %d"
, act.id().str(), act.moves_total ) ) ); } } while( false );
5646 act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
5647}
5648
5649void prying_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &/*act*/, Character &who )
5650{
5651 std::string method = "CROWBAR";
5652
5653 if( tool->ammo_sufficient( &who, method ) ) {
5654 int ammo_consumed = tool->ammo_required();
5655 std::map<std::string, int>::const_iterator iter = tool->type->ammo_scale.find( method );
5656 if( iter != tool->type->ammo_scale.end() ) {
5657 ammo_consumed *= iter->second;
5658 }
5659 tool->ammo_consume( ammo_consumed, tool.position(), &who );
5660 if( prying_nails ) {
5661 sfx::play_activity_sound( "tool", "hammer", sfx::get_heard_volume( target ) );
5662 }
5663 } else {
5664 if( who.is_avatar() ) {
5665 who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Your %1$s ran out of charges." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Your %1$s ran out of charges."
) ) ), tool->tname() );
5666 } else { // who.is_npc()
5667 add_msg_if_player_sees( who.pos(), _( "%1$s %2$s ran out of charges." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%1$s %2$s ran out of charges."
) ) ), who.disp_name( false,
5668 true ), tool->tname() );
5669 }
5670 who.cancel_activity();
5671 }
5672}
5673
5674void prying_activity_actor::handle_prying( Character &who )
5675{
5676 map &here = get_map();
5677 const activity_data_common *data;
5678
5679 // check if Character passed the difficulty check
5680 auto difficulty_check = [&]( const activity_data_common & data ) -> bool {
5681 const pry_data &pdata = data.prying_data();
5682
5683 int difficulty = pdata.difficulty;
5684 difficulty -= tool->get_quality( qual_PRY ) - pdata.prying_level;
5685
5686 /** @ARM_STR increases chance of prying success */
5687 const int dice_str = dice( 4, who.get_arm_str() );
5688
5689 return dice( 4, difficulty ) < dice_str;
5690 };
5691
5692 auto handle_failure = [&]( const pry_data & pdata ) -> void {
5693 if( !pdata.breakable )
5694 {
5695 return;
5696 }
5697
5698 int difficulty = pdata.difficulty;
5699 difficulty -= tool->get_quality( qual_PRY ) - pdata.prying_level;
5700
5701 /** @EFFECT_MECHANICS reduces chance of breaking when prying */
5702 const int dice_mech = dice( 2, static_cast<int>( round( who.get_skill_level( skill_mechanics ) ) ) );
5703 /** @ARM_STR reduces chance of breaking when prying */
5704 const int dice_str = dice( 2, who.get_arm_str() );
5705
5706 if( dice( 4, difficulty ) > dice_mech + dice_str )
5707 {
5708 // bash will always succeed
5709 here.bash( target, 0, false, true );
5710 }
5711
5712 if( !data->prying_data().failure.empty() )
5713 {
5714 who.add_msg_if_player( m_info, data->prying_data().failure.translated() );
5715 }
5716 };
5717
5718 if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
5719 const furn_id furn_type = here.furn( target );
5720 if( !furn_type->prying->valid() ) {
5721 if( !testing ) {
5722 debugmsg( "%s prying is invalid", furn_type.id().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5722", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s prying is invalid", furn_type
.id().str());
5723 }
5724 return;
5725 }
5726
5727 data = static_cast<const activity_data_common *>( &*furn_type->prying );
5728 if( !difficulty_check( *furn_type->prying ) ) {
5729 handle_failure( furn_type->prying->prying_data() );
5730 return;
5731 }
5732
5733 const furn_str_id new_furn = furn_type->prying->result();
5734 if( !new_furn.is_valid() ) {
5735 if( !testing ) {
5736 debugmsg( "prying furniture: %s invalid furniture", new_furn.str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5736", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "prying furniture: %s invalid furniture"
, new_furn.str());
5737 }
5738 return;
5739 }
5740
5741 here.furn_set( target, new_furn );
5742 } else if( !here.ter( target )->is_null() ) {
5743 const ter_id ter_type = here.ter( target );
5744 if( !ter_type->prying->valid() ) {
5745 if( !testing ) {
5746 debugmsg( "%s prying is invalid", ter_type.id().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5746", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s prying is invalid", ter_type
.id().str());
5747 }
5748 return;
5749 }
5750
5751 data = static_cast<const activity_data_common *>( &*ter_type->prying );
5752 if( !difficulty_check( *ter_type->prying ) ) {
5753 handle_failure( ter_type->prying->prying_data() );
5754 return;
5755 }
5756
5757 const ter_str_id new_ter = ter_type->prying->result();
5758 if( !new_ter.is_valid() ) {
5759 if( !testing ) {
5760 debugmsg( "prying terrain: %s invalid terrain", new_ter.str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5760", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "prying terrain: %s invalid terrain"
, new_ter.str());
5761 }
5762 return;
5763 }
5764
5765 here.ter_set( target, new_ter );
5766 } else {
5767 if( !testing ) {
5768 debugmsg( "prying activity finished on invalid terrain" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5768", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "prying activity finished on invalid terrain"
);
5769 }
5770 return;
5771 }
5772
5773 for( const activity_byproduct &byproduct : data->byproducts() ) {
5774 const int amount = byproduct.roll();
5775 if( byproduct.item->count_by_charges() ) {
5776 item byproduct_item( byproduct.item, calendar::turn, amount );
5777 here.add_item_or_charges( target, byproduct_item );
5778 } else {
5779 item byproduct_item( byproduct.item, calendar::turn );
5780 for( int i = 0; i < amount; ++i ) {
5781 here.add_item_or_charges( target, byproduct_item );
5782 }
5783 }
5784 }
5785
5786 const pry_data &pdata = data->prying_data();
5787 if( pdata.noisy ) {
5788 sounds::sound( target, 12, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "crunch!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "crunch!" ) ) ), true, "tool", "crowbar" );
5789 }
5790
5791 if( pdata.alarm ) {
5792 get_event_bus().send<event_type::triggers_alarm>( who.getID() );
5793 sounds::sound( who.pos(), 40, sounds::sound_t::alarm, _( "an alarm sound!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "an alarm sound!" ) ) ), true, "environment",
5794 "alarm" );
5795 }
5796
5797 if( !data->message().empty() ) {
5798 who.add_msg_if_player( m_info, data->message().translated() );
5799 }
5800}
5801
5802void prying_activity_actor::handle_prying_nails( Character &who )
5803{
5804 map &here = get_map();
5805 const activity_data_common *data;
5806
5807 if( here.has_furn( target ) ) {
5808 const furn_id furn_type = here.furn( target );
5809 if( !furn_type->prying->valid() ) {
5810 if( !testing ) {
5811 debugmsg( "%s prying is invalid", furn_type.id().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5811", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s prying is invalid", furn_type
.id().str());
5812 }
5813 return;
5814 }
5815
5816 const furn_str_id new_furn = furn_type->prying->result();
5817 if( !new_furn.is_valid() ) {
5818 if( !testing ) {
5819 debugmsg( "prying furniture: %s invalid furniture", new_furn.str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5819", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "prying furniture: %s invalid furniture"
, new_furn.str());
5820 }
5821 return;
5822 }
5823
5824 data = static_cast<const activity_data_common *>( &*furn_type->prying );
5825 here.furn_set( target, new_furn );
5826 } else if( !here.ter( target )->is_null() ) {
5827 const ter_id ter_type = here.ter( target );
5828 if( !ter_type->prying->valid() ) {
5829 if( !testing ) {
5830 debugmsg( "%s prying is invalid", ter_type.id().str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5830", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "%s prying is invalid", ter_type
.id().str());
5831 }
5832 return;
5833 }
5834
5835 const ter_str_id new_ter = ter_type->prying->result();
5836 if( !new_ter.is_valid() ) {
5837 if( !testing ) {
5838 debugmsg( "prying terrain: %s invalid terrain", new_ter.str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5838", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "prying terrain: %s invalid terrain"
, new_ter.str());
5839 }
5840 return;
5841 }
5842
5843 data = static_cast<const activity_data_common *>( &*ter_type->prying );
5844 here.ter_set( target, new_ter );
5845 } else {
5846 if( !testing ) {
5847 debugmsg( "prying nails activity finished on invalid terrain" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "5847", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "prying nails activity finished on invalid terrain"
);
5848 }
5849 return;
5850 }
5851
5852 for( const activity_byproduct &byproduct : data->byproducts() ) {
5853 const int amount = byproduct.roll();
5854 if( byproduct.item->count_by_charges() ) {
5855 item byproduct_item( byproduct.item, calendar::turn, amount );
5856 here.add_item_or_charges( target, byproduct_item );
5857 } else {
5858 item byproduct_item( byproduct.item, calendar::turn );
5859 for( int i = 0; i < amount; ++i ) {
5860 here.add_item_or_charges( target, byproduct_item );
5861 }
5862 }
5863 }
5864
5865 if( !data->message().empty() ) {
5866 who.add_msg_if_player( m_info, data->message().translated() );
5867 }
5868
5869 who.practice( skill_fabrication, 1, 1 );
5870}
5871
5872void prying_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
5873{
5874 act.set_to_null();
5875
5876 if( prying_nails ) {
5877 handle_prying_nails( who );
5878 } else {
5879 handle_prying( who );
5880 }
5881}
5882
5883void prying_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
5884{
5885 jsout.start_object();
5886 jsout.member( "target", target );
5887 jsout.member( "tool", tool );
5888 jsout.member( "prying_nails", prying_nails );
5889 jsout.end_object();
5890}
5891
5892std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> prying_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
5893{
5894 prying_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
5895 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
5896 data.read( "target", actor.target );
5897 data.read( "tool", actor.tool );
5898 data.read( "prying_nails", actor.prying_nails );
5899 return actor.clone();
5900}
5901
5902void shave_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
5903{
5904 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( 5_minutes );
5905 act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
5906}
5907
5908void shave_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
5909{
5910 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You open up your kit and shave." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You open up your kit and shave."
) ) ) );
5911 who.add_morale( MORALE_SHAVE, 8, 8, 240_minutes, 3_minutes );
5912 act.set_to_null();
5913}
5914
5915void shave_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
5916{
5917 jsout.write_null();
5918}
5919
5920std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> shave_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue & )
5921{
5922 return shave_activity_actor().clone();
5923}
5924
5925void haircut_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
5926{
5927 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( 30_minutes );
5928 act.moves_left = act.moves_total;
5929}
5930
5931void haircut_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
5932{
5933 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You give your hair a trim." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You give your hair a trim." )
) ) );
5934 who.add_morale( MORALE_HAIRCUT, 3, 3, 480_minutes, 3_minutes );
5935 if( who.is_avatar() ) {
5936 uilist amenu;
5937 amenu.title = _( "Change what?" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Change what?" ) ) );
5938 amenu.addentry( 0, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Change hairstyle" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Change hairstyle" ) ) ) );
5939 amenu.addentry( 1, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Change facial hairstyle" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Change facial hairstyle" ) )
) );
5940
5941 amenu.query();
5942 if( amenu.ret == 0 ) {
5943 who.customize_appearance( customize_appearance_choice::HAIR );
5944 } else if( amenu.ret == 1 ) {
5945 who.customize_appearance( customize_appearance_choice::HAIR_F );
5946 }
5947 }
5948 act.set_to_null();
5949}
5950
5951void haircut_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
5952{
5953 jsout.write_null();
5954}
5955
5956std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> haircut_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue & )
5957{
5958 return haircut_activity_actor().clone();
5959}
5960
5961static bool check_stealing( Character &who, item &it )
5962{
5963 if( !it.is_owned_by( who, true ) ) {
5964 // Has the player given input on if stealing is ok?
5965 if( who.get_value( "THIEF_MODE" ) == "THIEF_ASK" ) {
5966 Pickup::query_thief();
5967 }
5968 if( who.get_value( "THIEF_MODE" ) == "THIEF_HONEST" ) {
5969 if( who.get_value( "THIEF_MODE_KEEP" ) != "YES" ) {
5970 who.set_value( "THIEF_MODE", "THIEF_ASK" );
5971 }
5972 return false;
5973 }
5974 }
5975
5976 return true;
5977}
5978
5979bool avatar_action::check_stealing( Character &who, item &weapon )
5980{
5981 return ::check_stealing( who, weapon );
5982}
5983
5984void wield_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &, Character &who )
5985{
5986 if( who.moves > 0 ) {
5987 if( target_item ) {
5988 // Make copies so the original remains untouched if wielding fails
5989 item newit = *target_item;
5990 item leftovers = newit;
5991
5992 // Handle charges, quantity == 0 means move all
5993 if( quantity != 0 && newit.count_by_charges() ) {
5994 leftovers.charges = newit.charges - quantity;
5995 if( leftovers.charges > 0 ) {
5996 newit.charges = quantity;
5997 }
5998 } else {
5999 leftovers.charges = 0;
6000 }
6001
6002 if( check_stealing( who, newit ) ) {
6003 handler.unseal_pocket_containing( target_item );
6004 if( who.wield( newit ) ) {
6005 // If we wielded up a whole stack, remove the original item
6006 // Otherwise, replace the item with the leftovers
6007 if( leftovers.charges > 0 ) {
6008 *target_item = std::move( leftovers );
6009 } else {
6010 target_item.remove_item();
6011 }
6012 }
6013 handler.handle_by( who );
6014 }
6015 }
6016
6017 who.cancel_activity();
6018 }
6019}
6020
6021void wield_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6022{
6023 jsout.start_object();
6024
6025 jsout.member( "target_items", target_item );
6026 jsout.member( "quantities", quantity );
6027 jsout.member( "handler", handler );
6028
6029 jsout.end_object();
6030}
6031
6032std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> wield_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6033{
6034 wield_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
6035
6036 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6037
6038 data.read( "target_items", actor.target_item );
6039 data.read( "quantities", actor.quantity );
6040 data.read( "handler", actor.handler );
6041
6042 return actor.clone();
6043}
6044
6045void wear_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &, Character &who )
6046{
6047 // ACT_WEAR has item_location targets, and int quantities
6048 while( who.moves > 0 && !target_items.empty() ) {
6049 item_location target = std::move( target_items.back() );
6050 int quantity = quantities.back();
6051 target_items.pop_back();
6052 quantities.pop_back();
6053
6054 if( !target ) {
6055 debugmsg( "Lost target item of ACT_WEAR" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "6055", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Lost target item of ACT_WEAR"
);
6056 continue;
6057 }
6058
6059 // Make copies so the original remains untouched if wearing fails
6060 item newit = *target;
6061 item leftovers = newit;
6062
6063 // Handle charges, quantity == 0 means move all
6064 if( quantity != 0 && newit.count_by_charges() ) {
6065 leftovers.charges = newit.charges - quantity;
6066 if( leftovers.charges > 0 ) {
6067 newit.charges = quantity;
6068 }
6069 } else {
6070 leftovers.charges = 0;
6071 }
6072
6073 if( check_stealing( who, newit ) ) {
6074 handler.unseal_pocket_containing( target );
6075 if( who.wear_item( newit ) ) {
6076 // If we wore up a whole stack, remove the original item
6077 // Otherwise, replace the item with the leftovers
6078 if( leftovers.charges > 0 ) {
6079 *target = std::move( leftovers );
6080 } else {
6081 target.remove_item();
6082 }
6083 }
6084 }
6085 }
6086
6087 // If there are no items left we are done
6088 if( target_items.empty() ) {
6089 handler.handle_by( who );
6090 who.cancel_activity();
6091 }
6092}
6093
6094void wear_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6095{
6096 jsout.start_object();
6097
6098 jsout.member( "target_items", target_items );
6099 jsout.member( "quantities", quantities );
6100 jsout.member( "handler", handler );
6101
6102 jsout.end_object();
6103}
6104
6105std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> wear_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6106{
6107 wear_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
6108
6109 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6110
6111 data.read( "target_items", actor.target_items );
6112 data.read( "quantities", actor.quantities );
6113 data.read( "handler", actor.handler );
6114
6115 return actor.clone();
6116}
6117
6118void invoke_item_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &, Character &who )
6119{
6120 item_location _item = item;
6121 std::string _method = method;
6122 if( method.empty() ) {
6123 who.cancel_activity();
6124 who.invoke_item( _item.get_item() );
6125 return;
6126 }
6127 who.cancel_activity();
6128 who.invoke_item( _item.get_item(), _method );
6129}
6130
6131void invoke_item_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6132{
6133 jsout.start_object();
6134
6135 jsout.member( "item", item );
6136 jsout.member( "method", method );
6137
6138 jsout.end_object();
6139}
6140
6141std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> invoke_item_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6142{
6143 invoke_item_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
6144
6145 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6146
6147 data.read( "item", actor.item );
6148 data.read( "method", actor.method );
6149
6150 return actor.clone();
6151}
6152
6153void pickup_menu_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &, Character &who )
6154{
6155 std::optional<tripoint> p( where );
6156 std::vector<drop_location> s( selection );
6157 who.cancel_activity();
6158 who.pick_up( game_menus::inv::pickup( *who.as_avatar(), p, s ) );
6159}
6160
6161void pickup_menu_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6162{
6163 jsout.start_object();
6164
6165 jsout.member( "where", where );
6166 jsout.member( "selection", selection );
6167
6168 jsout.end_object();
6169}
6170
6171std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> pickup_menu_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6172{
6173 pickup_menu_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
6174
6175 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6176
6177 data.read( "where", actor.where );
6178 data.read( "selection", actor.selection );
6179
6180 return actor.clone();
6181}
6182
6183static void chop_single_do_turn( player_activity &act )
6184{
6185 const map &here = get_map();
6186 sfx::play_activity_sound( "tool", "axe", sfx::get_heard_volume( here.getlocal( act.placement ) ) );
6187 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
6188 //~ Sound of a wood chopping tool at work!
6189 sounds::sound( here.getlocal( act.placement ), 15, sounds::sound_t::activity, _( "CHK!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "CHK!" ) ) ) );
6190 }
6191}
6192
6193void chop_logs_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
6194{
6195 act.moves_total = moves;
6196 act.moves_left = moves;
6197}
6198
6199void chop_logs_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character & )
6200{
6201 chop_single_do_turn( act );
6202}
6203
6204void chop_logs_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
6205{
6206 map &here = get_map();
6207 const tripoint &pos = here.getlocal( act.placement );
6208 int log_quan;
6209 int stick_quan;
6210 int splint_quan;
6211 if( here.ter( pos ) == t_trunk ) {
6212 log_quan = rng( 2, 3 );
6213 stick_quan = rng( 0, 3 );
6214 splint_quan = 0;
6215 } else if( here.ter( pos ) == t_stump ) {
6216 log_quan = rng( 0, 2 );
6217 stick_quan = 0;
6218 splint_quan = rng( 5, 15 );
6219 } else {
6220 log_quan = 0;
6221 stick_quan = 0;
6222 splint_quan = 0;
6223 }
6224 for( int i = 0; i != log_quan; ++i ) {
6225 item obj( itype_log, calendar::turn );
6226 obj.set_var( "activity_var", who.name );
6227 here.add_item_or_charges( pos, obj );
6228 }
6229 for( int i = 0; i != stick_quan; ++i ) {
6230 item obj( itype_stick_long, calendar::turn );
6231 obj.set_var( "activity_var", who.name );
6232 here.add_item_or_charges( pos, obj );
6233 }
6234 for( int i = 0; i != splint_quan; ++i ) {
6235 item obj( itype_splinter, calendar::turn );
6236 obj.set_var( "activity_var", who.name );
6237 here.add_item_or_charges( pos, obj );
6238 }
6239 here.ter_set( pos, t_dirt );
6240 who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You finish chopping wood." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You finish chopping wood." )
) ) );
6241
6242 act.set_to_null();
6243 activity_handlers::resume_for_multi_activities( who );
6244}
6245
6246void chop_logs_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6247{
6248 jsout.start_object();
6249
6250 jsout.member( "moves", moves );
6251 jsout.member( "tool", tool );
6252
6253 jsout.end_object();
6254}
6255
6256std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> chop_logs_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6257{
6258 chop_logs_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
6259
6260 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6261
6262 data.read( "moves", actor.moves );
6263 data.read( "tool", actor.tool );
6264
6265 return actor.clone();
6266}
6267
6268void chop_planks_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
6269{
6270 act.moves_total = moves;
6271 act.moves_left = moves;
6272}
6273
6274void chop_planks_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character & )
6275{
6276 chop_single_do_turn( act );
6277}
6278
6279void chop_planks_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
6280{
6281 const int max_planks = 10;
6282 /** @EFFECT_FABRICATION increases number of planks cut from a log */
6283 int planks = normal_roll( 2 + who.get_skill_level( skill_fabrication ), 1 );
6284 int wasted_planks = max_planks - planks;
6285 int scraps = rng( wasted_planks, wasted_planks * 3 );
6286 planks = std::min( planks, max_planks );
6287
6288 map &here = get_map();
6289 if( planks > 0 ) {
6290 here.spawn_item( here.getlocal( act.placement ), itype_2x4, planks, 0, calendar::turn );
6291 who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, n_gettext( "You produce %d plank.", "You produce %d planks.",
6292 planks ), planks );
6293 }
6294 if( scraps > 0 ) {
6295 here.spawn_item( here.getlocal( act.placement ), itype_splinter, scraps, 0, calendar::turn );
6296 who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, n_gettext( "You produce %d splinter.", "You produce %d splinters.",
6297 scraps ), scraps );
6298 }
6299 if( planks < max_planks / 2 ) {
6300 who.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You waste a lot of the wood." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You waste a lot of the wood."
) ) ) );
6301 }
6302 act.set_to_null();
6303 activity_handlers::resume_for_multi_activities( who );
6304}
6305
6306void chop_planks_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6307{
6308 jsout.start_object();
6309
6310 jsout.member( "moves", moves );
6311
6312 jsout.end_object();
6313}
6314
6315std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> chop_planks_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6316{
6317 chop_planks_activity_actor actor( {} );
6318
6319 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6320
6321 data.read( "moves", actor.moves );
6322
6323 return actor.clone();
6324}
6325
6326void chop_tree_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
6327{
6328 act.moves_total = moves;
6329 act.moves_left = moves;
6330}
6331
6332void chop_tree_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character & )
6333{
6334 chop_single_do_turn( act );
6335}
6336
6337void chop_tree_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
6338{
6339 map &here = get_map();
6340 const tripoint &pos = here.getlocal( act.placement );
6341
6342 tripoint direction;
6343 if( !who.is_npc() &&
6344 ( who.backlog.empty() || who.backlog.front().id() != ACT_MULTIPLE_CHOP_TREES ) ) {
6345 while( true ) {
6346 if( const std::optional<tripoint> dir = choose_direction(
6347 _( "Select a direction for the tree to fall in." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "Select a direction for the tree to fall in."
) ) ) ) ) {
6348 direction = *dir;
6349 break;
6350 }
6351 // try again
6352 }
6353 } else {
6354 creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
6355 const point main_dir = pos.xy() - who.pos().xy();
6356 const int circle_size = 8;
6357 static constexpr std::array<point, circle_size> circle = {
6358 point_east, point_south_east, point_south, point_south_west, point_west,
6359 point_north_west, point_north, point_north_east
6360 };
6361 int circle_center = 0; // Initialized as the compiler complained
6362 for( int i = 0; i < circle_size; i++ ) {
6363 if( main_dir == circle[i] ) {
6364 circle_center = i;
6365 break;
6366 }
6367 }
6368 std::vector<point> candidates;
6369 candidates = { main_dir, // Fall straight away
6370 circle[( circle_center + circle_size - 1 ) % circle_size], // Fall away to the left. Adding the full circle to ensure modulo gives a non negative result
6371 circle[( circle_center + 1 ) % circle_size], // Fall away to the right
6372 circle[( circle_center + circle_size - 2 ) % circle_size], // Fall to the left
6373 circle[( circle_center + 2 ) % circle_size], // Fall to the right
6374 circle[( circle_center + circle_size - 3 ) % circle_size], // Fall towards to the left
6375 circle[( circle_center + 3 ) % circle_size]
6376 }; // Fall towards to the right
6377 for( const point &direc : candidates ) {
6378 bool cantuse = false;
6379 tripoint proposed_to = pos + point( 3 * direc.x, 3 * direc.y );
6380 std::vector<tripoint> rough_tree_line = line_to( pos, proposed_to );
6381 for( const tripoint &elem : rough_tree_line ) {
6382 if( creatures.creature_at( elem ) ) {
6383 cantuse = true;
6384 break;
6385 }
6386 }
6387 if( !cantuse ) {
6388 direction = tripoint( direc, pos.z );
6389 break;
6390 }
6391 }
6392 }
6393 const tripoint to = pos + 3 * direction.xy() + point( rng( -1, 1 ), rng( -1, 1 ) );
6394 std::vector<tripoint> tree = line_to( pos, to, rng( 1, 8 ) );
6395 for( const tripoint &elem : tree ) {
6396 here.batter( elem, 300, 5 );
6397 here.ter_set( elem, t_trunk );
6398 }
6399
6400 here.ter_set( pos, t_stump );
6401 who.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You finish chopping down a tree." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You finish chopping down a tree."
) ) ) );
6402 // sound of falling tree
6403 here.collapse_at( pos, false, true, false );
6404 sfx::play_variant_sound( "misc", "timber",
6405 sfx::get_heard_volume( here.getlocal( act.placement ) ) );
6406 get_event_bus().send<event_type::cuts_tree>( who.getID() );
6407 act.set_to_null();
6408 activity_handlers::resume_for_multi_activities( who );
6409}
6410
6411void chop_tree_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6412{
6413 jsout.start_object();
6414
6415 jsout.member( "moves", moves );
6416 jsout.member( "tool", tool );
6417
6418 jsout.end_object();
6419}
6420
6421std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> chop_tree_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6422{
6423 chop_tree_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
6424
6425 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6426
6427 data.read( "moves", actor.moves );
6428 data.read( "tool", actor.tool );
6429
6430 return actor.clone();
6431}
6432
6433void churn_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
6434{
6435 act.moves_total = moves;
6436 act.moves_left = moves;
6437}
6438
6439void churn_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
6440{
6441 map &here = get_map();
6442 who.add_msg_if_player( _( "You finish churning up the earth here." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You finish churning up the earth here."
) ) ) );
6443 here.ter_set( here.getlocal( act.placement ), t_dirtmound );
6444 // Go back to what we were doing before
6445 // could be player zone activity, or could be NPC multi-farming
6446 act.set_to_null();
6447 activity_handlers::resume_for_multi_activities( who );
6448}
6449

6451{
6452 jsout.start_object();
6453
6454 jsout.member( "moves", moves );
6455 jsout.member( "tool", tool );
6456
6457 jsout.end_object();
6458}

6464 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6465
6466 data.read( "moves", actor.moves );
6467 data.read( "tool", actor.tool );
6468
6469 return actor.clone();
6470}
6471
6472void clear_rubble_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
6473{
6474 act.moves_total = moves;
6475 act.moves_left = moves;
6476}
6477
6478void clear_rubble_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
6479{
6480 map &here = get_map();
6481 const tripoint_bub_ms &pos = here.bub_from_abs( act.placement );
6482 who.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You clear up the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You clear up the %s." ) ) ), here.furnname( pos ) );
6483 here.furn_set( pos, f_null );
6484
6485 act.set_to_null();
6486
6487 here.maybe_trigger_trap( pos, who, true );
6488}
6489

6493
6494 jsout.member( "moves", moves );
6495
6496 jsout.end_object();
6497}
6498
6499std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> clear_rubble_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6500{
6501 clear_rubble_activity_actor actor( {} );
6502

6505 data.read( "moves", actor.moves );
