6508}
6509
6510void firstaid_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
6511{
6512 act.moves_total = moves;
6513 act.moves_left = moves;
6514 act.name = name;
6515}
6516
6517void firstaid_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
6518{
6519 static const std::string iuse_name_string( "heal" );
6520
6521 item_location it = act.targets.front();
6522 item *used_tool = it->get_usable_item( iuse_name_string );
6523 if( used_tool == nullptr ) {
6524 debugmsg( "Lost tool used for healing" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "6524", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Lost tool used for healing");
6525 act.set_to_null();
6526 return;
6527 }
6528
6529 const use_function *use_fun = used_tool->get_use( iuse_name_string );
6530 const heal_actor *actor = dynamic_cast<const heal_actor *>( use_fun->get_actor_ptr() );
6531 if( actor == nullptr ) {
6532 debugmsg( "iuse_actor type descriptor and actual type mismatch" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "6532", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "iuse_actor type descriptor and actual type mismatch"
);
6533 act.set_to_null();
6534 return;
6535 }
6536
6537 Character *patient = patientID == get_avatar().getID() ? &get_avatar() :
6538 dynamic_cast<Character *>( g->find_npc( patientID ) );
6539 if( !patient ) {
6540 debugmsg( "Your patient can no longer be found so you stop using the %s.", name )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "6540", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Your patient can no longer be found so you stop using the %s."
, name);
6541 act.set_to_null();
6542 act.values.clear();
6543 return;
6544 }
6545 const bodypart_id healed = bodypart_id( act.str_values[0] );
6546 int charges_consumed = actor->finish_using( who, *patient,
6547 *used_tool, healed );
6548 std::list<item>used;
6549 if( used_tool->has_flag( flag_SINGLE_USE ) ) {
6550 it.remove_item();
6551 } else if( used_tool->is_medication() ) {
6552 if( !it->count_by_charges() ||
6553 it->use_charges( it->typeId(), charges_consumed, used, it.position() ) ) {
6554 it.remove_item();
6555 }
6556 } else if( used_tool->is_tool() ) {
6557 if( used_tool->type->charges_to_use() ) {
6558 it->activation_consume( charges_consumed, it.position(), &who );
6559 }
6560 }
6561
6562 // Erase activity and values.
6563 act.set_to_null();
6564 act.values.clear();
6565
6566 // Return to first eat or consume meds menu activity in the backlog.
6567 for( player_activity &backlog_act : who.backlog ) {
6568 if( backlog_act.id() == ACT_EAT_MENU ||
6569 backlog_act.id() == ACT_CONSUME_MEDS_MENU ) {
6570 backlog_act.auto_resume = true;
6571 break;
6572 }
6573 }
6574 // Clear the backlog of any activities that will not auto resume.
6575 for( auto iter = who.backlog.begin(); iter != who.backlog.end(); ) {
6576 if( !iter->auto_resume ) {
6577 iter = who.backlog.erase( iter );
6578 } else {
6579 ++iter;
6580 }
6581 }
6582}
6583
6584void firstaid_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6585{
6586 jsout.start_object();
6587
6588 jsout.member( "moves", moves );
6589 jsout.member( "name", name );
6590 jsout.member( "patientID", patientID );
6591
6592 jsout.end_object();
6593}
6594
6595std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> firstaid_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6596{
6597 firstaid_activity_actor actor( {}, {}, {} );
6598
6599 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6600
6601 data.read( "moves", actor.moves );
6602 data.read( "name", actor.name );
6603 data.read( "patientID", actor.patientID );
6604
6605 return actor.clone();
6606}
6607
6608void forage_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
6609{
6610 act.moves_total = moves;
6611 act.moves_left = moves;
6612}
6613
6614void forage_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
6615{
6616 // Don't forage if we aren't next to the bush - otherwise we get weird bugs
6617 bool next_to_bush = false;
6618 map &here = get_map();
6619 for( const tripoint &pnt : here.points_in_radius( who.pos(), 1 ) ) {
6620 // TODO: fix point types
6621 if( here.getglobal( pnt ) == act.placement ) {
6622 next_to_bush = true;
6623 break;
6624 }
6625 }
6626
6627 if( !next_to_bush ) {
6628 act.set_to_null();
6629 return;
6630 }
6631
6632 const int veggy_chance = rng( 1, 100 );
6633 bool found_something = false;
6634
6635 item_group_id group_id;
6636 ter_str_id next_ter;
6637
6638 switch( season_of_year( calendar::turn ) ) {
6639 case SPRING:
6640 group_id = Item_spawn_data_forage_spring;
6641 next_ter = ter_t_underbrush_harvested_spring;
6642 break;
6643 case SUMMER:
6644 group_id = Item_spawn_data_forage_summer;
6645 next_ter = ter_t_underbrush_harvested_summer;
6646 break;
6647 case AUTUMN:
6648 group_id = Item_spawn_data_forage_autumn;
6649 next_ter = ter_t_underbrush_harvested_autumn;
6650 break;
6651 case WINTER:
6652 group_id = Item_spawn_data_forage_winter;
6653 next_ter = ter_t_underbrush_harvested_winter;
6654 break;
6655 default:
6656 debugmsg( "Invalid season" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "6656", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Invalid season");
6657 }
6658
6659 const tripoint bush_pos = here.getlocal( act.placement );
6660 here.ter_set( bush_pos, next_ter );
6661
6662 // Survival gives a bigger boost, and Perception is leveled a bit.
6663 // Both survival and perception affect time to forage
6664
6665 ///\EFFECT_PER slightly increases forage success chance
6666 ///\EFFECT_SURVIVAL increases forage success chance
6667 if( veggy_chance < round( who.get_skill_level( skill_survival ) * 3 + who.per_cur - 2 ) ) {
6668 const std::vector<item *> dropped =
6669 here.put_items_from_loc( group_id, who.pos(), calendar::turn );
6670 // map::put_items_from_loc can create multiple items and merge them into one stack.
6671 // That stack will then appear multiple times in the vector.
6672 // Remember and check the already handled items to prevent rolling
6673 // poison/hallucinogen multiple times and print misleading messages.
6674 std::vector<item *> handled;
6675 for( item *it : dropped ) {
6676 if( std::find( handled.rbegin(), handled.rend(), it ) != handled.rend() ) {
6677 continue;
6678 }
6679 handled.push_back( it );
6680 found_something = true;
6681 if( it->has_flag( flag_FORAGE_POISON ) && one_in( 10 ) ) {
6682 it->set_flag( flag_HIDDEN_POISON );
6683 it->poison = rng( 2, 7 );
6684 } else if( it->has_flag( flag_FORAGE_HALLU ) && one_in( 10 ) ) {
6685 it->set_flag( flag_HIDDEN_HALLU );
6686 }
6687 add_msg( m_good, _( "You found: %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You found: %s!" ) ) ), it->display_name() );
6688 }
6689 }
6690 // 10% to drop a item/items from this group.
6691 if( one_in( 10 ) ) {
6692 const std::vector<item *> dropped =
6693 here.put_items_from_loc( Item_spawn_data_trash_forest, who.pos(), calendar::turn );
6694 // same as above
6695 std::vector<item *> handled;
6696 for( item * const &it : dropped ) {
6697 if( std::find( handled.rbegin(), handled.rend(), it ) != handled.rend() ) {
6698 continue;
6699 }
6700 handled.push_back( it );
6701 add_msg( m_good, _( "You found: %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You found: %s!" ) ) ), it->display_name() );
6702 found_something = true;
6703 }
6704 }
6705
6706 if( !found_something ) {
6707 add_msg( _( "You didn't find anything." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You didn't find anything." )
) ) );
6708 }
6709
6710 iexamine::practice_survival_while_foraging( who );
6711
6712 act.set_to_null();
6713
6714 here.maybe_trigger_trap( bush_pos, who, true );
6715}
6716
6717void forage_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6718{
6719 jsout.start_object();
6720
6721 jsout.member( "moves", moves );
6722
6723 jsout.end_object();
6724}
6725
6726std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> forage_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6727{
6728 forage_activity_actor actor( {} );
6729
6730 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6731
6732 data.read( "moves", actor.moves );
6733
6734 return actor.clone();
6735}
6736
6737void gunmod_add_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
6738{
6739 act.moves_total = moves;
6740 act.moves_left = moves;
6741 act.name = name;
6742}
6743
6744void gunmod_add_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
6745{
6746 act.set_to_null();
6747 // first unpack all of our arguments
6748 if( act.values.size() != 4 ) {
6749 debugmsg( "Insufficient arguments to ACT_GUNMOD_ADD" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "6749", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Insufficient arguments to ACT_GUNMOD_ADD"
);
6750 return;
6751 }
6752
6753 item &gun = *act.targets.at( 0 );
6754 item &mod = *act.targets.at( 1 );
6755
6756 // chance of success (%)
6757 const int roll = act.values[1];
6758 // chance of damage (%)
6759 const int risk = act.values[2];
6760
6761 // any tool charges used during installation
6762 const itype_id tool( act.name );
6763 const int qty = act.values[3];
6764
6765 if( !gun.is_gunmod_compatible( mod ).success() ) {
6766 debugmsg( "Invalid arguments in ACT_GUNMOD_ADD" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "6766", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Invalid arguments in ACT_GUNMOD_ADD"
);
6767 return;
6768 }
6769
6770 if( !tool.is_empty() && qty > 0 ) {
6771 who.use_charges( tool, qty );
6772 }
6773
6774 if( rng( 0, 100 ) <= roll ) {
6775 add_msg( m_good, _( "You successfully attached the %1$s to your %2$s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You successfully attached the %1$s to your %2$s."
) ) ), mod.tname(),
6776 gun.tname() );
6777 gun.put_in( who.i_rem( &mod ), pocket_type::MOD );
6778 gun.on_contents_changed();
6779
6780 } else if( rng( 0, 100 ) <= risk ) {
6781 if( gun.inc_damage() ) {
6782 // Remove irremovable mods prior to destroying the gun
6783 for( item *mod : gun.gunmods() ) {
6784 if( mod->is_irremovable() ) {
6785 who.remove_item( *mod );
6786 }
6787 }
6788 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You failed at installing the %s and destroyed your %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You failed at installing the %s and destroyed your %s!"
) ) ), mod.tname(),
6789 gun.tname() );
6790 who.i_rem( &gun );
6791 } else {
6792 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You failed at installing the %s and damaged your %s!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You failed at installing the %s and damaged your %s!"
) ) ), mod.tname(),
6793 gun.tname() );
6794 }
6795
6796 } else {
6797 add_msg( m_info, _( "You failed at installing the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You failed at installing the %s."
) ) ), mod.tname() );
6798 }
6799}
6800
6801void gunmod_add_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6802{
6803 jsout.start_object();
6804
6805 jsout.member( "moves", moves );
6806 jsout.member( "name", name );
6807
6808 jsout.end_object();
6809}
6810
6811std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> gunmod_add_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6812{
6813 gunmod_add_activity_actor actor( {}, {} );
6814
6815 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6816
6817 data.read( "moves", actor.moves );
6818 data.read( "name", actor.name );
6819
6820 return actor.clone();
6821}
6822
6823void longsalvage_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
6824{
6825 act.index = index;
6826
6827 //todo: refactor the actor to process items in ::do_turn, then remove setting the moves to 0
6828 //this currently still can't get interrupted before you get attacked
6829 act.moves_left = 0;
6830}
6831
6832void longsalvage_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
6833{
6834 static const std::string salvage_string = "salvage";
6835 item &main_tool = who.i_at( act.index );
6836 map &here = get_map();
6837 map_stack items = here.i_at( who.pos() );
6838 item *salvage_tool = main_tool.get_usable_item( salvage_string );
6839 if( salvage_tool == nullptr ) {
6840 debugmsg( "Lost tool used for long salvage" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "6840", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Lost tool used for long salvage"
);
6841 act.set_to_null();
6842 return;
6843 }
6844
6845 const use_function *use_fun = salvage_tool->get_use( salvage_string );
6846 const salvage_actor *actor = dynamic_cast<const salvage_actor *>( use_fun->get_actor_ptr() );
6847 if( actor == nullptr ) {
6848 debugmsg( "iuse_actor type descriptor and actual type mismatch" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "6848", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "iuse_actor type descriptor and actual type mismatch"
);
6849 act.set_to_null();
6850 return;
6851 }
6852
6853 for( item &it : items ) {
6854 // Check first and only if possible attempt it with player char
6855 // This suppresses warnings unless it is an item the player wears
6856 if( actor->valid_to_cut_up( nullptr, it ) ) {
6857 item_location item_loc( map_cursor( who.pos() ), &it );
6858 actor->try_to_cut_up( who, *salvage_tool, item_loc );
6859 return;
6860 }
6861 }
6862
6863 add_msg( _( "You finish salvaging." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You finish salvaging." ) ) ) );
6864 act.set_to_null();
6865}
6866
6867void longsalvage_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6868{
6869 jsout.start_object();
6870
6871 jsout.member( "index", index );
6872
6873 jsout.end_object();
6874}
6875
6876std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> longsalvage_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6877{
6878 longsalvage_activity_actor actor( {} );
6879
6880 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6881
6882 data.read( "index", actor.index );
6883
6884 return actor.clone();
6885}
6886
6887void mop_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
6888{
6889 act.moves_total = moves;
6890 act.moves_left = moves;
6891}
6892
6893void mop_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &who )
6894{
6895 // Blind character have a 1/3 chance of actually mopping.
6896 const bool will_mop = one_in( who.is_blind() ? 1 : 3 );
6897 if( will_mop ) {
6898 map &here = get_map();
6899 here.mop_spills( here.bub_from_abs( act.placement ) );
6900 }
6901 activity_handlers::resume_for_multi_activities( who );
6902}
6903
6904void mop_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6905{
6906 jsout.start_object();
6907
6908 jsout.member( "moves", moves );
6909
6910 jsout.end_object();
6911}
6912
6913std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> mop_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6914{
6915 mop_activity_actor actor( {} );
6916
6917 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6918
6919 data.read( "moves", actor.moves );
6920
6921 return actor.clone();
6922}
6923
6924void unload_loot_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
6925{
6926 jsout.start_object();
6927
6928 jsout.member( "moves", moves );
6929 jsout.member( "num_processed", num_processed );
6930 jsout.member( "stage", stage );
6931 jsout.member( "coord_set", coord_set );
6932 jsout.member( "placement", placement );
6933
6934 jsout.end_object();
6935}
6936
6937std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> unload_loot_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
6938{
6939 unload_loot_activity_actor actor( {} );
6940
6941 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
6942
6943 data.read( "moves", actor.moves );
6944 data.read( "num_processed", actor.num_processed );
6945 data.read( "stage", actor.stage );
6946 data.read( "coord_set", actor.coord_set );
6947 data.read( "placement", actor.placement );
6948
6949 return actor.clone();
6950}
6951
6952void unload_loot_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
6953{
6954 act.moves_total = moves;
6955 act.moves_left = moves;
6956}
6957
6958static void move_item( Character &you, item &it, const int quantity, const tripoint_bub_ms &src,
6959 const tripoint_bub_ms &dest, vehicle *src_veh, int src_part )
6960{
6961 item leftovers = it;
6962
6963 if( quantity != 0 && it.count_by_charges() ) {
6964 // Reinserting leftovers happens after item removal to avoid stacking issues.
6965 leftovers.charges = it.charges - quantity;
6966 if( leftovers.charges > 0 ) {
6967 it.charges = quantity;
6968 }
6969 } else {
6970 leftovers.charges = 0;
6971 }
6972
6973 map &here = get_map();
6974 // Check that we can pick it up.
6975 if( it.made_of_from_type( phase_id::SOLID ) ) {
6976 you.mod_moves( -activity_handlers::move_cost( it, src, dest ) );
6977
6978 put_into_vehicle_or_drop( you, item_drop_reason::deliberate, { it }, dest );
6979 // Remove from map or vehicle.
6980 if( src_veh ) {
6981 vehicle_part &vp_src = src_veh->part( src_part );
6982 src_veh->remove_item( vp_src, &it );
6983 } else {
6984 here.i_rem( src, &it );
6985 }
6986 }
6987
6988 // If we didn't pick up a whole stack, put the remainder back where it came from.
6989 if( leftovers.charges > 0 ) {
6990 if( src_veh ) {
6991 vehicle_part &vp_src = src_veh->part( src_part );
6992 if( !src_veh->add_item( vp_src, leftovers ) ) {
6993 debugmsg( "SortLoot: Source vehicle failed to receive leftover charges." )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "6993", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "SortLoot: Source vehicle failed to receive leftover charges."
);
6994 }
6995 } else {
6996 here.add_item_or_charges( src, leftovers );
6997 }
6998 }
6999}
7000
7001void unload_loot_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &you )
7002{
7003 enum activity_stage : int {
7004 //Initial stage
7005 INIT = 0,
7006 //Think about what to do first: choose destination
7007 THINK,
7008 //Do activity
7009 DO,
7010 };
7011
7012 faction const *fac = you.get_faction();
7013 faction_id fac_id = fac == nullptr ? faction_id() : fac->id;
7014
7015 map &here = get_map();
7016 const tripoint_abs_ms abspos = you.get_location();
7017 zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
7018 if( here.check_vehicle_zones( here.get_abs_sub().z() ) ) {
7019 mgr.cache_vzones();
7020 }
7021
7022 if( stage == INIT ) {
7023 // TODO: fix point types
7024 coord_set.clear();
7025 for( const tripoint_abs_ms &p :
7026 mgr.get_near( zone_type_UNLOAD_ALL, abspos, ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE, nullptr,
7027 fac_id ) ) {
7028 coord_set.insert( p.raw() );
7029 }
7030
7031 for( const tripoint_abs_ms &p :
7032 mgr.get_near( zone_type_STRIP_CORPSES, abspos, ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE, nullptr,
7033 fac_id ) ) {
7034 coord_set.insert( p.raw() );
7035 }
7036 stage = THINK;
7037 }
7038
7039 if( stage == THINK ) {
7040 //initialize num_processed
7041 num_processed = 0;
7042 // TODO: fix point types
7043 std::vector<tripoint_abs_ms> src_set;
7044 src_set.reserve( coord_set.size() );
7045 for( const tripoint &p : coord_set ) {
7046 src_set.emplace_back( p );
7047 }
7048 // sort source tiles by distance
7049 const auto &src_sorted = get_sorted_tiles_by_distance( abspos, src_set );
7050
7051 for( const tripoint_abs_ms &src : src_sorted ) {
7052 // TODO: fix point types
7053 placement = src.raw();
7054 coord_set.erase( src.raw() );
7055
7056 const tripoint_bub_ms &src_loc = here.bub_from_abs( src );
7057 if( !here.inbounds( src_loc ) ) {
7058 if( !here.inbounds( you.pos() ) ) {
7059 // p is implicitly an NPC that has been moved off the map, so reset the activity
7060 // and unload them
7061 you.cancel_activity();
7062 you.assign_activity( ACT_UNLOAD_LOOT );
7063 you.set_moves( 0 );
7064 g->reload_npcs();
7065 return;
7066 }
7067 std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> route;
7068 route = here.route( you.pos_bub(), src_loc, you.get_pathfinding_settings(),
7069 you.get_path_avoid() );
7070 if( route.empty() ) {
7071 // can't get there, can't do anything, skip it
7072 continue;
7073 }
7074 stage = DO;
7075 you.set_destination( route, act );
7076 you.activity.set_to_null();
7077 return;
7078 }
7079
7080 // skip tiles in IGNORE zone and tiles on fire
7081 // (to prevent taking out wood off the lit brazier)
7082 // and inaccessible furniture, like filled charcoal kiln
7083 if( mgr.has( zone_type_LOOT_IGNORE, src, fac_id ) ||
7084 here.get_field( src_loc, fd_fire ) != nullptr ||
7085 !here.can_put_items_ter_furn( src_loc ) ) {
7086 continue;
7087 }
7088
7089 //nothing to sort?
7090 const std::optional<vpart_reference> ovp = here.veh_at( src_loc ).cargo();
7091 if( ( !ovp || ovp->items().empty() ) && here.i_at( src_loc ).empty() ) {
7092 continue;
7093 }
7094
7095 bool is_adjacent_or_closer = square_dist( you.pos_bub(), src_loc ) <= 1;
7096 // before we unload any item, check if player is at or
7097 // adjacent to the loot source tile
7098 if( !is_adjacent_or_closer ) {
7099 std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> route;
7100 bool adjacent = false;
7101
7102 // get either direct route or route to nearest adjacent tile if
7103 // source tile is impassable
7104 if( here.passable( src_loc ) ) {
7105 route = here.route( you.pos_bub(), src_loc, you.get_pathfinding_settings(),
7106 you.get_path_avoid() );
7107 } else {
7108 // impassable source tile (locker etc.),
7109 // get route to nearest adjacent tile instead
7110 route = route_adjacent( you, src_loc );
7111 adjacent = true;
7112 }
7113
7114 // check if we found path to source / adjacent tile
7115 if( route.empty() ) {
7116 add_msg( m_info, _( "%s can't reach the source tile." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s can't reach the source tile."
) ) ),
7117 you.disp_name() );
7118 continue;
7119 }
7120
7121 // shorten the route to adjacent tile, if necessary
7122 if( !adjacent ) {
7123 route.pop_back();
7124 }
7125
7126 // set the destination and restart activity after player arrives there
7127 // we don't need to check for safe mode,
7128 // activity will be restarted only if
7129 // player arrives on destination tile
7130 stage = DO;
7131 you.set_destination( route, act );
7132 you.activity.set_to_null();
7133 return;
7134 }
7135 stage = DO;
7136 break;
7137 }
7138 }
7139 if( stage == DO ) {
7140 // TODO: fix point types
7141 const tripoint_abs_ms src( placement );
7142 const tripoint_bub_ms src_loc = here.bub_from_abs( src );
7143
7144 bool is_adjacent_or_closer = square_dist( you.pos_bub(), src_loc ) <= 1;
7145 // before we move any item, check if player is at or
7146 // adjacent to the loot source tile
7147 if( !is_adjacent_or_closer ) {
7148 stage = THINK;
7149 return;
7150 }
7151
7152 // the boolean in this pair being true indicates the item is from a vehicle storage space
7153 auto items = std::vector<std::pair<item *, bool>>();
7154 vehicle *src_veh;
7155 int src_part;
7156
7157 //Check source for cargo part
7158 //map_stack and vehicle_stack are different types but inherit from item_stack
7159 // TODO: use one for loop
7160 if( const std::optional<vpart_reference> ovp = here.veh_at( src_loc ).cargo() ) {
7161 src_veh = &ovp->vehicle();
7162 src_part = ovp->part_index();
7163 for( item &it : ovp->items() ) {
7164 items.emplace_back( &it, true );
7165 }
7166 } else {
7167 src_veh = nullptr;
7168 src_part = -1;
7169 }
7170 for( item &it : here.i_at( src_loc ) ) {
7171 items.emplace_back( &it, false );
7172 }
7173
7174 bool unload_mods = false;
7175 bool unload_molle = false;
7176 bool unload_sparse_only = false;
7177 int unload_sparse_threshold = 20;
7178
7179 std::vector<zone_data const *> const zones = mgr.get_zones_at( src, zone_type_UNLOAD_ALL,
7180 fac_id );
7181
7182 // get most open rules out of all stacked zones
7183 for( zone_data const *zone : zones ) {
7184 unload_options const &options = dynamic_cast<const unload_options &>( zone->get_options() );
7185 unload_molle |= options.unload_molle();
7186 unload_mods |= options.unload_mods();
7187 unload_sparse_only |= options.unload_sparse_only();
7188 unload_sparse_threshold |= options.unload_sparse_threshold();
7189 }
7190
7191 //Skip items that have already been processed
7192 for( auto it = items.begin() + num_processed; it < items.end(); ++it ) {
7193
7194 item &thisitem = *it->first;
7195
7196 // skip unpickable liquid
7197 if( thisitem.made_of_from_type( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
7198 ++num_processed;
7199 continue;
7200 }
7201
7202 // skip favorite items in ignore favorite zones
7203 if( thisitem.is_favorite && mgr.has( zone_type_LOOT_IGNORE_FAVORITES, src, fac_id ) ) {
7204 ++num_processed;
7205 continue;
7206 }
7207
7208 // Only if it's from a vehicle do we use the vehicle source location information.
7209 vehicle *this_veh = it->second ? src_veh : nullptr;
7210 const int this_part = it->second ? src_part : -1;
7211
7212 // if this item isn't going anywhere and its not sealed
7213 // check if it is in a unload zone or a strip corpse zone
7214 // then we should unload it and see what is inside
7215 if( mgr.has_near( zone_type_UNLOAD_ALL, abspos, 1, fac_id ) ||
7216 ( mgr.has_near( zone_type_STRIP_CORPSES, abspos, 1, fac_id ) && it->first->is_corpse() ) ) {
7217 if( you.rate_action_unload( *it->first ) == hint_rating::good &&
7218 !it->first->any_pockets_sealed() ) {
7219 std::unordered_map<itype_id, int> item_counts;
7220 if( unload_sparse_only ) {
7221 for( item *contained : it->first->all_items_top( pocket_type::CONTAINER ) ) {
7222 if( !contained->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) && !contained->made_of( phase_id::GAS ) ) {
7223 item_counts[contained->typeId()]++;
7224 }
7225 }
7226 }
7227 for( item *contained : it->first->all_items_top( pocket_type::CONTAINER ) ) {
7228 // no liquids don't want to spill stuff
7229 if( !contained->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) && !contained->made_of( phase_id::GAS ) ) {
7230 if( unload_sparse_only &&
7231 item_counts[contained->typeId()] > unload_sparse_threshold ) {
7232 continue;
7233 }
7234 move_item( you, *contained, contained->count(), src_loc, src_loc, this_veh, this_part );
7235 it->first->remove_item( *contained );
7236 }
7237 if( you.moves <= 0 ) {
7238 return;
7239 }
7240 }
7241 for( item *contained : it->first->all_items_top( pocket_type::MAGAZINE ) ) {
7242 // no liquids don't want to spill stuff
7243 if( !contained->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) && !contained->made_of( phase_id::GAS ) ) {
7244 if( it->first->is_ammo_belt() ) {
7245 if( it->first->type->magazine->linkage ) {
7246 item link( *it->first->type->magazine->linkage, calendar::turn, contained->count() );
7247 if( this_veh != nullptr ) {
7248 vehicle_part &vp_this = this_veh->part( this_part );
7249 this_veh->add_item( vp_this, link );
7250 } else {
7251 here.add_item_or_charges( src_loc, link );
7252 }
7253 }
7254 }
7255 move_item( you, *contained, contained->count(), src_loc, src_loc, this_veh, this_part );
7256 it->first->remove_item( *contained );
7257
7258 if( it->first->has_flag( flag_MAG_DESTROY ) && it->first->ammo_remaining() == 0 ) {
7259 if( this_veh != nullptr ) {
7260 vehicle_part &vp_this = this_veh->part( this_part );
7261 this_veh->remove_item( vp_this, it->first );
7262 } else {
7263 here.i_rem( src_loc, it->first );
7264 }
7265 }
7266 }
7267 if( you.moves <= 0 ) {
7268 return;
7269 }
7270 }
7271 for( item *contained : it->first->all_items_top( pocket_type::MAGAZINE_WELL ) ) {
7272 // no liquids don't want to spill stuff
7273 if( !contained->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) && !contained->made_of( phase_id::GAS ) ) {
7274 move_item( you, *contained, contained->count(), src_loc, src_loc, this_veh, this_part );
7275 it->first->remove_item( *contained );
7276 }
7277 if( you.moves <= 0 ) {
7278 return;
7279 }
7280 }
7281 }
7282 // if unloading mods
7283 if( unload_mods ) {
7284 // remove each mod, skip irremovable
7285 for( item *mod : it->first->gunmods() ) {
7286 if( mod->is_irremovable() ) {
7287 continue;
7288 }
7289 you.gunmod_remove( *it->first, *mod );
7290 if( you.moves <= 0 ) {
7291 return;
7292 }
7293 }
7294 }
7295
7296 // if unloading molle
7297 if( unload_molle ) {
7298 while( !it->first->get_contents().get_added_pockets().empty() ) {
7299 item removed = it->first->get_contents().remove_pocket( 0 );
7300 move_item( you, removed, 1, src_loc, src_loc, this_veh, this_part );
7301 if( you.moves <= 0 ) {
7302 return;
7303 }
7304 }
7305 }
7306
7307 // after dumping items go back to start of activity loop
7308 // so that can re-assess the items in the tile
7309 ++num_processed;
7310 return;
7311 }
7312
7313 if( you.moves <= 0 ) {
7314 return;
7315 }
7316 }
7317
7318 //this location is sorted
7319 stage = THINK;
7320 return;
7321 }
7322
7323 // If we got here without restarting the activity, it means we're done
7324 add_msg( m_info, _( "%s sorted out every item possible." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s sorted out every item possible."
) ) ), you.disp_name( false, true ) );
7325 if( you.is_npc() ) {
7326 npc *guy = dynamic_cast<npc *>( &you );
7327 guy->revert_after_activity();
7328 }
7329 act.set_to_null();
7330}
7331
7332bool vehicle_folding_activity_actor::fold_vehicle( Character &p, bool check_only ) const
7333{
7334 map &here = get_map();
7335 const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( target_pos );
7336 if( !vp ) {
7337 debugmsg( "Lost ACT_VEHICLE_FOLD target vehicle" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "7337", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Lost ACT_VEHICLE_FOLD target vehicle"
);
7338 return false;
7339 }
7340 vehicle &veh = vp->vehicle();
7341
7342 if( !veh.is_foldable() ) {
7343 p.add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "%s cannot be folded." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "%s cannot be folded." ) ) ), veh.name );
7344 return false;
7345 }
7346
7347 const inventory &inv = p.crafting_inventory();
7348 for( const vpart_reference &vp : veh.get_all_parts() ) {
7349 for( const itype_id &tool : vp.info().get_folding_tools() ) {
7350 if( !inv.has_tools( tool, 1 ) ) {
7351 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You need %s to do it!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need %s to do it!" ) ) ), item::nname( tool ) );
7352 return false;
7353 }
7354 }
7355 }
7356
7357 if( veh.velocity != 0 ) {
7358 p.add_msg_if_player( m_warning, _( "You can't fold the %s while it's in motion." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You can't fold the %s while it's in motion."
) ) ), veh.name );
7359 return false;
7360 }
7361
7362 if( check_only ) {
7363 return true; // bail out early if we're just checking
7364 }
7365
7366 // Drop cargo to ground
7367 // TODO: make cargo shuffling add time to activity
7368 for( const vpart_reference &vpr : veh.get_any_parts( VPFLAG_CARGO ) ) {
7369 vehicle_stack cargo = vpr.items();
7370 for( const item &elem : cargo ) {
7371 here.add_item_or_charges( veh.pos_bub(), elem );
7372 }
7373 cargo.clear();
7374 }
7375
7376 veh.unboard_all();
7377 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You fold the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You fold the %s." ) ) ), veh.name );
7378 here.add_item_or_charges( veh.pos_bub(), veh.get_folded_item() );
7379 here.destroy_vehicle( &veh );
7380
7381 return true;
7382}
7383
7384vehicle_folding_activity_actor::vehicle_folding_activity_actor( const vehicle &target )
7385{
7386 folding_time = target.folding_time();
7387 target_pos = target.bub_part_pos( 0 );
7388}
7389
7390void vehicle_folding_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &p )
7391{
7392 avatar *pc = p.as_avatar();
7393 if( pc && pc->get_grab_type() == object_type::VEHICLE ) {
7394 optional_vpart_position grabbed_veh = get_map().veh_at( pc->pos_bub() + pc->grab_point );
7395 optional_vpart_position target_veh = get_map().veh_at( target_pos );
7396 if( grabbed_veh && target_veh && ( &grabbed_veh->vehicle() == &target_veh->vehicle() ) ) {
7397 pc->grab( object_type::NONE );
7398 pc->add_msg_if_player( _( "You let go of %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You let go of %s." ) ) ), grabbed_veh->vehicle().name );
7399 }
7400 }
7401
7402 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( folding_time );
7403 act.moves_left = to_moves<int>( folding_time );
7404
7405 if( !fold_vehicle( p, /* check_only = */ true ) ) {
7406 act.set_to_null();
7407 }
7408}
7409
7410void vehicle_folding_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &p )
7411{
7412 if( calendar::once_every( 30_seconds ) ) {
7413 if( !fold_vehicle( p, /* check_only = */ true ) ) {
7414 act.set_to_null();
7415 }
7416 }
7417}
7418
7419void vehicle_folding_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &p )
7420{
7421 fold_vehicle( p, /* check_only = */ false );
7422 act.set_to_null();
7423}
7424
7425void vehicle_folding_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
7426{
7427 jsout.start_object();
7428 jsout.member( "target_pos", target_pos );
7429 jsout.member( "folding_time", folding_time );
7430 jsout.end_object();
7431}
7432
7433std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> vehicle_folding_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
7434{
7435 vehicle_folding_activity_actor actor;
7436 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
7437 data.read( "target_pos", actor.target_pos );
7438 data.read( "folding_time", actor.folding_time );
7439 return actor.clone();
7440}
7441
7442bool vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor::unfold_vehicle( Character &p, bool check_only ) const
7443{
7444 if( p.cant_do_underwater() ) {
7445 return false;
7446 }
7447 if( p.cant_do_mounted() ) {
7448 return false;
7449 }
7450 map &here = get_map();
7451 vehicle *veh = here.add_vehicle( vehicle_prototype_none, p.pos(), 0_degrees, 0, 0, false );
7452 if( veh == nullptr ) {
7453 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There's no room to unfold the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There's no room to unfold the %s."
) ) ), it.tname() );
7454 return false;
7455 }
7456 if( !veh->restore_folded_parts( it ) ) {
7457 here.destroy_vehicle( veh );
7458 return false;
7459 }
7460 const bool cant_float = !veh->can_float();
7461 const auto invalid_pos = [&here, &cant_float]( const tripoint & p ) {
7462 return ( cant_float && here.has_flag_ter( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, p ) )
7463 || here.veh_at( p )
7464 || here.impassable( p );
7465 };
7466
7467 const inventory &inv = p.crafting_inventory();
7468 for( const vpart_reference &vp : veh->get_all_parts() ) {
7469 if( vp.info().location != "structure" ) {
7470 continue;
7471 }
7472 if( invalid_pos( vp.pos() ) ) {
7473 p.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There's no room to unfold the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "There's no room to unfold the %s."
) ) ), it.tname() );
7474 here.destroy_vehicle( veh );
7475 return false;
7476 }
7477 for( const itype_id &tool : vp.info().get_unfolding_tools() ) {
7478 if( !inv.has_tools( tool, 1 ) ) {
7479 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You need %s to do it!" )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need %s to do it!" ) ) ), item::nname( tool ) );
7480 here.destroy_vehicle( veh );
7481 return false;
7482 }
7483 }
7484 }
7485 if( check_only ) { // if we're just checking bail out at this point - this is a valid location.
7486 here.destroy_vehicle( veh );
7487 return true;
7488 }
7489 veh->name = it.get_var( "vehicle_name" );
7490 veh->set_owner( p );
7491 here.add_vehicle_to_cache( veh );
7492 if( here.veh_at( p.pos() ).part_with_feature( "BOARDABLE", true ) ) {
7493 here.board_vehicle( p.pos(), &p ); // if boardable unbroken part is present -> get on it
7494 }
7495 if( p.is_avatar() && it.get_var( "tracking", 0 ) == 1 ) {
7496 veh->toggle_tracking(); // restore position tracking state
7497 }
7498
7499 std::string unfold_msg = it.get_var( "unfold_msg" );
7500 if( unfold_msg.empty() ) {
7501 unfold_msg = _( "You unfold the %s." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You unfold the %s." ) ) );
7502 } else {
7503 unfold_msg = _( unfold_msg )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( unfold_msg ) ) );
7504 }
7505 p.add_msg_if_player( m_neutral, unfold_msg, veh->name );
7506
7507 return true;
7508}
7509
7510vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor::vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor( const item &it )
7511 : it( it )
7512{
7513 constexpr int legacy_unfold_moves = 500;
7514 unfolding_time = time_duration::from_moves( it.get_var( "unfolding_time", legacy_unfold_moves ) );
7515}
7516
7517void vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character &p )
7518{
7519 act.moves_total = to_moves<int>( unfolding_time );
7520 act.moves_left = to_moves<int>( unfolding_time );
7521 if( !unfold_vehicle( p, /* check_only = */ true ) ) {
7522 act.canceled( p );
7523 }
7524}
7525
7526void vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor::do_turn( player_activity &act, Character &p )
7527{
7528 if( calendar::once_every( 30_seconds ) ) {
7529 if( !unfold_vehicle( p, /* check_only = */ true ) ) {
7530 act.canceled( p );
7531 }
7532 }
7533}
7534
7535void vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &p )
7536{
7537 if( !unfold_vehicle( p, /* check_only = */ false ) ) {
7538 debugmsg( "failed unfolding %s", it.display_name() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "7538", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "failed unfolding %s", it.display_name
());
7539 act.canceled( p );
7540 }
7541 act.set_to_null();
7542}
7543
7544void vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor::canceled( player_activity &act, Character &p )
7545{
7546 get_map().add_item_or_charges( p.pos(), it, true );
7547 act.set_to_null();
7548}
7549
7550void vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
7551{
7552 jsout.start_object();
7553 jsout.member( "it", it );
7554 jsout.member( "unfolding_time", unfolding_time );
7555 jsout.end_object();
7556}
7557
7558std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
7559{
7560 vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor actor;
7561 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
7562 data.read( "it", actor.it );
7563 data.read( "unfolding_time", actor.unfolding_time );
7564 return actor.clone();
7565}
7566
7567void wash_activity_actor::start( player_activity &act, Character & )
7568{
7569 act.moves_total = requirements.time;
7570 act.moves_left = requirements.time;
7571}
7572
7573void wash_activity_actor::finish( player_activity &act, Character &p )
7574{
7575 const auto is_liquid_crafting_component = []( const item & it ) {
7576 return is_crafting_component( it ) && ( !it.count_by_charges() || it.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) );
7577 };
7578 const inventory &crafting_inv = p.crafting_inventory();
7579 if( !crafting_inv.has_charges( itype_water, requirements.water, is_liquid_crafting_component ) &&
7580 !crafting_inv.has_charges( itype_water_clean, requirements.water, is_liquid_crafting_component ) ) {
7581 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You need %1$i charges of water or clean water to wash these items." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need %1$i charges of water or clean water to wash these items."
) ) ),
7582 requirements.water );
7583 act.set_to_null();
7584 return;
7585 } else if( !crafting_inv.has_charges( itype_soap, requirements.cleanser ) &&
7586 !crafting_inv.has_charges( itype_detergent, requirements.cleanser ) &&
7587 !crafting_inv.has_charges( itype_liquid_soap, requirements.cleanser,
7588 is_liquid_crafting_component ) ) {
7589 p.add_msg_if_player( _( "You need %1$i charges of cleansing agent to wash these items." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You need %1$i charges of cleansing agent to wash these items."
) ) ),
7590 requirements.cleanser );
7591 act.set_to_null();
7592 return;
7593 }
7594
7595 for( drop_location &ait : to_wash ) {
7596 item_location filthy_item = ait.first;
7597 if( filthy_item->count_by_charges() ) {
7598 item copy( *filthy_item );
7599 copy.charges = ait.second;
7600 copy.unset_flag( flag_FILTHY );
7601 filthy_item->charges -= ait.second;
7602 if( filthy_item->charges <= 0 ) {
7603 filthy_item.remove_item();
7604 }
7605 p.i_add_or_drop( copy );
7606 } else {
7607 filthy_item->unset_flag( flag_FILTHY );
7608 p.on_worn_item_washed( *filthy_item );
7609 }
7610 }
7611
7612 std::vector<item_comp> comps;
7613 comps.emplace_back( itype_water, requirements.water );
7614 comps.emplace_back( itype_water_clean, requirements.water );
7615 p.consume_items( comps, 1, is_liquid_crafting_component );
7616
7617 std::vector<item_comp> comps1;
7618 comps1.emplace_back( itype_soap, requirements.cleanser );
7619 comps1.emplace_back( itype_detergent, requirements.cleanser );
7620 comps1.emplace_back( itype_liquid_soap, requirements.cleanser );
7621 p.consume_items( comps1 );
7622
7623 p.add_msg_if_player( m_good, _( "You washed your items." )( ( []( const auto & arg ) { static auto cache = detail::
get_local_translation_cache( arg ); return cache( arg ); } )(
translation_argument_identity( "You washed your items." ) ) ) );
7624
7625 // Make sure newly washed components show up as available if player attempts to craft immediately
7626 p.invalidate_crafting_inventory();
7627
7628 act.set_to_null();
7629}
7630
7631void wash_activity_actor::serialize( JsonOut &jsout ) const
7632{
7633 jsout.start_object();
7634 jsout.member( "to_wash", to_wash );
7635 jsout.member( "time", requirements.time );
7636 jsout.member( "water", requirements.water );
7637 jsout.member( "cleanser", requirements.cleanser );
7638 jsout.end_object();
7639}
7640
7641std::unique_ptr<activity_actor> wash_activity_actor::deserialize( JsonValue &jsin )
7642{
7643 wash_activity_actor actor;
7644 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
7645 data.read( "to_wash", actor.to_wash );
7646 data.read( "time", actor.requirements.time );
7647 data.read( "water", actor.requirements.water );
7648 data.read( "cleanser", actor.requirements.cleanser );
7649 return actor.clone();
7650}
7651
7652namespace activity_actors
7653{
7654
7655// Please keep this alphabetically sorted
7656const std::unordered_map<activity_id, std::unique_ptr<activity_actor>( * )( JsonValue & )>
7657deserialize_functions = {
7658 { ACT_AIM, &aim_activity_actor::deserialize },
7659 { ACT_AUTODRIVE, &autodrive_activity_actor::deserialize },
7660 { ACT_BIKERACK_RACKING, &bikerack_racking_activity_actor::deserialize },
7661 { ACT_BIKERACK_UNRACKING, &bikerack_unracking_activity_actor::deserialize },
7662 { ACT_BINDER_COPY_RECIPE, &bookbinder_copy_activity_actor::deserialize },
7663 { ACT_BOLTCUTTING, &boltcutting_activity_actor::deserialize },
7664 { ACT_CHOP_LOGS, &chop_logs_activity_actor::deserialize },
7665 { ACT_CHOP_PLANKS, &chop_planks_activity_actor::deserialize },
7666 { ACT_CHOP_TREE, &chop_tree_activity_actor::deserialize },
7667 { ACT_CHURN, &churn_activity_actor::deserialize },
7668 { ACT_CLEAR_RUBBLE, &clear_rubble_activity_actor::deserialize },
7669 { ACT_CONSUME, &consume_activity_actor::deserialize },
7670 { ACT_CRACKING, &safecracking_activity_actor::deserialize },
7671 { ACT_CRAFT, &craft_activity_actor::deserialize },
7672 { ACT_DATA_HANDLING, &data_handling_activity_actor::deserialize },
7673 { ACT_DISABLE, &disable_activity_actor::deserialize },
7674 { ACT_DISASSEMBLE, &disassemble_activity_actor::deserialize },
7675 { ACT_DROP, &drop_activity_actor::deserialize },
7676 { ACT_EBOOKSAVE, &ebooksave_activity_actor::deserialize },
7677 { ACT_FIRSTAID, &firstaid_activity_actor::deserialize },
7678 { ACT_FORAGE, &forage_activity_actor::deserialize },
7679 { ACT_FURNITURE_MOVE, &move_furniture_activity_actor::deserialize },
7680 { ACT_GLIDE, &glide_activity_actor::deserialize },
7681 { ACT_GUNMOD_ADD, &gunmod_add_activity_actor::deserialize },
7682 { ACT_GUNMOD_REMOVE, &gunmod_remove_activity_actor::deserialize },
7683 { ACT_HACKING, &hacking_activity_actor::deserialize },
7684 { ACT_HACKSAW, &hacksaw_activity_actor::deserialize },
7685 { ACT_HAIRCUT, &haircut_activity_actor::deserialize },
7686 { ACT_HARVEST, &harvest_activity_actor::deserialize},
7687 { ACT_HOTWIRE_CAR, &hotwire_car_activity_actor::deserialize },
7688 { ACT_INSERT_ITEM, &insert_item_activity_actor::deserialize },
7689 { ACT_INVOKE_ITEM, &invoke_item_activity_actor::deserialize },
7690 { ACT_LOCKPICK, &lockpick_activity_actor::deserialize },
7691 { ACT_LONGSALVAGE, &longsalvage_activity_actor::deserialize },
7692 { ACT_MEDITATE, &meditate_activity_actor::deserialize },
7693 { ACT_MIGRATION_CANCEL, &migration_cancel_activity_actor::deserialize },
7694 { ACT_MILK, &milk_activity_actor::deserialize },
7695 { ACT_MOP, &mop_activity_actor::deserialize },
7696 { ACT_MOVE_ITEMS, &move_items_activity_actor::deserialize },
7697 { ACT_OPEN_GATE, &open_gate_activity_actor::deserialize },
7698 { ACT_OXYTORCH, &oxytorch_activity_actor::deserialize },
7699 { ACT_PICKUP, &pickup_activity_actor::deserialize },
7700 { ACT_PICKUP_MENU, &pickup_menu_activity_actor::deserialize },
7701 { ACT_PLAY_WITH_PET, &play_with_pet_activity_actor::deserialize },
7702 { ACT_PRYING, &prying_activity_actor::deserialize },
7703 { ACT_READ, &read_activity_actor::deserialize },
7704 { ACT_REEL_CABLE, &reel_cable_activity_actor::deserialize },
7705 { ACT_RELOAD, &reload_activity_actor::deserialize },
7706 { ACT_SHAVE, &shave_activity_actor::deserialize },
7707 { ACT_SHEARING, &shearing_activity_actor::deserialize },
7708 { ACT_STASH, &stash_activity_actor::deserialize },
7709 { ACT_TENT_DECONSTRUCT, &tent_deconstruct_activity_actor::deserialize },
7710 { ACT_TENT_PLACE, &tent_placement_activity_actor::deserialize },
7711 { ACT_TRY_SLEEP, &try_sleep_activity_actor::deserialize },
7712 { ACT_UNLOAD, &unload_activity_actor::deserialize },
7713 { ACT_UNLOAD_LOOT, &unload_loot_activity_actor::deserialize },
7714 { ACT_VEHICLE_FOLD, &vehicle_folding_activity_actor::deserialize },
7715 { ACT_VEHICLE_UNFOLD, &vehicle_unfolding_activity_actor::deserialize },
7716 { ACT_WASH, &wash_activity_actor::deserialize },
7717 { ACT_WEAR, &wear_activity_actor::deserialize },
7718 { ACT_WIELD, &wield_activity_actor::deserialize},
7719 { ACT_WORKOUT_ACTIVE, &workout_activity_actor::deserialize },
7720 { ACT_WORKOUT_HARD, &workout_activity_actor::deserialize },
7721 { ACT_WORKOUT_LIGHT, &workout_activity_actor::deserialize },
7722 { ACT_WORKOUT_MODERATE, &workout_activity_actor::deserialize },
7723};
7724} // namespace activity_actors
7725
7726void serialize( const cata::clone_ptr<activity_actor> &actor, JsonOut &jsout )
7727{
7728 if( !actor ) {
7729 jsout.write_null();
7730 } else {
7731 jsout.start_object();
7732
7733 jsout.member( "actor_type", actor->get_type() );
7734 jsout.member( "actor_data", *actor );
7735
7736 jsout.end_object();
7737 }
7738}
7739
7740void deserialize( cata::clone_ptr<activity_actor> &actor, const JsonValue &jsin )
7741{
7742 if( jsin.test_null() ) {
7743 actor = nullptr;
7744 } else {
7745 JsonObject data = jsin.get_object();
7746 if( data.has_member( "actor_data" ) ) {
7747 activity_id actor_type;
7748 data.read( "actor_type", actor_type );
7749 auto deserializer = activity_actors::deserialize_functions.find( actor_type );
7750 if( deserializer != activity_actors::deserialize_functions.end() ) {
7751 JsonValue jv = data.get_member( "actor_data" );
7752 actor = deserializer->second( jv );
7753 } else {
7754 debugmsg( "Failed to find activity actor deserializer for type \"%s\"", actor_type.c_str() )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "7754", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Failed to find activity actor deserializer for type \"%s\""
, actor_type.c_str());
7755 actor = nullptr;
7756 }
7757 } else {
7758 debugmsg( "Failed to load activity actor" )realDebugmsg("/usr/STLcheck/sekitest/Cataclysm-DDA/src/activity_actor.cpp"
, "7758", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "Failed to load activity actor"
);
7759 actor = nullptr;
7760 }
7761 }
7762}
